original: mig sman nag po brang la g-yer kha'i sgra ldan rin chen gser skud phrag par gcig tu do shal dang // rim par lag pa cha dang bcad pa spras pa gcig tu 'dzin pa'i 'dod ma de rnams rna g-yeng ba //
analyzed: mig sman nag po brang la g-yer kha'i sgra ldan rin chen gser skud phrag par gcig tu do shal dang // rim par lag pa cha dang bcad pa spras pa gcig tu 'dzin pa'i 'dod ma de rnams rna g-yeng ba //
translated: And she was wearing a necklace of black kohl, a golden chain with a tinkling bell on her breast, and a single bracelet on her upper arm, and she was holding a single anklet on her foot, and her ear was pierced with a single earring.

original: zhes pa la sogs kyang ni mthong nas cung zad stan dang 'gog pa'i brla yi gos ni 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs kyang ni mthong nas cung zad stan dang 'gog pa'i brla yi gos ni 'phrog par byed //
translated: Seeing all this, he took away her seat and the cloth on her thighs.

original: mchi ma 'dzag ces pa ni de bzhin spyod par byed pa'i bstan bcos su //
analyzed: mchi ma 'dzag ces pa ni de bzhin spyod par byed pa'i bstan bcos su //
translated: And he said, Your tears are flowing, and he acted accordingly.

original: 'jigs pa med la don mi za bar du ste 'jigs pa rgyas mi byed //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med la don mi za bar du ste 'jigs pa rgyas mi byed //
translated: In the treatise on conduct it is said, Do not be afraid, but eat the food without fear.

original: khros kyang gar byed 'jug cing de yi skad cig nyid la dgod //
analyzed: khros kyang gar byed 'jug cing de yi skad cig nyid la dgod //
translated: Even if angry, make her dance and enter, and laugh at her in an instant.

original: do shal 'chang ba'i stobs med ma ni cir 'gyur zhes kyang grags //
analyzed: do shal 'chang ba'i stobs med ma ni cir 'gyur zhes kyang grags //
translated: It is said, What will happen to the powerless woman wearing a necklace?

original: kye ma bsod nams ldan pa'i mthar gnas ma ni rnam par 'byor bar byed //
analyzed: kye ma bsod nams ldan pa'i mthar gnas ma ni rnam par 'byor bar byed //
translated: Oh, the one with merit will be enjoyed to the end.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: rdo rje mi 'phrog gcer bu dang // lag pa g-yon pas mchod par byed //
analyzed: rdo rje mi 'phrog gcer bu dang // lag pa g-yon pas mchod par byed //
translated: The Vajra-Unconquerable, the Naked, and the one who worships with the left hand.

original: dbugs 'byin bum pa can dang dgod //
analyzed: dbugs 'byin bum pa can dang dgod //
translated: The one who laughs with the inhalation and the vase, and the one who laughs.

original: de bzhin ngo mtshar gar rnams kyis shes te //
analyzed: de bzhin ngo mtshar gar rnams kyis shes te //
translated: And likewise, the one who knows with the dance of wonder.

original: mi 'gom pa ni rang nyid kho nas 'khyud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'gom pa ni rang nyid kho nas 'khyud par byed pa'o //
translated: The one who is not to be stepped over, who embraces by herself alone.

original: dga' ba'i bstan bcos su yang //
analyzed: dga' ba'i bstan bcos su yang //
translated: And in the Treatise on Passion:

original: kun nas 'grogs pas rang nyid 'o byed bya ba dang ni cho ga shes rab bral bas 'khyud pa dang // mal gyi mthar ni rked pa yis kyang lam du 'dod pa'i rnam grangs dang ni bus mo ni //
analyzed: kun nas 'grogs pas rang nyid 'o byed bya ba dang ni cho ga shes rab bral bas 'khyud pa dang // mal gyi mthar ni rked pa yis kyang lam du 'dod pa'i rnam grangs dang ni bus mo ni //
translated: The one who kisses herself through complete intimacy, the one who embraces through the absence of wisdom in the ritual, the one who desires the path through the hips at the end of the bed, and the one who is the enumeration of desire.

original: khros pas g-yo zhing nyug par byed pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bud med dran pas brtse ba yis //
analyzed: khros pas g-yo zhing nyug par byed pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bud med dran pas brtse ba yis //
translated: The one who is the buttocks, who follows the one who is angry, shaking and trembling, the one who is the woman, who is remembered with love.

original: 'phel ba la gnas mngon par dga' ba'i snying ni rtse dga' rol pa'i stobs kyis 'jig par byed //
analyzed: 'phel ba la gnas mngon par dga' ba'i snying ni rtse dga' rol pa'i stobs kyis 'jig par byed //
translated: The one who is the heart, which is increased and abides, destroyed by the power of the play of passion.

original: ces so // dbugs 'byin gyis ni ring du dbugs 'byin pas so //
analyzed: ces so // dbugs 'byin gyis ni ring du dbugs 'byin pas so //
translated: The one who laughs with the inhalation, who laughs with the long inhalation.

original: gar gyis ni gar rnams kyis te gsang ba'i nor bur thig ler rgyun la de'i gar gyis mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: gar gyis ni gar rnams kyis te gsang ba'i nor bur thig ler rgyun la de'i gar gyis mnyes par bya'o //
translated: With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.

original: de nyid thams cad ro gcig pa des sngags pas bkug nas brla zung gi bar du gnas par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid thams cad ro gcig pa des sngags pas bkug nas brla zung gi bar du gnas par bya'o zhes so //

analyzed: ngo mtshar ni ya mtshan dang bcas pa'i rnam pa shin tu dga' ba rnams kyis sgra yang byed de rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud du yang // de nas mnyes pa'i lha mo che //
translated: With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.🔽With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.🔽With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.🔽With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.🔽With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.

original: padma rgyas pa'i m'a ma k'i //🔽dam du 'khyud pa byas nas ni //🔽dbang po kun la'o bya'o //🔽ma mchu dang pos 'o byas na //
analyzed: padma rgyas pa'i m'a ma k'i // dam du 'khyud pa byas nas ni // dbang po kun la'o bya'o // ma mchu dang pos 'o byas na //
translated: With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.🔽With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.🔽With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.

original: sing yig ga don par bya ba'o //🔽@329a * // zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sing yig ga don par bya ba'o //🔽@329a * // zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.🔽With those, which are of one taste, the mantrin, having summoned all of that, should place it between the thighs.

original: ha h'a hi la sogs pa bzhad pa rnam pa brgyad rnal 'byor ba'i spyod pa mchog tu dga' ba rdo rje pho nya mo rnams thams cad kyi mtshan nyid 'di dag tu 'gyur ro zhes pa rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa gsungs pa shin tu dga' ba la mi
analyzed: ha h'a hi la sogs pa bzhad pa rnam pa brgyad rnal 'byor ba'i spyod pa mchog tu dga' ba rdo rje pho nya mo rnams thams cad kyi mtshan nyid 'di dag tu 'gyur ro zhes pa rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa gsungs pa shin tu dga' ba la mi
translated: The eight kinds of laughter, ha ha hi hi, and so on, are the conduct of the yoginis, and the supreme joy of the vajra messengers. These are the characteristics of all of them. Thus, the conduct of the yoginis is taught.

original: mo'i spyod pa sngags dang bsam gtan la sogs pa can nyid kyis mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mo'i spyod pa sngags dang bsam gtan la sogs pa can nyid kyis mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The conduct of the women, endowed with mantra, concentration, and so on, becomes supreme joy.

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes pa'i ched du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes pa'i ched du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to please the yoginis, one should know the treatise on desire.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: dpa' bo rnams kyis slar yang spu ldang ba la sogs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa can yin gyis gzhan ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams kyis slar yang spu ldang ba la sogs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa can yin gyis gzhan ma yin no zhes so //
translated: The heroes' horripilation and so on are innate, not otherwise.

original: dpal he ru ka mngon par brdzod  par gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka mngon par brdzod  par gsungs pa /
translated: It is said in the Shri Heruka Abhidhana Tantra:

original: gtso mo rnams dang dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: gtso mo rnams dang dpa' bo ni //
translated: The chief ones and the heroes,

original: spu ldang lhan cig skyes bde gang //
analyzed: spu ldang lhan cig skyes bde gang //
translated: Whose horripilation is innate bliss,

original: rdo rje 'gom par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'gom par mi bya'o //
translated: Should not be despised.

original: g-yon pas yongs su brtags pa yin //
analyzed: g-yon pas yongs su brtags pa yin //
translated: The left is the one that is examined.

original: zhes so // da ni myos byed 'byung ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes so // da ni myos byed 'byung ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the arising of the intoxicants should be stated.

original: rgyud du gsungs pas byang chub kyi sems dkar po'i phyogs la g-yon pa'i mthe bo nas tshes gcig la sogs pa'i dbye bas gtsug tor du 'gro'o //
analyzed: rgyud du gsungs pas byang chub kyi sems dkar po'i phyogs la g-yon pa'i mthe bo nas tshes gcig la sogs pa'i dbye bas gtsug tor du 'gro'o //
translated: Since it is stated in the tantra, the white bodhicitta moves to the crown through the division of the first day of the month and so on, from the left thumb.

original: 'di lta ste dang po'i tshes la dbang po'i sor mo'i tshigs la'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste dang po'i tshes la dbang po'i sor mo'i tshigs la'o //
translated: That is to say, on the first day of the month, it is in the joint of the thumb.

original: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa la'o //
translated: Similarly, it is in the second and third joints.

original: rkang pa'i tshigs dang pus mo dang / rked pa dang lag pa'i sor mo'i tshigs dang po dang / tshigs bar ma dang / gsum pa'i tshigs dang / lag pa'i tshigs dang / dpung pa'i tshigs dang / phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs dang / snying ga dang /

translated: The first joint of the toes, the knees, the waist, the first joint of the fingers, the middle joint, the third joint, the joint of the arms, the joint of the shoulders, the joint of the shoulders and neck, the heart,

original: mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang / gtsug tor du gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams song nas slar yang nag po la dpral ba dang mgrin pa la sogs par tshes gcig la sogs par 'gro'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang / gtsug tor du gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams song nas slar yang nag po la dpral ba dang mgrin pa la sogs par tshes gcig la sogs par 'gro'o //
translated: Having gone to the throat, forehead, and crown, and having gone to the second and so forth, they again go to the forehead, throat, and so forth, on the first day of the month and so forth.

original: de la cha rnams kyi dmar por snang ba nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de la cha rnams kyi dmar por snang ba nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: There one should meditate on the appearance of the red of the lunar mansions.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas lta ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas lta ba gsungs so //
translated: Thus, this and other passages teach the view.

original: gnas kyi dbye ba'i cho ga ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dag gis ri bo la sogs pa'i gnas te drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas kyi dbye ba'i cho ga ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dag gis ri bo la sogs pa'i gnas te drang ba'i don to //
translated: The procedure of the division of the site is the site of a hero or heroine, a mountain, and so on, according to the interpretable meaning.

original: mgo bo la sogs pa rnams su pu yig la sogs pa rnams dgod par bya'o ;
analyzed: mgo bo la sogs pa rnams su pu yig la sogs pa rnams dgod par bya'o ;
translated: The letters pu and so on are placed on the head and so on.

original: / de bzhin du bla mar yang /
analyzed: / de bzhin du bla mar yang /
translated: Likewise, the guru says:

original: pu dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a k'a ao tri ko ka la ka hi bre gri soo su na si ma ku /
analyzed: pu dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a k'a ao tri ko ka la ka hi bre gri soo su na si ma ku /
translated: Puja, au, a, go, ra, de, ma, ka, au, tri, ko, ka, la, ka, hi, bre, gri, so, su, na, si, ma, ku.

original: zhes so // brda la sogs pa yang shes nas sngags dang bsam gtan la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // brda la sogs pa yang shes nas sngags dang bsam gtan la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: And having understood the symbolics and so on, one should perform the mantra, contemplation, and so on.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am khyim du yang //
analyzed: lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am khyim du yang //
translated: At a crossroads or in a house,

original: dpa' bo gnas pa'i ri bo yang //
analyzed: dpa' bo gnas pa'i ri bo yang //
translated: or on a mountain where heroes dwell,

original: mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas la //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas la //
translated: one who abides in the dakini commitment

original: ring po nas kyang gzigs par 'gyur //
analyzed: ring po nas kyang gzigs par 'gyur //
translated: will be seen from afar.

original: zhes pa sgrub pa de kho na sngon du byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa sgrub pa de kho na sngon du byed pa nyid do //
translated: This is the performance of just that reality beforehand.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: mtshan mo skra grol gyur nas ni //
analyzed: mtshan mo skra grol gyur nas ni //
translated: At night, with loose hair,

original: mchod pa las rnams yang dag brtsams //
analyzed: mchod pa las rnams yang dag brtsams //
translated: One should begin the rites of worship.

original: mchog gzhan rab tu bcug pa'am //
analyzed: mchog gzhan rab tu bcug pa'am //
translated: Having inserted the supreme one,

original: phyogs bcings pa la sogs pa nyid //
analyzed: phyogs bcings pa la sogs pa nyid //
translated: one should worship in a place bound by the directions, and so forth.

original: lha dang lha yi tshogs kyis kyang //
analyzed: lha dang lha yi tshogs kyis kyang //
translated: Even the gods and hosts of gods

original: ma mthong bar yang mchod par gyis //
analyzed: ma mthong bar yang mchod par gyis //
translated: should not see it.

original: zhes pas rdo rje'i mchod pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes pas rdo rje'i mchod pa gsungs te /
translated: This teaches the vajra worship.

original: rab tu bcug nas ni bkug nas so //
analyzed: rab tu bcug nas ni bkug nas so //
translated: Having inserted means having summoned.

original: gzhan ni rgyas la sogs pa can no //
analyzed: gzhan ni rgyas la sogs pa can no //
translated: The other is for the one with inflation, and so forth.🔽Having protected the place, and so forth, by binding the directions, and so forth, in a place free of people, one should worship with the five enjoyments, and so forth, with a woman who is intoxicated.

original: skye bo dang bral bar phyogs bcing ba la sogs pas gnas la sogs pa bsrung ba byas nas bud med myos pa dang lhan cig nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pa nyid kyis mchod pa byas nas de'i chu skyes su rdo rje rab tu gzhug go //
analyzed: skye bo dang bral bar phyogs bcing ba la sogs pas gnas la sogs pa bsrung ba byas nas bud med myos pa dang lhan cig nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pa nyid kyis mchod pa byas nas de'i chu skyes su rdo rje rab tu gzhug go //
translated: One should insert the vajra into her lotus.

original: kyang gi sgra las mi la sogs pa rnams kyis te bram ze la sogs pa rnams dang nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis mthong bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra las mi la sogs pa rnams kyis te bram ze la sogs pa rnams dang nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis mthong bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: By the word “even,” one should not be seen by humans, and so forth, by brahmins, and so forth, by śrāvakas, and so forth.

original: rang gi sgra las mthong yang kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams ni yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa phyag rgya chen po grub pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi sgra las mthong yang kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams ni yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa phyag rgya chen po grub pa'o //
translated: Those who are without sin even when seen by others, who have immeasurable good qualities, and who have attained the Great Seal, are the ones who have attained the Great Seal.

original: gsungs pa yang //🔽gang khyod nyes med lus rnams kun //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang // gang khyod nyes med lus rnams kun //
translated: It is also said:🔽You who see all bodies as sinless,

original: kha na mtho med pas gzigs //
analyzed: kha na mtho med pas gzigs //
translated: You who are without sin,

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa khyod //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa khyod //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom,

original: rnam par mi rtog khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, who are nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du //
analyzed: de bzhin du //
translated: And similarly:🔽The supreme one who has form while being formless,

original: gzugs med gzugs dang ldan pa'i mchog / sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //🔽gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //🔽gzugs brnyan @330a * //
analyzed: gzugs med gzugs dang ldan pa'i mchog / sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes // gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal // gzugs brnyan @330a * //
translated: Born from the mind, having various forms,🔽The glory of the appearance of all forms,🔽The bearer of all reflections,

original: ma lus 'chang ba po //
analyzed: ma lus 'chang ba po //
translated: The one who holds all forms.

original: zhes so // mchod par bgyi zhes pa ni don dam pa'i bden pas phyag rgya ma dang 'grogs pas zung 'jug sgom par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // mchod par bgyi zhes pa ni don dam pa'i bden pas phyag rgya ma dang 'grogs pas zung 'jug sgom par byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase we will worship means that by associating with the consort through the ultimate truth, one meditates on the state of union.

original: de nas nyi shu rtsa lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig gi nyi ma rnams kyis dri ma med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'o ;
analyzed: de nas nyi shu rtsa lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig gi nyi ma rnams kyis dri ma med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'o ;
translated: Then, by the eleven hundred days that remain, one will attain the state of stainlessness. This is the conclusion.

original: / dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: / dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags dang yang na gzhan yang sngags pas grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags dang yang na gzhan yang sngags pas grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The root mantra and other mantras will be accomplished by the mantrin.

original: gang tshe me tog snyim pa bkang //
analyzed: gang tshe me tog snyim pa bkang //
translated: When the flower-filled palms

original: nam mkhar gtor ba ma mthong na //
analyzed: nam mkhar gtor ba ma mthong na //
translated: are scattered in the sky,

original: zhes pa la sogs pas rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth, the root mantra and so forth are taught.

original: me tog gcig sa la lhung ba de'i tshe pho nya mo rnams 'grub par byed de ngag gi dbang phyug dang ngag gi dbang phyug gi ma mo rnams 'gugs par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me tog gcig sa la lhung ba de'i tshe pho nya mo rnams 'grub par byed de ngag gi dbang phyug dang ngag gi dbang phyug gi ma mo rnams 'gugs par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one flower falls to the ground, at that time the messengers are accomplished, and the mothers of the lord of speech are summoned.

original: lha la sogs pa'i gnas mtha' yas pa la gnas zhes so //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa'i gnas mtha' yas pa la gnas zhes so //
translated: They abide in the infinite abodes of the gods and so forth.

original: 'dir sngags ni bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir sngags ni bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'o //
translated: Here, the mantra is taught in the explanatory tantra.

original: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /

original: aom he ru kam h'um h'um phat ces so //
analyzed: aom he ru kam h'um h'um phat ces so //

original: yang na aom dzva la dzva la bhyo: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: yang na aom dzva la dzva la bhyo: h'um phat sv'a h'a /

original: zhes pa phyag gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa phyag gnyis pa'o //

original: aom shr'i ha ru ka h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i ha ru ka h'um phat sv'a h'a /

original: zhes pa phyag bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa phyag bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is for the four-armed [Heruka].

original: badzra w'a r'a h'i h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes so //
analyzed: badzra w'a r'a h'i h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes so //

original: skar ma'i rgyu ba shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: skar ma'i rgyu ba shes par 'gyur //

original: sa 'og sogs su gang 'gyur dang // snying po nye snying yin na ni //
analyzed: sa 'og sogs su gang 'gyur dang // snying po nye snying yin na ni //

analyzed: bsgrub bya de ni mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: zhes te / rgyu ba rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis shes par byed pa mi mthong ste /

analyzed: rnal 'byor de nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i phyir ro //

original: me'i gong bu bzhin du nam mkha' la mi snang bar byed do //
analyzed: me'i gong bu bzhin du nam mkha' la mi snang bar byed do //
translated: Like a ball of fire, he becomes invisible in the sky.

original: ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Just as it is.

original: grong dang grong du de bzhin dgon //
analyzed: grong dang grong du de bzhin dgon //
translated: In villages and towns, likewise in forests,

original: grong khyer dang ni bzhi mdo dang // dpa' bo'i khyim dang shing gcig dang // ri yi rtse dang mtshan ma mtshungs //
analyzed: grong khyer dang ni bzhi mdo dang // dpa' bo'i khyim dang shing gcig dang // ri yi rtse dang mtshan ma mtshungs //

original: shing rtser kha dog dmar bsams nas //
analyzed: shing rtser kha dog dmar bsams nas //
translated: one should visualize a red color at the top of the tree,

analyzed: yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid can // mi phyed myur du ltung bar 'gyur //

analyzed: sa spyod rnams kyang ltung bar 'gyur //

analyzed: bdag gi lus la rnam bkod do //

analyzed: sa la ku sha'i stan la nyal //

analyzed: yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid can //

original: ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad par bzlas //
analyzed: ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad par bzlas //

original: rmi lam du ni bya ba kun //
analyzed: rmi lam du ni bya ba kun //

analyzed: ston par 'gyur te the tshom med //

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is the meaning.

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams aom hri: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor lo @330b bsgom pa dang bzlas pas thams cad byed de sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The yoginīs meditate on the wheel with “oṃ hrīḥ” and so forth, and do everything by recitation. It is literal.

analyzed: bu mo'i lus kyi tshogs sngags kyis bgrang phreng la mngon par bsngags par bya'o //

original: ral gri dang mar me dang mthe bong dang / me long la bltas pas pra phab pa mthong ste dge ba dang mi dge ba gang cung zad yod pa 'dir ston par byed do zhes pas rdo rje'i skar ma 'am snang ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ral gri dang mar me dang mthe bong dang / me long la bltas pas pra phab pa mthong ste dge ba dang mi dge ba gang cung zad yod pa 'dir ston par byed do zhes pas rdo rje'i skar ma 'am snang ba gsungs so //
translated: By looking at a sword, a lamp, a thumb, and a mirror, one sees the omens of the divination. Whatever good or bad exists is shown here. Thus, the vajra star or light is explained.

original: dpal kye'i rdo rje la sogs par gsungs pa'i cho gas shes par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: dpal kye'i rdo rje la sogs par gsungs pa'i cho gas shes par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: One should understand this by the rite taught in the Shri Hevajra Tantra and so forth. This is literal.

original: de nas yi ge pa yis sngags //
analyzed: de nas yi ge pa yis sngags //

analyzed: rnam bkod 'khor lo'i dbye ba las //

original: lag g-yas nyi ma'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: lag g-yas nyi ma'i dbus su ni //

original: stong phrag gcig tu mngon bsngags nas //
analyzed: stong phrag gcig tu mngon bsngags nas //

original: gang gis lag pa ston par byed //
analyzed: gang gis lag pa ston par byed //

analyzed: de ni nges par 'gugs par byed //

original: 'khor lo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: 'khor lo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //

original: rnam bkod lag pa g-yon pas de //
analyzed: rnam bkod lag pa g-yon pas de //
translated: he should arrange it in his left hand.

original: shel gyi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: shel gyi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis //

original: phyogs bcur rnam par 'byor bar byed //
analyzed: phyogs bcur rnam par 'byor bar byed //

analyzed: ces pa ni 'byung po la sogs pa 'bros par byed pa'o //

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

analyzed: gang gis lag pa ston par byed pa de nad la sogs pas gzir ba de rnams kyi nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te the tshom med do //
translated: Whoever he shows his hand to, those afflicted by illness and so forth will be freed from all illnesses, without a doubt.

analyzed: dug dang gdon dang rims dang gzer dang mdze la sogs pa yang 'joms par byed do zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It also conquers poison, spirits, fevers, pains, leprosy, and so on.

original: ba lang sha ni mngar gsum btags //
analyzed: ba lang sha ni mngar gsum btags //
translated: The flesh of a cow, mixed with the three sweet things,

analyzed: gal te sngags rig gcer bu gang //

analyzed: mtshan mo gsang ba ru ni gnas //

analyzed: stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya //

original: sngags pas nang par dus su ni //
analyzed: sngags pas nang par dus su ni //

original: gser srang stong ni rnyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: gser srang stong ni rnyed par 'gyur //

original: sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu rnams kyis //

analyzed: yul 'khor dam pa rnyed par 'gyur //

analyzed: zhes pas sbyin sreg gsungs so //

analyzed: mngar gsum ni sbrang rtsi 'o ma ka ra'o //

analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //

original: yang na gsang sngags rgyal po che //
analyzed: yang na gsang sngags rgyal po che //

analyzed: gnas ni gang du bsam par bya //

analyzed: rgyal srid 'gyur bar the tshom med //

original: ces pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //

original: dkar po yis ni zhi bar byed //
analyzed: dkar po yis ni zhi bar byed //

analyzed: ser pos nges par gnon par byed // ces pa kha dog gsungs te sgra @331a * //

analyzed: ji bzhin pa'o //

analyzed: lag pa g-yon dang g-yas pa la //

analyzed: zla nyi mun pa can dang me //

analyzed: gru dang shing rta 'khrul 'khor dang // dud 'gro la sogs pa yi gzhi //

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //

analyzed: yang na bya ba thams cad ni //

analyzed: sgrub par gyur pa bsgrub par bya //

analyzed: dri bzangs me tog 'bras bu dang // bdug pa so rtsi bzang po'i zas //

analyzed: zhes pa ni gsal lo //

analyzed: lus kyi sbyor ba dang por 'gyur //

analyzed: sbyor ba gnyis pa nus pa ste //

analyzed: gsum pa rgyal srid longs spyod nyid //

analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug pho nya mo //

analyzed: de 'grub der ni the tshom med // khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas //

analyzed: dmod 'debs rjes 'dzin byed pa yin //

analyzed: 'dir sngags pa'i lus kyi longs spyod ni lus mdzes par 'gyur ro //

original: bsam gtan grub pa la nus pa //
analyzed: bsam gtan grub pa la nus pa //

analyzed: zhes so // ngag gi 'jal ba rgyal sred ces te yid la mngon par 'dod pa'o //

original: bzhi pa ni bud med bzang mo'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni bud med bzang mo'i bde ba'o //

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning.

analyzed: yang na rnal 'byor ma drug sngags //

analyzed: 'khor lo lag pa g-yon par gnas //

original: gang gi lag pa de bstan pa //
analyzed: gang gi lag pa de bstan pa //

original: de ni nges par 'gugs par byed //
analyzed: de ni nges par 'gugs par byed //
translated: will certainly be summoned.

analyzed: 'khor lo'i yi ge la sogs ni dmar por gsal lo // tsandan dmar po'i rdul dang ni //

analyzed: de bzhin skye tshe lan tshva dang // bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes rdul //

original: gcig tu byas nas btags par bya //
analyzed: gcig tu byas nas btags par bya //
translated: should be mixed together.

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams sngags dang ni //

analyzed: lag pas mnye ba byas nas ni //

original: de nas mtshan mo gdol ba'i mer //
analyzed: de nas mtshan mo gdol ba'i mer //

analyzed: ro bsregs me la phye ma bsregs //

original: bsgrub byar mngon phyogs gyur nas ni //
analyzed: bsgrub byar mngon phyogs gyur nas ni //

analyzed: sbyor ba'i di ni brtsam par bya //

original: ji srid chig brgyar sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: ji srid chig brgyar sbyin sreg bya //
translated: As long as one hundred oblations are offered,

original: de srid nges par 'gugs par byed //
analyzed: de srid nges par 'gugs par byed //
translated: for that long one will certainly be summoned.

original: ces pa sngags brjod pas bsgrub bya rmya shing rmugs par gyur pa rlung dang me'i dkyil @331b 'khor la gnas pa phyag gi zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang lha rnams kyi 'od zer gyis snying phug nas /

translated: Having recited the mantra, the victim becomes exhausted and drowsy, standing on the maṇḍala of wind and fire, pierced in the heart by the noose and iron hook of the hand and the light rays of the deities.

original: de nas bud med de'i skye gnas lcags kyus phug nas zhags pas mgrin pa bcings nas gcer bur mngon du phyogs nas zhabs kyi 'og tu lhung bar 'gyur par bsam par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //

translated: Then, having been pierced by the iron hook in the vagina of that woman, having been bound by the noose around the neck, naked, facing forward, one should imagine that she falls at one’s feet. This is the literal meaning explanation.

original: sa yi mgon po bdag nyid dang // nor yang dbang du 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: sa yi mgon po bdag nyid dang // nor yang dbang du 'gyur ba yin //

original: rdul de nyid ni yang dag blang //🔽lcags kyi phye ma rnam par bsre //
analyzed: rdul de nyid ni yang dag blang // lcags kyi phye ma rnam par bsre //
translated: Take up that very powder,🔽and mix it with iron filings.

original: dur khrod ras la gtums nas ni //
analyzed: dur khrod ras la gtums nas ni //
translated: Wrap it in a charnel ground cloth,

original: lan bdun bzlas te bzhi mdo ru //
analyzed: lan bdun bzlas te bzhi mdo ru //

original: sor mo brgyad du sa brkos nas //
analyzed: sor mo brgyad du sa brkos nas //

original: dgra yi ming dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: dgra yi ming dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with the name of the enemy,

original: gang gi ming smos sbas pa de //
analyzed: gang gi ming smos sbas pa de //
translated: whomever’s name is spoken and hidden

analyzed: myur du bsgrub bya de gnon gyur // ba yi 'o mas grol don du //
translated: One should quickly press down upon the object of the rite.

original: de nas phyi ma de bkru bya //
analyzed: de nas phyi ma de bkru bya //

analyzed: zhes te / de zhes pa bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi'o //

analyzed: de la gnas pa'i yang na'o //

analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning.

original: phye ma de nyid blangs nas ni //
analyzed: phye ma de nyid blangs nas ni //

original: smyo byed lnga dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: smyo byed lnga dang yang dag ldan //

original: yi dags gos su de btums nas //
analyzed: yi dags gos su de btums nas //
translated: One should wrap it in a shroud of a preta,

original: dgra yi ming ni kun du bri //
analyzed: dgra yi ming ni kun du bri //
translated: and write the name of the enemy all around.

original: gcig tu byas nas brgyar bzlas te //
analyzed: gcig tu byas nas brgyar bzlas te //
translated: Having made it into one, one should recite it one hundred times.

original: dur khrod du ni me sba bya //
analyzed: dur khrod du ni me sba bya //
translated: One should light a fire in a charnel ground.

original: bsgrub bya 'phral du smyo bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgrub bya 'phral du smyo bar 'gyur //
translated: The object of the rite will immediately become insane.

original: 'o mas bkrus na bde ba'o //
analyzed: 'o mas bkrus na bde ba'o //
translated: If one washes it with milk, he will be happy.

original: zhes te rang gi gnas su 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes te rang gi gnas su 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning.

original: lnga zhes pa ni da ngu ra'i rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: lnga zhes pa ni da ngu ra'i rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'o //
translated: “Five” refers to the root, trunk, leaf, flower, and fruit of datura.

original: yi dags ni shi ba'o //
analyzed: yi dags ni shi ba'o //
translated: “Preta” means dead.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning.

original: zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i khrag gis gro ga la ming kun du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i khrag gis gro ga la ming kun du bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should write the name on birch bark with blood from a menstruating woman.

original: sum mdor bzlas pa byas te mthe bos mnan na dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sum mdor bzlas pa byas te mthe bos mnan na dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: Having recited in the groin, if one presses with one's thumb, [the victim] will be enthralled.

original: rang zhes pa ming med mthe bos mnan pa'o //
analyzed: rang zhes pa ming med mthe bos mnan pa'o //
translated: The self is the name; one should press with one's thumb.

original: rkang pas mnan par byas nas ming med kyis bzlas par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: rkang pas mnan par byas nas ming med kyis bzlas par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Having pressed with one's foot, one should recite with one's ring finger.

original: de nas las mchog bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nas las mchog bshad par bya //
translated: Then, one should explain the supreme ritual action,

original: dag gis dngos grub rab bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: dag gis dngos grub rab bsgrub pa'o //
translated: which is the means of achieving power with the five ambrosias.

original: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar //
analyzed: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar //
translated: With red karavīra flowers,

original: ba yi 'o mar ldan pas kyang //
analyzed: ba yi 'o mar ldan pas kyang //
translated: mixed with cow's milk,

original: nyin zhag so sor sngags bzlas pas //
analyzed: nyin zhag so sor sngags bzlas pas //
translated: one should recite the mantra daily,

original: zhi ba'i lingga'i spyi bor bsnun //
analyzed: zhi ba'i lingga'i spyi bor bsnun //
translated: and strike the head of the peaceful linga.

original: nyi ma bdun du mnyam gzhag pas //
analyzed: nyi ma bdun du mnyam gzhag pas //
translated: Having meditated for seven days,

original: brgya rtsa brgyad po nyid kyis so //
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad po nyid kyis so //
translated: one hundred and eight times,

original: de nas nyi ma brgyad pa la //
analyzed: de nas nyi ma brgyad pa la //
translated: then on the eighth day,

original: me tog de rnams blangs nas su //
analyzed: me tog de rnams blangs nas su //
translated: one should take those flowers,

original: chu klung chen po'i chur zhugs nas //
analyzed: chu klung chen po'i chur zhugs nas //
translated: enter the water of a great river,

original: de dag re re dor bar bya //🔽mthar @332a * //
analyzed: de dag re re dor bar bya // mthar @332a * //
translated: and discard each one.

original: gyis kyang ni thams cad rnams //
analyzed: gyis kyang ni thams cad rnams //
translated: Finally, all of them,

original: gsang sngags bzlas nas dor bar bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags bzlas nas dor bar bya //

original: chu klung dor ba'i me tog gang //
analyzed: chu klung dor ba'i me tog gang //
translated: The flowers that are cast into the river

original: rgyun las ldog na sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: rgyun las ldog na sgrub pa pos //
translated: are taken by the adept when they go against the current.

original: de ni chu dang ldan pa blang //
analyzed: de ni chu dang ldan pa blang //
translated: They should be taken with water.

original: smos ma reg pa de 'thungs na //
analyzed: smos ma reg pa de 'thungs na //
translated: Having drunk that without touching the ground,

original: sgrub pa po de'i ngag gis ni //
analyzed: sgrub pa po de'i ngag gis ni //
translated: the speech of that adept

original: dngos grub 'gyur bar the tshom med //
analyzed: dngos grub 'gyur bar the tshom med //
translated: will undoubtedly be accomplished.

original: ces te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: ces te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is just the literal meaning.

original: lag pa skye gnas phyag rgya bcings //
analyzed: lag pa skye gnas phyag rgya bcings //
translated: The hand gesture of the vulva is bound,

original: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya //
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya //
translated: and one should repeat one hundred and eight times.

original: sngags pa bsgrub byar mngon phyogs nas //
analyzed: sngags pa bsgrub byar mngon phyogs nas //
translated: The adept, facing the object of the rite,

original: bsgrub bya yi yang lto bar gnas //
analyzed: bsgrub bya yi yang lto bar gnas //
translated: remains in the belly of the object of the rite.

original: blo ldan de yid la gnas pa //
analyzed: blo ldan de yid la gnas pa //
translated: The wise one, remaining in the mind,

original: thun gsum mthe chung ba skyong bar bya //
analyzed: thun gsum mthe chung ba skyong bar bya //
translated: should move the little finger in three sessions.

original: mtshan mo bdun gyis rgyal po sogs //
analyzed: mtshan mo bdun gyis rgyal po sogs //
translated: Within seven nights, the king and so forth,

original: brgya byin sogs rnams nges par 'gugs //
analyzed: brgya byin sogs rnams nges par 'gugs //
translated: Śakra and so forth, are definitely summoned.

original: zhes te mthe chung ni lce'o //🔽dgongs pa'o // tsandan dmar po'i rdul gyis ni //
analyzed: zhes te mthe chung ni lce'o // dgongs pa'o // tsandan dmar po'i rdul gyis ni //
translated: The little finger is the tongue.🔽This is the intention.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas nas //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas nas //
translated: Having made an image of the object of the rite with red sandalwood powder,

original: tsha ba gsum gyis rnam par byugs //
analyzed: tsha ba gsum gyis rnam par byugs //
translated: one should anoint it with the three pungent substances.

original: spra tshil gyis ni rab byug bya ;
analyzed: spra tshil gyis ni rab byug bya ;
translated: and wrap it in beeswax.

original: / sgrub pos de yi gsang gnas su //🔽zangs ma'i kha ba kyis de phug nas //
analyzed: / sgrub pos de yi gsang gnas su // zangs ma'i kha ba kyis de phug nas //
translated: The adept should pierce the secret part🔽of that with a copper needle.

original: seng ldeng mdag me du med la //
analyzed: seng ldeng mdag me du med la //
translated: In the midst of many heaps of burning khadira wood,

original: nyi ma bdun du nges par gdung //
analyzed: nyi ma bdun du nges par gdung //
translated: he should heat it for seven days.

original: sngags kyis lan cig bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: sngags kyis lan cig bzlas pa yis //
translated: By reciting the mantra once,

original: bsgrub bya myur du 'gugs par byed //
analyzed: bsgrub bya myur du 'gugs par byed //
translated: he will quickly summon the victim.

original: bsgrub bya'i ming ni sngags spel ba //🔽gi wang ro yi sen rtsi yis //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i ming ni sngags spel ba // gi wang ro yi sen rtsi yis //
translated: The name of the victim, augmented with the mantra,🔽should be written on birchbark

original: gro ga'i 'dab ma la bri bya //
analyzed: gro ga'i 'dab ma la bri bya //
translated: with bovine bezoar and the nail parings of a caṇḍāla.

original: rgyal po'i gnas dang sde nyid bcas //🔽spra tshil gyis ni 'dab ma dkri //
analyzed: rgyal po'i gnas dang sde nyid bcas // spra tshil gyis ni 'dab ma dkri //
translated: The king, together with his army,🔽should be wrapped in beeswax

original: seng sdeng me yis gdung bar bya //
analyzed: seng sdeng me yis gdung bar bya //

original: ji srid spra tshil ma zhu ba //
analyzed: ji srid spra tshil ma zhu ba //
translated: As long as the beeswax does not melt,

original: de srid bar du gdung bar bya //
analyzed: de srid bar du gdung bar bya //
translated: he should be heated.

original: rgyal po nges par myur du 'gugs //
analyzed: rgyal po nges par myur du 'gugs //

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes rdul //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes rdul //

original: tsandan dmar po dang bsres pa //
analyzed: tsandan dmar po dang bsres pa //

original: dur khrod thal ba dang lhag ma //
analyzed: dur khrod thal ba dang lhag ma //
translated: and charnel ground ash.

original: gcig tu byas nas sgrub pos ni //
analyzed: gcig tu byas nas sgrub pos ni //
translated: Having made one lump, the adept🔽should write the name of the victim

original: seng lder mdag me du med la //🔽rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni //
analyzed: seng lder mdag me du med la // rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni //
translated: In the middle of a fire of burning coals,🔽one should crush that powder with both hands

original: mnyes nas gdung ba'i sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: mnyes nas gdung ba'i sbyin sreg bya //
translated: and make an oblation of it in the fire.

original: ji srid du ni bsregs pas 'grub //
analyzed: ji srid du ni bsregs pas 'grub //
translated: One will succeed as long as one continues to burn it.🔽When she faints, loses consciousness,

original: brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang // rnam par rmongs shing nyon mongs pas //
analyzed: brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang // rnam par rmongs shing nyon mongs pas //
translated: is confused and distressed,

original: phyugs dang de bzhin pho nya mo //
analyzed: phyugs dang de bzhin pho nya mo //
translated: the messenger, like an animal,

original: rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur //
translated: will come with the speed of the wind.

original: ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma ni //
analyzed: ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma ni //
translated: One should take a branch of karavīra

original: rlan bcas dpung pa'i tshad tsam ni //
analyzed: rlan bcas dpung pa'i tshad tsam ni //
translated: moistened with water, the length of one’s arm,

original: blangs nas de la sngags bris te //
analyzed: blangs nas de la sngags bris te //
translated: write the mantra on it,

original: ro bsregs me ru de gzhug bya //
analyzed: ro bsregs me ru de gzhug bya //
translated: and place it in the fire of a funeral pyre.

original: ji srid de @332b ni ma tshig pa //
analyzed: ji srid de @332b ni ma tshig pa //

original: de nas myur bas blangs nas ni //🔽rigs pas lan bdun bzlas byas nas //
analyzed: de nas myur bas blangs nas ni // rigs pas lan bdun bzlas byas nas //
translated: then, quickly taking it,🔽one should recite it seven times with the proper procedure

original: bsgrub bya'i ming nas de bskor bya //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i ming nas de bskor bya //
translated: and circle it over the head of the victim.

original: bud med mchog gang rjes dran nas //
analyzed: bud med mchog gang rjes dran nas //
translated: Recalling the name of the supreme woman,

original: rlung gi shugs kyis de 'gugs byed //🔽g-yon gyi 'jug pas de slar yang //
analyzed: rlung gi shugs kyis de 'gugs byed // g-yon gyi 'jug pas de slar yang //
translated: one will summon her with the speed of the wind.🔽By circling it to the left,

original: bskor bas zhi bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: bskor bas zhi bar byed pa yin //
translated: one will pacify her again.

original: ka ra b'i ra mar me tog / rgyal la gi wang gis byugs te //
analyzed: ka ra b'i ra mar me tog / rgyal la gi wang gis byugs te //
