original: kun spyod du yang lus rjes su dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o //
analyzed: kun spyod du yang lus rjes su dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o //
translated: In the ethical code, the mindfulness of body is the ḍākinī.

original: de bzhin du gzhan yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: And so on should be understood in the same way.

original: rdo rje sems sogs dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: rdo rje sems sogs dpa' bo ni //
translated: The heroes Vajrasattva and so on

original: lugs las bzlog pas rab tu bstan //
analyzed: lugs las bzlog pas rab tu bstan //
translated: are taught in the reverse order.

original: zhes pas 'khor lo lngas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas 'khor lo lngas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
translated: This teaches the maṇḍala included in the five wheels.

original: mkha' la 'gro ma nyi shu bzhi //
analyzed: mkha' la 'gro ma nyi shu bzhi //
translated: The twenty-four sky-farers

original: zhes pa le'u bzhi par gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa le'u bzhi par gsungs so //
translated: are taught in the fourth chapter.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of being a yoginī tantra.

original: drang ba'i don gyis go sla'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis go sla'o //
translated: The provisional meaning is easy to understand.

original: nges pa'i don gyis mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams lte ba la sogs pa'i 'khor lor sa la sogs pa 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i don gyis mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams lte ba la sogs pa'i 'khor lor sa la sogs pa 'bab pa'o //
translated: The definitive meaning is that the ḍākinīs and so on descend to the navel cakra and so on.

original: rab gtum la sogs pa rnams rtsa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i sen mo dang so la sogs pa 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: rab gtum la sogs pa rnams rtsa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i sen mo dang so la sogs pa 'bab pa'o //
translated: Caṇḍālī and so on descend to the nails, teeth, and so on of the twenty-four nāḍīs.

original: bya rog gdong la sogs pa rnams sgo'i rtsa rnams te /
analyzed: bya rog gdong la sogs pa rnams sgo'i rtsa rnams te /
translated: The crow-faced and so on are the nāḍīs of the gates.

original: kha'i dri ma la sogs pa 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: kha'i dri ma la sogs pa 'bab pa'o //
translated: The mouth impurities and so on descend.

original: dpa' bo rnams kyang so dang sen mo la sogs pa 'bab pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams kyang so dang sen mo la sogs pa 'bab pa'o zhes so //
translated: The heroes fall from their teeth, nails, and so forth.

original: dang por rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
analyzed: dang por rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
translated: First is Vajrasattva,

original: de nas dpa' bo rnam snang mdzad //
analyzed: de nas dpa' bo rnam snang mdzad //
translated: then the hero Vairochana,

original: padma gar gyi dbang phyug nyid //
analyzed: padma gar gyi dbang phyug nyid //
translated: Padmanarteshvara,

original: de bzhin he ru ka dpal che //
analyzed: de bzhin he ru ka dpal che //
translated: and likewise the great Shri Heruka.🔽Akshobhya, Amoghasiddhi,🔽and likewise Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: nam mkha'i snying po rta mgrin dang // de bzhin rin chen rdo rje mchog / stobs po che zhes brgyad pa ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po rta mgrin dang // de bzhin rin chen rdo rje mchog / stobs po che zhes brgyad pa ni //
translated: and the eighth is Mahābala.

original: sku yi 'khor lor gnas pa ste //
analyzed: sku yi 'khor lor gnas pa ste //
translated: They abide in the body wheel.

original: lugs las bzlog par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: lugs las bzlog par gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is taught in reverse order.

original: mig ngan rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid //
analyzed: mig ngan rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid //
translated: Bhimakrodha, Vajrabhairava,

original: rdo rje bzang dang shin tu bzang //🔽rdo rje h'um mdzad nyid dang yang //
analyzed: rdo rje bzang dang shin tu bzang // rdo rje h'um mdzad nyid dang yang //
translated: Vajrasādhu, and Subhadra,🔽Vajrahūṃkāra,🔽and also Vajramukuta,

original: dpa' chen rdo rje ral pa dang // myu gu can zhes bya ba ste //
analyzed: dpa' chen rdo rje ral pa dang // myu gu can zhes bya ba ste //
translated: and the one called Ananta,

original: brgyad po gsung gi 'khor lor gnas //
analyzed: brgyad po gsung gi 'khor lor gnas //
translated: these eight abide in the speech wheel.

original: rdo rje'i lugs dang rdo rje'i 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje'i lugs dang rdo rje'i 'od //
translated: Vajraketu, Vajraprabha,🔽Amitābha, and Devapraghāṭa,

original: 'od dpag med dang lha dgra dang // de bzhin nyid du mche rnam gtsigs //
analyzed: 'od dpag med dang lha dgra dang // de bzhin nyid du mche rnam gtsigs //
translated: and likewise Vajraviśva.

original: keng rus keng rus chen po mchog / thod pa'i dum bu can rnams ni //
analyzed: keng rus keng rus chen po mchog / thod pa'i dum bu can rnams ni //
translated: The skeletons, the great skeletons, the supreme, the skull-garlanded,

original: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad //
analyzed: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad //
translated: are explained as the twenty-four heroes.

original: brgyad po thugs kyi rdo rjer gnas //
analyzed: brgyad po thugs kyi rdo rjer gnas //
translated: The eight are located in the vajra of mind.

original: dpa' bo gcig pu'i don du ni //🔽ji skad gsungs bzhin kha dog dbyibs //
analyzed: dpa' bo gcig pu'i don du ni // ji skad gsungs bzhin kha dog dbyibs //
translated: For the sake of the single hero,

original: bsgom par bya zhing mchod par bya //
analyzed: bsgom par bya zhing mchod par bya //
translated: one should meditate and worship,🔽as stated, with the proper color and form.

original: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dpa' bo rnams //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dpa' bo rnams //
translated: The twenty-four heroes

original: dpa' mo @336a * //
analyzed: dpa' mo @336a * //
translated: and the heroines

original: che sogs pho nya mo //
analyzed: che sogs pho nya mo //
translated: are the messengers beginning with Mahācāriṇī.

original: zhes pas shes rab dang thabs nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas shes rab dang thabs nyid du gsungs so //
translated: This teaches wisdom and method.

original: de la gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa bong bu dang rnga mo dang / ra dang byi la'i gdong can zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de la gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa bong bu dang rnga mo dang / ra dang byi la'i gdong can zhes brjod do //
translated: There, Yamadādhī and so on are said to have the faces of a donkey, camel, goat, and cat.

original: pho nya mo sum cu rtsa drug ni mtshan ma lngas mtshan ma la chags pa dang cung zad dgod pa yongs su 'khyud pa gcer bu nyid dang skra grol ba spu langs pa yang ngo zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: pho nya mo sum cu rtsa drug ni mtshan ma lngas mtshan ma la chags pa dang cung zad dgod pa yongs su 'khyud pa gcer bu nyid dang skra grol ba spu langs pa yang ngo zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The thirty-six messengers are marked with five signs: attachment to the mark, slight laughter, full embrace, nakedness, and erect body hair. This is literal.

original: sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis //
analyzed: sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis //
translated: By the rite previously described,

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
translated: one binds the network of dakinis.

original: dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya //
translated: One should worship with all substances,

original: dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin //
analyzed: dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin //
translated: which is the virtue that accomplishes all powers.

original: zhes te sngar brjod pa ni rtsa ba dang bshad pa'i rgyud du brjod pas so //
analyzed: zhes te sngar brjod pa ni rtsa ba dang bshad pa'i rgyud du brjod pas so //
translated: The previously described is the root and explanatory tantras.🔽In the Vajradaka also:

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang tho rangs rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dbus su aa yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams nas de'i steng du h'um yig rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang tho rangs rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dbus su aa yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams nas de'i steng du h'um yig rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: “At dawn, having visualized in one’s heart an A-syllable in the middle of a moon, one should visualize a moon-disk, and on top of that a Hum-syllable.

original: de nas byams pa'i sems byas nas //
analyzed: de nas byams pa'i sems byas nas //
translated: Then, having generated a mind of love,

original: phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: one should later draw the mandala.

original: zhes pa'i cho gas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gnas dgod pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa'i cho gas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gnas dgod pas so //
translated: ” By the rite of that, one should arrange the places of the dakinis, etc.

original: de bzhin du kun spyod du /
analyzed: de bzhin du kun spyod du /
translated: In the same way, in the Carya-tantra:

original: mkha' 'gro de bzhin l'a ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro de bzhin l'a ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
translated: “Dakini, Lāmā, Khaṇḍarohā, Rūpiṇī,

original: padma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod //
analyzed: padma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod //
translated: are placed in the places of the lotus directions.

original: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed ma //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed ma //
translated: They accomplish all powers.🔽”

original: zhal gcig ma la phyag gnyis ma //
analyzed: zhal gcig ma la phyag gnyis ma //
translated: One face, two arms,

original: sna tshogs gzugs can rnam sgeg ma //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can rnam sgeg ma //
translated: various forms, very playful,

original: phyogs bral gyi ni bzhi po la //
analyzed: phyogs bral gyi ni bzhi po la //
translated: in the four directions,

original: lnga yis gang ba'i thod pa nyid //
analyzed: lnga yis gang ba'i thod pa nyid //
translated: the skull-cup filled with the five.

original: sum yig la sogs yang dag sbyar //
analyzed: sum yig la sogs yang dag sbyar //
translated: The syllable sum and so forth are applied.

original: yul dang yul du rnam gnas pa //
analyzed: yul dang yul du rnam gnas pa //
translated: Abiding in the various places,

original: drangs pa 'khor lo'i snying por gnas //
analyzed: drangs pa 'khor lo'i snying por gnas //
translated: the drawn one abides in the center of the wheel.

original: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod //
translated: The yogin who knows should always worship.

original: ces so // da ni mngon par brjod pa bla mar gsungs pa'i dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro la sogs pa bsgom pa brjod par bya ste 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ces so // da ni mngon par brjod pa bla mar gsungs pa'i dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro la sogs pa bsgom pa brjod par bya ste 'di lta ste /
translated: Now, one should explain the meditation on the dakinis of the commitments and so forth, which are taught in the supreme speech of the tantra.

original: dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the previous mandala,

original: padma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya //
analyzed: padma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya //
translated: one should draw an eight-petaled lotus,

original: sna tshogs kha dog ge sar ldan //
analyzed: sna tshogs kha dog ge sar ldan //
translated: with a multicolored pistil,

original: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab sbyin //🔽de la dbus su h'um yig ni //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab sbyin // de la dbus su h'um yig ni //
translated: granting all desired results.🔽In the center of that, one should meditate on the syllable hum,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya //
translated: as Vajrasattva.

original: bcom ldan zhal bzhi sngo dang ser //
analyzed: bcom ldan zhal bzhi sngo dang ser //
translated: The Bhagavat has four faces, blue and yellow,

original: dmar dang ljang zhal spyan gsum pa //
analyzed: dmar dang ljang zhal spyan gsum pa //
translated: red and green, with three eyes.

original: bcu gnyis phyag ste g-yas brkyang gnas //
analyzed: bcu gnyis phyag ste g-yas brkyang gnas //
translated: With twelve arms, standing with right leg extended,

original: 'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan mo //
analyzed: 'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan mo //
translated: trampling on Mahakala and Kalarati

original: zhabs kyi mthil @336b gyis kun du mnan //
analyzed: zhabs kyi mthil @336b gyis kun du mnan //
translated: with the soles of his feet.

original: dam tshig rdo rje phag mos 'khyud //
analyzed: dam tshig rdo rje phag mos 'khyud //
translated: He is embraced by Samayavajravarahi,

original: phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu'o //
analyzed: phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu'o //
translated: with two hands holding vajra and bell.

original: zhes so // de nas gzhan ni rab 'chang byed //
analyzed: zhes so // de nas gzhan ni rab 'chang byed //
translated: Then, the other one is called Pravara,

original: gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o //
analyzed: gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o //
translated: meditating on the mandala of speech.

original: dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the previous mandala,

original: gsung gi 'khor lo yongs bsgom bya //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo yongs bsgom bya //
translated: one should fully meditate on the wheel of speech,

original: rtsibs brgyad kha dog dmar po la //
analyzed: rtsibs brgyad kha dog dmar po la //
translated: with eight spokes, red in color,

original: padma snga ma de bzhin nang //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' yongs bsgyur bas //
analyzed: padma snga ma de bzhin nang // rdo rje sems dpa' yongs bsgyur bas //
translated: with a lotus inside as before.🔽Fully transforming into Vajrasattva,

original: gsung gi rdo rje yongs su bsgom //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje yongs su bsgom //
translated: one should fully meditate on Vaktrishvara.

original: zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //
analyzed: zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //
translated: With four faces and twelve arms,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par ro //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par ro //
translated: and so on, in detail.

original: de nas mchog sgrub pa'i cho gar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas mchog sgrub pa'i cho gar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, the rite of accomplishing the supreme will occur.

original: padma 'dab brgyad yid 'ong ba //
analyzed: padma 'dab brgyad yid 'ong ba //
translated: A beautiful eight-petaled lotus,

original: kha dog sna tshogs yid 'phrog par //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs yid 'phrog par //
translated: with various captivating colors,

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su //
translated: in the center of a sun mandala.

original: padma'i rgyal po rnam par bsam //
analyzed: padma'i rgyal po rnam par bsam //
translated: The king of lotuses, contemplated.

original: zhal bzhi pa phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa /
analyzed: zhal bzhi pa phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa /
translated: He has four faces and twelve arms, and is embraced by Vajravārāhī.

original: phyag gnyis kyis rtse mo lnga gdengs pa'i rdo rje padma dang dril bu'o //
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis rtse mo lnga gdengs pa'i rdo rje padma dang dril bu'o //
translated: With two of his hands he holds a five-pointed vajra and a lotus and a bell.

original: phyag gzhan gnyis kyis tshogs bdag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'chang ba g-yas kyi phyag rnams su mdung dang lcags kyu dang gri gug dang cang te'u g-yon rnams su kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang dgra sta rnams so //
analyzed: phyag gzhan gnyis kyis tshogs bdag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'chang ba g-yas kyi phyag rnams su mdung dang lcags kyu dang gri gug dang cang te'u g-yon rnams su kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang dgra sta rnams so //
translated: With the other two hands he holds the skin of Gaṇeśa. In his right hands he holds a spear, a goad, a flaying knife, and a small drum; in his left hands he holds a khaṭvāṅga, a noose, a head of Brahmā, and a battle-ax.

original: kha tv'am ga yang mchod phyir thogs kyi tshul gyis steng du rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa dang / dril bu rab tu 'chang ba ba dan gsum pas mtshan pa dbus su sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshon pa 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga yang mchod phyir thogs kyi tshul gyis steng du rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa dang / dril bu rab tu 'chang ba ba dan gsum pas mtshan pa dbus su sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshon pa 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: The khaṭvāṅga is held in the manner of carrying a shoulder-implement, with a five-pointed vajra at the top and a bell marked with three banners in the middle, and a single-pointed vajra at the bottom.

original: rgyu ma'i thod pa phyag tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu ma'i thod pa phyag tu gnas pa'o //
translated: The skull cup rests in his hand.

original: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i zhal phag mo dmar mos 'khyud pa /🔽dkyil 'khor phyi ru rnam pa lnga'i //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i zhal phag mo dmar mos 'khyud pa / dkyil 'khor phyi ru rnam pa lnga'i //
translated: He has faces of blue, yellow, red, and green, and is embraced by red Vārāhī.🔽Outside the maṇḍala, in the same way,

original: yi dags rnams kyis de bzhin bskor //
analyzed: yi dags rnams kyis de bzhin bskor //
translated: the pretas are surrounded by the five.

original: phyi ru dur khrod mi bzad pa //
analyzed: phyi ru dur khrod mi bzad pa //
translated: Outside, the charnel ground is terrifying,

original: kha dog sna tshogs mchog gi mchog / shing mchog sna tshogs kyis yid 'ong //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs mchog gi mchog / shing mchog sna tshogs kyis yid 'ong //
translated: with various colors, the best of the best, delightful with various excellent trees,

original: ce spyang bcas pas shin tu 'jigs //
analyzed: ce spyang bcas pas shin tu 'jigs //
translated: together with jackals, very frightening.

original: bya rog 'ug pa bya dkar rgod //
analyzed: bya rog 'ug pa bya dkar rgod //
translated: Crows, owls, white vultures,🔽jackals, likewise burnt corpses, skeletons, and spears,

original: ce spyang de bzhin ro bsregs dang // keng rus dang ni mdung gis phug /'phyang dang phyed tshig pa dang mgo //
analyzed: ce spyang de bzhin ro bsregs dang // keng rus dang ni mdung gis phug /'phyang dang phyed tshig pa dang mgo //
translated: hanging, half-burnt, and heads,🔽skull-cups, shanks, headless bodies, and heads,

original: mgo thod dang ni rje ngar dang // mgo med lag dang mgo bo dang // sbrul ni sna tshogs yid 'ong dang // mig sna de bzhin rnga bo che //
analyzed: mgo thod dang ni rje ngar dang // mgo med lag dang mgo bo dang // sbrul ni sna tshogs yid 'ong dang // mig sna de bzhin rnga bo che //
translated: various delightful snakes, eyes, noses, and likewise kettledrums,🔽lions, pigs, tigers,

original: seng ge phag dang stag rnams dang // ra dang lug dang de bzhin du //
analyzed: seng ge phag dang stag rnams dang // ra dang lug dang de bzhin du //
translated: goats, sheep, and likewise

original: glang chen @337a * //
analyzed: glang chen @337a * //
translated: elephants,🔽horses, and chariots,

original: rta bong ba lang dang // rnga mo sna tshogs dam tshig mchog / myos byed rnam pa sna tshogs nyid //🔽de bzhin chang gi btung ba mchog / dpa' bo 'dus pa bzang mo yi //
analyzed: rta bong ba lang dang // rnga mo sna tshogs dam tshig mchog / myos byed rnam pa sna tshogs nyid // de bzhin chang gi btung ba mchog / dpa' bo 'dus pa bzang mo yi //
translated: The supreme pledge is the various horses, donkeys, oxen, and camels, and the various kinds of intoxicants.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams sna tshogs mchog / thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin zhing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams sna tshogs mchog / thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin zhing //
translated: The supreme drink is the supreme liquor, the supreme assembly of heroes, and the supreme variety of yoginis.🔽Holding a skull and khaṭvāṅga, a flaying knife and a small drum,

original: gri gug dang ni cang te'u mchog / lha yi rol mo sna tshogs dang // bza' dang bca' ba ro yi mchog / rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud //
analyzed: gri gug dang ni cang te'u mchog / lha yi rol mo sna tshogs dang // bza' dang bca' ba ro yi mchog / rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud //
translated: the supreme divine music, the supreme taste of food and drink, and the supreme kiss and embrace of various kinds.

original: gzhib bya ba ldag bya ba mchog dam pa //
analyzed: gzhib bya ba ldag bya ba mchog dam pa //
translated: The supreme lick and suck.

original: rnam pa de lta'i dur khrod du //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta'i dur khrod du //
translated: In a charnel ground of that kind,

original: gnod sbyin ro langs srin po rnams //
analyzed: gnod sbyin ro langs srin po rnams //
translated: yakṣas, vetālas, and rākṣasas

original: zhes so // cha brgyad dkyil 'khor yid 'ong ba ;
analyzed: zhes so // cha brgyad dkyil 'khor yid 'ong ba ;
translated: The delightful maṇḍala with eight parts

original: /'bar ba dang bcas nyi ma mtshungs //
analyzed: /'bar ba dang bcas nyi ma mtshungs //
translated: is blazing, like the sun.

original: dkyil 'khor rdo rje rin chen gyis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rdo rje rin chen gyis //
translated: The maṇḍala is accomplished with the vajra and jewel,

original: shin tu dga' ba thug med sgrub //
analyzed: shin tu dga' ba thug med sgrub //
translated: producing infinite supreme joy.

original: ces so // da ni gnas brjod pas sgrub thabs brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ces so // da ni gnas brjod pas sgrub thabs brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the place will be described, and the means of accomplishment will be described.

original: 'di la bsnyen pa dang nye bar sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po ste yan lag bzhi gnas so //
analyzed: 'di la bsnyen pa dang nye bar sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po ste yan lag bzhi gnas so //
translated: This has four branches: approach, near attainment, attainment, and great attainment.

original: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po ste bzhi'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po ste bzhi'o //
translated: Yoga, subsequent yoga, total yoga, and great yoga are the four.

original: mngon par brjod pa bla mar yang //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa bla mar yang //
translated: In the Supreme Tantra of the Secret Goddess,🔽it states:

original: de nyid kyi ni snying gar bsgom //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ni snying gar bsgom //
translated: Meditate on that at the heart.

original: bsnyen pa rnal 'byor rab tu brtags //
analyzed: bsnyen pa rnal 'byor rab tu brtags //
translated: The approach is the yoga of the supreme.

original: mkha' 'gro ma tshogs dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma tshogs dkyil 'khor nyid //
translated: The mandala of the dakini hosts

original: nye bsnyen rjes su rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: nye bsnyen rjes su rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: is the near attainment of the subsequent yoga.

original: dpa' bo'i yan lag dgod pa yis //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i yan lag dgod pa yis //
translated: The yoga of the hero’s limbs

original: rnal 'byor gyis ni sgrub pa brtsam //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyis ni sgrub pa brtsam //
translated: is the attainment of the yoga.

original: dag pa'i bzlas pa grub chen gyis //
analyzed: dag pa'i bzlas pa grub chen gyis //
translated: The recitation of purity is the great attainment.

original: yan lag rnal 'byor chen po'o //
analyzed: yan lag rnal 'byor chen po'o //
translated: The branch is the great yoga.

original: zhes so // 'di'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: zhes so // 'di'i don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: dang po'i mgo bo'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar gnas pa ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' la dmigs pa rnal 'byor bsgoms nas sprul pa rnams kyis blang ba'i dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i sa bon yan lag dgod par byas nas thig le'i rnal 'byor dang phra mo'i
analyzed: dang po'i mgo bo'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar gnas pa ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' la dmigs pa rnal 'byor bsgoms nas sprul pa rnams kyis blang ba'i dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i sa bon yan lag dgod par byas nas thig le'i rnal 'byor dang phra mo'i
translated: Having meditated on the yoga of observing the concentration being in the heart of the gnosis being at the beginning of the head, having emitted the emanations, having placed the seed of the twenty-four heroes, one should perform the yoga of the bindu and the subtle.🔽

original: rnal 'byor dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi dag pa dang bzlas pa rnams so ;
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi dag pa dang bzlas pa rnams so ;
translated: Having cultivated the yoga of meditation on the gnosis-being in the heart of the principal deity, and the concentration-being in the heart of the gnosis-being, having placed the seed-syllable of the twenty-four heroes who are to be emanated, one should perform the yoga of the drop, the subtle yoga, the purification of the factors of enlightenment, and the recitation.

original: / gtor ma sbyin nas bdag nyid go bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: / gtor ma sbyin nas bdag nyid go bgo bar bya'o //
translated: Having given the sacrificial offering, one should don the armor.

original: 'dir nye bar sgrub pa'i yan lag la ji ltar gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa bsgoms nas mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir nye bar sgrub pa'i yan lag la ji ltar gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa bsgoms nas mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Here, the branch of near-accomplishment is as follows: Having meditated on the Bhagavān with one face, two arms, and so on, one should meditate on the maṇḍala of the assembly of ḍākinīs.

original: de nas @337b mtshan ma bcu gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor brjod par bya ste bla mar yang mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje ste mtshan ma brgyad la'o //
analyzed: de nas @337b mtshan ma bcu gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor brjod par bya ste bla mar yang mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje ste mtshan ma brgyad la'o //
translated: Then, the maṇḍala of the twelve signs should be explained: The ḍākinī is the vajra on the eight signs, and the guru is the lotus on the four signs.

original: l'a ma ni dril bu la'o //
analyzed: l'a ma ni dril bu la'o //
translated: Lāmā is the bell.

original: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma ni glang po che'i pags pa'i khu tshur la'o //
analyzed: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma ni glang po che'i pags pa'i khu tshur la'o //
translated: Caṇḍālī and Ghasmarī are the elephant-hide fist.

original: de bzhin du bya rog gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi mdung dang lcags kyu dang cang te'u dang kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang dgra sta dang sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan ma brgyad la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bya rog gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi mdung dang lcags kyu dang cang te'u dang kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang dgra sta dang sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan ma brgyad la'o //
translated: Similarly, the eight emblems of Kākāsyā and so forth are the spear, goad, small drum, khaṭvāṅga, noose, head of Brahmā, battle-axe, and vajra cross.

original: slob dpon bha bas kyang gsungs pa mkha' 'gro ma bcu po rnams ni bzhi dang drug ni dgra sta dang zhags pa dang mdung dang kha tv'am ga dang rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon bha bas kyang gsungs pa mkha' 'gro ma bcu po rnams ni bzhi dang drug ni dgra sta dang zhags pa dang mdung dang kha tv'am ga dang rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so zhes pa'o //
translated: Master Bhavabhaṭṭa also states: “The ten dakinis are the battle-axe, noose, spear, khaṭvāṅga, vajra, and vajra cross.”

original: ji srid ldog pa'i spyod yul du gyur gyi bar du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi don du me tog la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid ldog pa'i spyod yul du gyur gyi bar du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi don du me tog la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
translated: As long as one is in the domain of reversal, one should make offerings to the outer mandala with flowers and so forth for the sake of the accumulation of merit.

original: g-yon nas bskor ba'i 'jug pa'i phyag 'tshal ba dang po ming dang lhan cig sv'a h'a'i mtha' ye shes rgyas pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: g-yon nas bskor ba'i 'jug pa'i phyag 'tshal ba dang po ming dang lhan cig sv'a h'a'i mtha' ye shes rgyas pa'i don du'o //
translated: The first homage, which is performed in a counterclockwise direction, is together with the name and the end of svāhā for the sake of expanding wisdom.

original: kun spyod du yang /
analyzed: kun spyod du yang /
translated: In the Conduct too it is said:

original: gnyis med rdzas ni me tog sogs //
analyzed: gnyis med rdzas ni me tog sogs //
translated: The nondual substance is flowers and so forth.

original: me tog re re nas dbul bya //
analyzed: me tog re re nas dbul bya //
translated: Offer each flower.

original: zhes so // mngon par brjod pa bla mar yang //
analyzed: zhes so // mngon par brjod pa bla mar yang //
translated: In the Supreme Tantra of Clear Expression it is said:

original: ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi yis //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi yis //
translated: With the nectar of the five wisdoms

original: sa gzhi kun nas byug par bya //
analyzed: sa gzhi kun nas byug par bya //
translated: anoint the entire ground.🔽Scatter the flower of the perfection of patience;

original: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin me tog /'bad pas gtor te dbul bar bya //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin me tog /'bad pas gtor te dbul bar bya //
translated: strive and make offerings.

original: sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong ldan //
analyzed: sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong ldan //
translated: Endowed with the delightful seal of variety,

original: rgya che shin tu mnyam gzhag pas //
analyzed: rgya che shin tu mnyam gzhag pas //
translated: with vast equipoise

original: zhes so // rgyud mdor bstan par yang //
analyzed: zhes so // rgyud mdor bstan par yang //
translated: In the Tantra of Concise Illumination it is said:

original: shing skyes rdo 'am ras la yang //
analyzed: shing skyes rdo 'am ras la yang //
translated: On a piece of wood, stone, or cloth

original: gru bzhi khru yi tshad du ni //
analyzed: gru bzhi khru yi tshad du ni //
translated: the size of a cubit,

original: skra dang srog chags phra brtags nas //
analyzed: skra dang srog chags phra brtags nas //
translated: having examined the hair and small creatures,

original: sa la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
analyzed: sa la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
translated: draw the maṇḍala on the ground.

original: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: dngos po kun gyis zhes pa ni mkha' spyod la sogs pa gzugs yongs su bsgyur ba gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyis zhes pa ni mkha' spyod la sogs pa gzugs yongs su bsgyur ba gnas pa rnams so //
translated: “By all things” refers to those who abide in the transformation of form, such as the celestial realm.

original: rgya cher bshad pa sum cu rtsa drug par yang //
analyzed: rgya cher bshad pa sum cu rtsa drug par yang //
translated: The Thirty-Six-Fold Extensive Explanation also states:

original: grub 'dod shin tu mnyam gzhag pa'i //
analyzed: grub 'dod shin tu mnyam gzhag pa'i //
translated: The yogī who wishes for accomplishment,

original: rnal 'byor pas ni thun gsum bsgom //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni thun gsum bsgom //
translated: meditates in three sessions,

original: gtor ma dang ni sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: gtor ma dang ni sbyin sreg bya //
translated: with bali and fire sacrifice.

original: sgrub chen dus kyi khyad par las //
analyzed: sgrub chen dus kyi khyad par las //
translated: From the special time of the great accomplishment,

original: zhes so // bsgom par bya ni rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pas sam /
analyzed: zhes so // bsgom par bya ni rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pas sam /
translated: “Meditate” means to meditate on manifest enlightenment through the five aspects,

original: yan lag bzhis thun mtshams bzhir ro //
analyzed: yan lag bzhis thun mtshams bzhir ro //
translated: or through the four branches in four sessions.

original: yang yid la bzlas pa dang dam tshig btung ba yang bya'o //
analyzed: yang yid la bzlas pa dang dam tshig btung ba yang bya'o //
translated: Also, mental recitation and the drinking of the pledge should be done.

original: dran pa'i don to //
analyzed: dran pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of mindfulness.

original: @338a * // thun mtshams gsum ni kun du sbyor ba gsum gyi lus shes rab dang thabs su bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: @338a * // thun mtshams gsum ni kun du sbyor ba gsum gyi lus shes rab dang thabs su bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The three sessions are the body of the three fetters, which should be meditated on as method and wisdom.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa ni gcig tu 'dres pa'i dngos por bya'o //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa ni gcig tu 'dres pa'i dngos por bya'o //
translated: Union should be made into a single entity.

original: sbyin sreg ni phung po rnams so //
analyzed: sbyin sreg ni phung po rnams so //
translated: Fire sacrifice is the aggregates.

original: dus ni mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba yin no zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: dus ni mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba yin no zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
translated: Time is unchanging bliss.

original: da ni rgyun du gsungs pa'i mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rgyun du gsungs pa'i mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the worship that is always taught should be done.

original: snga bar mal las langs nas bshang ba dang kha bshal ba bya'o //
analyzed: snga bar mal las langs nas bshang ba dang kha bshal ba bya'o //
translated: Having first gotten up from bed, one should defecate and rinse one's mouth.

original: rang bzhin gyi kha dag pa'i don du ril bu khar gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi kha dag pa'i don du ril bu khar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of a naturally pure mouth, one should place a pill in one's mouth.

original: mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i ba byung gis so //
analyzed: mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i ba byung gis so //
translated: Having made a maṇḍala in front, one should worship with betel nut along with the five nectars.

original: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas ming med dang mthe bong kha sbyar ba dag gis 'khor lo'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das phag mo dang lhan cig pa mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas ming med dang mthe bong kha sbyar ba dag gis 'khor lo'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das phag mo dang lhan cig pa mchod par bya'o //
translated: With the nameless and the joined thumb, as taught, in the center of the maṇḍala, one should worship the Bhagavān together with Vārāhī.

original: de nas shar dang byang dang nub dang lhor gnas pa rnams la'o //🔽me dang bden bral dang rlung dbang du gnas pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: de nas shar dang byang dang nub dang lhor gnas pa rnams la'o //🔽me dang bden bral dang rlung dbang du gnas pa rnams la'o //
translated: Then, one should worship those abiding in the east, north, west, and south.🔽One should worship those abiding in the southeast, southwest, northwest, and northeast.

original: yang na phyogs gsum g-yas su bskor ba dang phyogs bral rnams su g-yon pas 'khor lo mtha' dag yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: yang na phyogs gsum g-yas su bskor ba dang phyogs bral rnams su g-yon pas 'khor lo mtha' dag yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: Or else, clockwise in the three directions, and counterclockwise in the intermediate directions, the entire wheel is perfectly complete.

original: yi ge brgya pa bton nas btud pa tsam gyis mdzod spur phyag byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi re kha dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge brgya pa bton nas btud pa tsam gyis mdzod spur phyag byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi re kha dbyi bar bya'o //
translated: Having bowed by merely reciting the hundred-syllable [mantra] and made obeisance to the ūrṇā, one should erase the lines of the maṇḍala.

original: mchod pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: This is the concise ritual of worship.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Next, I will explain🔽the supreme ritual action of the animal,

original: phyugs kyi las kyi cho ga mchog / gang gi rnam par shes tsam gyis //
analyzed: phyugs kyi las kyi cho ga mchog / gang gi rnam par shes tsam gyis //
translated: by merely knowing which

original: myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'o //
translated: one quickly enters into accomplishment.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas yi ge bdun pa'i las gsungs te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas yi ge bdun pa'i las gsungs te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Thus it is said, and so forth, the ritual action of the seven-syllable [mantra] is taught, just as the words [state].

original: sngags pas cho ga ldan byas nas //
analyzed: sngags pas cho ga ldan byas nas //
translated: The mantrin, having performed the ritual,

original: s'a li btags pa las byung phyugs //
analyzed: s'a li btags pa las byung phyugs //
translated: the animal that has arisen from the cooked śāli rice,🔽the donkey, human, tortoise,

original: bong bu mi dang rus sbal dang // rnga mo ce spyang rta la sogs //
analyzed: bong bu mi dang rus sbal dang // rnga mo ce spyang rta la sogs //
translated: camel, jackal, horse, and so forth,

original: kun du sna tshogs phag dag ni //
analyzed: kun du sna tshogs phag dag ni //
translated: and the various pigs everywhere,

original: dngos grub ster ba'i phyugs su bshad //
analyzed: dngos grub ster ba'i phyugs su bshad //
translated: are explained as the animals that bestow accomplishment.

original: ces te phyugs kyi skye ba bdun pa so sor bdun pa can no //
analyzed: ces te phyugs kyi skye ba bdun pa so sor bdun pa can no //
translated: Thus, the seven births of an animal are each seven.

original: bong bu ni bong bu'o //
analyzed: bong bu ni bong bu'o //
translated: An ass is an ass.

original: sna tshogs phag ni grong gi phag pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs phag ni grong gi phag pa'o //
translated: A pig is a village pig.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is literal.

original: des zos pa 'dis skye ba bdun pa shes pa dang rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes pa phan yon gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: des zos pa 'dis skye ba bdun pa shes pa dang rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes pa phan yon gsungs pa'o //
translated: By eating this, one will know and find the seven births. This is the statement of the benefit.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is literal.

original: mtshan nyid ji ltar 'gyur @338b ba dang // de rnams las ni rab 'chang byed //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ji ltar 'gyur @338b ba dang // de rnams las ni rab 'chang byed //
translated: How will the characteristics be?

original: nyon cig lha mo skal ba che //
analyzed: nyon cig lha mo skal ba che //
translated: Listen, goddess of great fortune,

original: rnal 'byor pa yi mnyes gshin ma //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yi mnyes gshin ma //
translated: beloved of the yogi,

original: skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis //
analyzed: skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis //
translated: one birth, two births,🔽three, four, five, and six births,

original: gsum bzhi lnga dang skye ba drug / skye ba bdun du 'gyur ba yang //
analyzed: gsum bzhi lnga dang skye ba drug / skye ba bdun du 'gyur ba yang //
translated: and also seven births,

original: de rnams phyugs su the tshom med //
analyzed: de rnams phyugs su the tshom med //
translated: those are animals, without doubt.

original: ces te / phyugs ni bong bu la sogs pa ste drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces te / phyugs ni bong bu la sogs pa ste drang ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, an animal is an ass and so on. It is the interpretable meaning.

original: de 'gro ba ma yin pa las bdun no //
analyzed: de 'gro ba ma yin pa las bdun no //
translated: From non-going, there are seven.

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //
translated: It is the definitive meaning.

original: gang gi dbugs ni dri zhim zhing //
analyzed: gang gi dbugs ni dri zhim zhing //
translated: Whose breath is fragrant,

original: mig mi 'dzum par nges pa lta //
analyzed: mig mi 'dzum par nges pa lta //
translated: One’s eyes do not close, and one is certain.

original: bden par smra ba'i mi de rnams //
analyzed: bden par smra ba'i mi de rnams //
translated: Those people who speak the truth

original: rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga' //
analyzed: rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga' //
translated: Always delight in the true Dharma.

original: bdag gi skye ba shes pa dang // rtag tu lus kyi dri ni zhim //
analyzed: bdag gi skye ba shes pa dang // rtag tu lus kyi dri ni zhim //
translated: One knows one’s own birth, and one’s body is always fragrant.

original: mtshan nyid de rnams ldan pa de //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de rnams ldan pa de //
translated: One who has these characteristics

original: skye ba bdun du gyur pa'i phyugs //🔽zhes so // 'di rnams bshad pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa ni bla mar yang /
analyzed: skye ba bdun du gyur pa'i phyugs // zhes so // 'di rnams bshad pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa ni bla mar yang /
translated: Is a wealthy person in seven lives.🔽The cause of these explanations is stated in the explanatory tantra:

original: 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mtshon bya //
analyzed: 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mtshon bya //
translated: “The yogin should be marked with these.

original: 'chi bdag me yis mi 'tshig cing //🔽srog chags gdug pa sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: 'chi bdag me yis mi 'tshig cing // srog chags gdug pa sna tshogs kyis //
translated: He will not be burned by the fire of the Lord of Death,

original: nam yang za bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang za bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And he will never be eaten🔽By the various poisonous creatures.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the union of the two organs,🔽One should offer to his hand

original: nye snying 'bum du bzlas pas kyang //🔽de nyid kyi ni lag par dbul //
analyzed: nye snying 'bum du bzlas pas kyang // de nyid kyi ni lag par dbul //
translated: One hundred thousand recitations of the quintessence.

original: sbyin pa 'di ni bdag la stsol //
analyzed: sbyin pa 'di ni bdag la stsol //
translated: “Please give me this gift.”

original: zhes so // de ni zos pa tsam gyis kyang //
analyzed: zhes so // de ni zos pa tsam gyis kyang //
translated: By merely eating it,

original: lha yi gzugs ni 'chang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lha yi gzugs ni 'chang bar 'gyur //
translated: One will assume the form of a god.

original: snying ga'i ro tsa na blangs nas //
analyzed: snying ga'i ro tsa na blangs nas //
translated: Taking the liquid from the heart,

original: gang la thig le byed 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang la thig le byed 'gyur ba //
translated: Whoever one does the bindu of,

original: sems can gang dag gang nyid kyi //
analyzed: sems can gang dag gang nyid kyi //
translated: that sentient being will become

original: de dang de yi gzugs 'dzin 'gyur //🔽skra 'am spu 'am rgyud ma yis //
analyzed: de dang de yi gzugs 'dzin 'gyur // skra 'am spu 'am rgyud ma yis //
translated: just like that form.🔽Having made a thread from hair, body hair, or sinew,

original: skud pa byas nas mgrin pa la //
analyzed: skud pa byas nas mgrin pa la //
translated: if one ties it around one’s neck,

original: bcings na sems can gang yin de'i //
analyzed: bcings na sems can gang yin de'i //
translated: that sentient being

original: mi de de 'drar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: mi de de 'drar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: will become just like that person.

original: de ltar thams cad yongs su shes nas //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad yongs su shes nas //
translated: Having understood all of that,

original: sngar brjod pa yi las rnams sgrub //
analyzed: sngar brjod pa yi las rnams sgrub //
translated: one should perform the rites that were previously mentioned.

original: ces so // des na de ni rang shi ba'i'o //
analyzed: ces so // des na de ni rang shi ba'i'o //
translated: Therefore, that is the rite of one’s own death.

original: rab tu zos pa ni zos pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu zos pa ni zos pa'o //
translated: “Having eaten” means having eaten.

original: sngar brjod pa mngon par brjod par gsungs pa'i las rnams bya ba'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //🔽mkhas pa shing lo'i khu ba ni //
analyzed: sngar brjod pa mngon par brjod par gsungs pa'i las rnams bya ba'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o // mkhas pa shing lo'i khu ba ni //
translated: “The rites that were previously mentioned” means the rites that were previously mentioned in the tantra.🔽“The wise one should take the juice of the leaf

original: ro tsa nar bcas blangs nas su //
analyzed: ro tsa nar bcas blangs nas su //
translated: together with the lac,

original: dpral bar thig le byas na ni //
analyzed: dpral bar thig le byas na ni //
translated: and if one makes a bindu on the forehead,

original: de gzugs 'gyur bar the tshom med //
analyzed: de gzugs 'gyur bar the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt that one will change into that form.”

original: ces te shing ni 'byung po'i skra'o //
analyzed: ces te shing ni 'byung po'i skra'o //
translated: “The tree” is the hair of the bhūta.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: phyugs rnams nyid kyi spu rnams ni //
analyzed: phyugs rnams nyid kyi spu rnams ni //
translated: “The hair of the cattle”

original: @339a * // lag dang spyi bor bcing bar bya //
analyzed: @339a * // lag dang spyi bor bcing bar bya //
translated: One should bind it to the hand and the head.

original: ljon shing yan lag lnga dang ldan //
analyzed: ljon shing yan lag lnga dang ldan //
translated: The tree has five branches.

original: mi de de yi gzugs su 'gyur //
analyzed: mi de de yi gzugs su 'gyur //
translated: That man becomes its form.

original: zhes te ljon shing ni skye ba bdun pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te ljon shing ni skye ba bdun pa'o //
translated: The tree is the one born seven times.

original: de'i yan lag lnga rnams su'o //
analyzed: de'i yan lag lnga rnams su'o //
translated: In its five branches.

original: dgongs pa'o // rnal 'byor goms shing bzlas par ldan //
analyzed: dgongs pa'o // rnal 'byor goms shing bzlas par ldan //
translated: The intention is that the adept, endowed with yoga and repetition,🔽even though a man,

original: mi ni nus par ldan yin yang //
analyzed: mi ni nus par ldan yin yang //
translated: is endowed with power,

original: dka' dang sdig pa la dga' de //
analyzed: dka' dang sdig pa la dga' de //
translated: but delights in difficulty and sin,

original: dngos grub lam ni 'gog pa yin //
analyzed: dngos grub lam ni 'gog pa yin //
translated: and is blocked from the path of power.

original: zhes pas sgrub pa po gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas sgrub pa po gsungs so //
translated: Thus he describes the adept.

original: rnal 'byor ni gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: Yoga is nonduality.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: shes rab thabs ni snyoms zhugs pa //
analyzed: shes rab thabs ni snyoms zhugs pa //
translated: The union of wisdom and means

original: mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan //
analyzed: mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan //
translated: is marked by the indivisible three vajras.

original: shes dang shes bya rdzogs gcig nyid //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya rdzogs gcig nyid //
translated: The one who is the perfection of the known and the knower

original: stong nyid snying rje gnyis su med //
analyzed: stong nyid snying rje gnyis su med //
translated: is the nonduality of emptiness and compassion.

original: dgongs pa'o // dka' ba ni dam tshig nyams pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa'o // dka' ba ni dam tshig nyams pa'o //
translated: The difficulty is the transgression of the commitments.

original: sdig pa la dga' ba ni mi dge ba bcu dang rtsa ba dang sbom po'i ltung ba la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: sdig pa la dga' ba ni mi dge ba bcu dang rtsa ba dang sbom po'i ltung ba la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: Taking pleasure in evil is to engage in the ten nonvirtues, the root downfalls, the gross transgressions, and so forth.

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnams kyang gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnams kyang gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
translated: The root downfalls are taught in the Black Yamari Tantra:

original: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
analyzed: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
translated: Do not disparage the master.

original: bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya //🔽de bzhin khros nas spun rnams la //
analyzed: bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya // de bzhin khros nas spun rnams la //
translated: Do not transgress the words of the Sugata.

original: nyes pa brjod par mi bya'o //🔽sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems //
analyzed: nyes pa brjod par mi bya'o // sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems //
translated: Likewise, do not speak of the faults of your vajra brothers and sisters out of anger.

original: nam yang nges par btang mi bya //
analyzed: nam yang nges par btang mi bya //
translated: Do not give up the attitude of loving kindness for sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems ni 'dor mi bya //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni 'dor mi bya //
translated: Do not give up the thought of awakening.

original: rang gzhan chos la smad mi bya //🔽yongs su ma smin sems can la //
analyzed: rang gzhan chos la smad mi bya // yongs su ma smin sems can la //
translated: Do not disparage the Dharma of self and others.

original: gsang ba nyid ni bstan mi bya //
analyzed: gsang ba nyid ni bstan mi bya //
translated: Do not teach the secret to those sentient beings who are not fully ripened.

original: bdag nyid phung po smad mi bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid phung po smad mi bya //
translated: Do not disparage the aggregates, which are the nature of the Buddha.

original: chos rnams ngo bo sun mi dbyung //
analyzed: chos rnams ngo bo sun mi dbyung //
translated: Do not denigrate the essence of phenomena.

original: gdug pa'i byams pa rtag tu spang //
analyzed: gdug pa'i byams pa rtag tu spang //
translated: Always give up harmful love.

original: chos rnams nyid ni bstan mi bya //
analyzed: chos rnams nyid ni bstan mi bya //
translated: Do not teach the Dharma to those who are not vessels.

original: dad ldan sems can bslu mi bya //
analyzed: dad ldan sems can bslu mi bya //
translated: Do not deceive faithful sentient beings.

original: rtag tu dam tshig bsten par bya //🔽shes rab rang bzhin bud med la //
analyzed: rtag tu dam tshig bsten par bya // shes rab rang bzhin bud med la //
translated: One should always rely on the commitments.🔽One should not disparage a woman,

original: skyon nyid kyis ni sun mi dbyung //
analyzed: skyon nyid kyis ni sun mi dbyung //
translated: who is the nature of wisdom, because of her faults.

original: zhes so // sbom po'i ltung ba yang grub pa'i slob dpon padma myu gu'i zhabs kyis //
analyzed: zhes so // sbom po'i ltung ba yang grub pa'i slob dpon padma myu gu'i zhabs kyis //
translated: The master of yoga Padmankushana says that the gross transgressions are:

original: sbom po'i ltung ba stobs nyid las //
analyzed: sbom po'i ltung ba stobs nyid las //
translated: The gross transgressions are from the strength of🔽attachment to the vajra queen,

original: rdo rje btsun mo la zhen dang // stobs las de yis byang chub sems //
analyzed: rdo rje btsun mo la zhen dang // stobs las de yis byang chub sems //
translated: from the strength of the bodhicitta,🔽from the strength of the rite of nectar,

original: dbang byed bdud rtsi'i cho ga dang // shin tu gsang ba mi sbed nyid //
analyzed: dbang byed bdud rtsi'i cho ga dang // shin tu gsang ba mi sbed nyid //
translated: and from the strength of not concealing the very secret.🔽From the strength of the assembly,🔽from the strength of the secret Dharma,

original: tshogs kyi 'dus pa rtsod pa dang // dad pa che las gsang ba'i chos //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'dus pa rtsod pa dang // dad pa che las gsang ba'i chos //
translated: from the strength of the great faith,🔽and from the strength of the dispute.🔽From the strength of teaching wrongly,

original: phyin ci log tu ston pa dang // nyan thos lhan cig nyin zhag bdun //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu ston pa dang // nyan thos lhan cig nyin zhag bdun //
translated: from the strength of seven days with a śrāvaka,🔽from the strength of constant companionship,

original: rgyun mi 'chad par 'grogs pa dang // rnal @339b 'byor mi shes rnal 'byor rgyags //
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par 'grogs pa dang // rnal @339b 'byor mi shes rnal 'byor rgyags //
translated: and from the strength of the pride of yoga.🔽From the strength of teaching the commitments

original: dad pa med la dam tshig ston //
analyzed: dad pa med la dam tshig ston //
translated: to one without faith,🔽and from the strength of the pride of yoga.

original: zhes so // de zhes pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang // sbom po'i ltung ba rnam pa dgu'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de zhes pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang // sbom po'i ltung ba rnam pa dgu'o //
translated: These are the fourteen root downfalls and the nine gross transgressions.

original: ni ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: ni ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
translated: The word “indeed” has the meaning of “because”.

original: dngos grub kyi lam 'grogs par byed pa ni de'i phyir spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi lam 'grogs par byed pa ni de'i phyir spang bar bya'o //
translated: Since it causes one to fall from the path of power, it should be abandoned.

original: gsungs pa yang ;🔽/ dmyal ba'i yi dags dud 'gro ru //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang ; / dmyal ba'i yi dags dud 'gro ru //
translated: It is also said:🔽“That which causes one to fall

original: kun nas ltung bar byed pa gang //
analyzed: kun nas ltung bar byed pa gang //
translated: into the hells, hungry ghosts, and animals,

original: de'i phyir ltung ba rnams su bshad /
analyzed: de'i phyir ltung ba rnams su bshad /
translated: is explained as a downfall.

original: mkhas pas de rnams yongs su spang //
analyzed: mkhas pas de rnams yongs su spang //
translated: The wise should completely abandon them.”

original: ltung ba las slong bar byed pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa /🔽bshad pa'i rgyud du yang /
analyzed: ltung ba las slong bar byed pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa / bshad pa'i rgyud du yang /
translated: The mantra for rising from a downfall is also taught:

original: aom shr'i buddha ka p'a li kam bu a'a h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i buddha ka p'a li kam bu a'a h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: “Oṃ śrī buddha kapālikaṃ bhuja aḥ hūṃ ḍākinī jālāṃvara hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.”

original: yang na rang gi ming bzlas pa yang stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na rang gi ming bzlas pa yang stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Or else, one should recite one’s own name thirty-six thousand times.

original: 'khor lo byas nas ji lta bu'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa las bla ma dam pa'i mdun du phyag byas nas ltung ba thams cad nges par 'dul bar byed pa'i gsang sngags gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo byas nas ji lta bu'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa las bla ma dam pa'i mdun du phyag byas nas ltung ba thams cad nges par 'dul bar byed pa'i gsang sngags gdon par bya'o //
translated: Having made the wheel, one should recite the mantra that definitely subdues all downfalls in the presence of a holy guru, having made prostrations.

original: slar yang bla ma la gsol ba btab pas dam tshig sdom pa blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: slar yang bla ma la gsol ba btab pas dam tshig sdom pa blang bar bya'o //
translated: Again, supplicate the guru and take the vows of sacred pledge.

original: bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste //
analyzed: bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste //
translated: I am ignorant and confused,

original: dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams //
analyzed: dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams //
translated: and have transgressed and damaged the sacred pledge.

original: bla ma mgon pos bdag skyabs mdzod //
analyzed: bla ma mgon pos bdag skyabs mdzod //
translated: Protector guru, please protect me!

original: gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
translated: The chief is the holder of the vajra,

original: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can //
translated: the embodiment of great compassion.

original: 'gro ba'i gtso la bdag skyabs mchi //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i gtso la bdag skyabs mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to the chief of migrators.

original: zhes pa the tshom med byas nas //
analyzed: zhes pa the tshom med byas nas //
translated: Having done that without doubt,

original: nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur //
analyzed: nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur //
translated: one will definitely become a master of spiritual powers.

original: zhes so // bla ma'i rgyud du bla mar yang //
analyzed: zhes so // bla ma'i rgyud du bla mar yang //
translated: In the Guru Tantra, the guru also says:

original: zhi bar 'gyur zhing skal bzangs nyid //
analyzed: zhi bar 'gyur zhing skal bzangs nyid //
translated: One becomes peaceful and fortunate.

original: rnal 'byor ma yis dbang yang bskur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yis dbang yang bskur //
translated: The yoginī also confers empowerment.

original: thun bzhi'i go rims bzhin du ni //
analyzed: thun bzhi'i go rims bzhin du ni //
translated: In accordance with the sequence of the four sessions,

original: phyi dang gsang ba'i chus bkru'o //
analyzed: phyi dang gsang ba'i chus bkru'o //
translated: one is washed with the outer and secret water.

original: zhes so // ltung ba las slong bar byed pa'i cho ga'o /
analyzed: zhes so // ltung ba las slong bar byed pa'i cho ga'o /
translated: This is the rite for rising from downfalls.

original: // / glang po rta dang rus sbal dang // rnga mo phag sogs ce spyang dang // bya rog 'ug sogs bya rgod sogs //
analyzed: // / glang po rta dang rus sbal dang // rnga mo phag sogs ce spyang dang // bya rog 'ug sogs bya rgod sogs //
translated: Elephants, horses, tortoises, camels, pigs, and so on,🔽jackals, crows, owls, and so on, vultures,🔽cranes, herons, hawks, and so on,

original: khrung khrung bzhad dang khra rnams dang // gzugs bzang gzugs ngan rnams kyis kyang //
analyzed: khrung khrung bzhad dang khra rnams dang // gzugs bzang gzugs ngan rnams kyis kyang //
translated: with good and bad forms,🔽all of them

analyzed: lha yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro // rnal 'byor chen po rang 'dod gzugs //
translated: become divine forms.🔽The great yogi becomes

analyzed: skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med // 'di las che mchog dngos grub ni //
translated: the form he desires, there is no doubt about it.🔽There is no higher attainment than this

original: 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin //
translated: in the three worlds.

original: 'jig rten can du 'gyur ba dang // @340a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten can du 'gyur ba dang // @340a * //

original: 'og min gnas kyi mthar thug pa //
analyzed: 'og min gnas kyi mthar thug pa //

original: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o //

original: zhes pas phan yon gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas phan yon gsungs so //

analyzed: 'og min na gzugs na spyod pa'i mtha' ste de'i mthar thug pa'i bdag po nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: In Akaniṣṭha, he becomes the lord up to the end of the form realm.

analyzed: sa bdun gyi dbang phyug yang 'jig rten pa can sgrub pa nyid las so //
translated: He also becomes a worldly being, the lord of the seven levels, through accomplishment alone.

original: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bsgoms pas ni dkyil 'khor mngon sum du byas pas kyang 'jig rten pa thams cad 'grub par byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bsgoms pas ni dkyil 'khor mngon sum du byas pas kyang 'jig rten pa thams cad 'grub par byed do zhes pa'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas su gsungs pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas su gsungs pa //

original: 'dod par spyod pa'i dngos grub ni ;
analyzed: 'dod par spyod pa'i dngos grub ni ;

analyzed: / las kyi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya // ye shes phyag rgyas 'og min gyi //
translated: is accomplished by means of the karma seal.🔽By means of the gnosis seal, one becomes

analyzed: gnas kyi mthar thug bdag po nyid //

original: gzugs zhes bya'o kun mkhyen nyid //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya'o kun mkhyen nyid //

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i phyag rgya che //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i phyag rgya che //

original: ma nyams bsgoms pas bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: ma nyams bsgoms pas bsgrub par bya //

original: 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba nyid ;
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba nyid ;

original: / skye ba 'di la sa sangs rgyas nyid //
analyzed: / skye ba 'di la sa sangs rgyas nyid //

analyzed: ces so // de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyis phag mo yud kyis bsam par bya'o //

original: zung 'jug mnyam par sbyor ba las //
analyzed: zung 'jug mnyam par sbyor ba las //

analyzed: snang ba gsal ba las bde ba'i //

analyzed: go 'phang rtag tu mthong ba ni //

analyzed: de ni rgyal bas mchod par 'dod //

analyzed: nyer spyod lnga yi sbyor ba yis //

analyzed: myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur //

analyzed: 'dir ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //

analyzed: mngon sum 'gyur te the tshom med //

analyzed: dbang po'i dra lta'i 'jig rten du //

original: sems can kun don byed pa po //
analyzed: sems can kun don byed pa po //

analyzed: rus sbal lus ni skyong ba ci //

original: bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas chos //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas chos //

analyzed: lung ni lhag par rtog pas grub //

analyzed: phyi yi bstan bcos kyis ma sgrub //

analyzed: de nyid phyir na 'gro ba'i mgon //

original: bde ba che la yang dag brten //
analyzed: bde ba che la yang dag brten //

original: med pa'i chos can la ni chos //
analyzed: med pa'i chos can la ni chos //

original: skye ba 'di ni rab tu mthong //
analyzed: skye ba 'di ni rab tu mthong //

original: yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i //

original: sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed //
analyzed: sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed //

original: shes rab thabs gnyis snyoms 'jug pas //
analyzed: shes rab thabs gnyis snyoms 'jug pas //

original: chos dbyings kun du dmigs pa la //
analyzed: chos dbyings kun du dmigs pa la //

analyzed: thams cad stong par rab 'byung ba //

original: ye shes dag pa'i ye shes nyid //
analyzed: ye shes dag pa'i ye shes nyid //

analyzed: brgya phrag bco brgyad dbugs rnams kyis //

analyzed: 'gyur med skad cig gis zos pas //

original: zung 'jug rnam par sgom pa po //
analyzed: zung 'jug rnam par sgom pa po //

analyzed: gzhan don byed phyir sangs rgyas te //

analyzed: rtag tu snying rje can gyi stobs //

analyzed: skal ldan che ge zhes mthong ngo //

analyzed: rnam rtog thams cad bral las te // 'gro ba nam mkha'i mthar thug par //

analyzed: sems can don la rab tu 'jug / mthong ba'i yul la khyab pa ni // sprul pa'i ye shes su bshad do //

analyzed: lus dang ngag yid gsang ba ni //

analyzed: lhan skyes bsgoms pa rnams kyis thob //

analyzed: ston par byed pa yang dag 'byung //

analyzed: brag ca bzhin du yi ge med //
translated: is like an echo, without syllables.🔽Their bodies are like

analyzed: khyab dang gzugs med rtag pa med //

analyzed: rnam pa kun du gzhir gyur pa //

analyzed: gsungs pa las kyang /

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning.

original: ce spyang sha yis sreg blugs brgya //
analyzed: ce spyang sha yis sreg blugs brgya //
translated: A jackal, with meat as the burnt offering,

original: yang dag sbyin sreg byed pa'i mi //
analyzed: yang dag sbyin sreg byed pa'i mi //
translated: the person who performs the perfect burnt offering,

original: de ni ji srid 'tsho bar du //
analyzed: de ni ji srid 'tsho bar du //
translated: for as long as he lives,

original: lag tu dpal 'ong the tshom med //
analyzed: lag tu dpal 'ong the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt that glory will come into his hands.

original: ces te mi ni shar du mngon par phyogs pa'o //🔽yang dag pa ni rgyas pa can gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: ces te mi ni shar du mngon par phyogs pa'o // yang dag pa ni rgyas pa can gyi tshogs so //
translated: The man is one who faces east.

original: brgya ni brgyad lhag pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: brgya ni brgyad lhag pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The hundred is the group of the eight-plus.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The right is the complete.

original: 'ga' zhig myos byed dang ldan pa'i //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig myos byed dang ldan pa'i //
translated: The some is the one who is endowed with the intoxicants.

original: sha chen dag gis sbyin sreg byed //
analyzed: sha chen dag gis sbyin sreg byed //
translated: The great meat is the oblation.

original: sgrub po mchog ni thun gsum du //
analyzed: sgrub po mchog ni thun gsum du //
translated: The best adept is the one who is in the three periods.

original: ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar //
analyzed: ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar //
translated: The hundred and eight is the number of times.

original: ji srid 'tsho bar sa kun la //
analyzed: ji srid 'tsho bar sa kun la //
translated: The all grounds is as long as one lives.

original: spyod par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
analyzed: spyod par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
translated: There is no doubt that one will practice them.

original: de bzhin zla ba gsum steng du //🔽skad cig nyid la dbul ba 'jig / ces pa ni rtag tu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zla ba gsum steng du // skad cig nyid la dbul ba 'jig / ces pa ni rtag tu'o //
translated: The three months is the time.🔽The instant is the time.🔽The poverty is the poverty of the world.

original: spyod par 'gyur zhes pa ni rtag tu'o //
analyzed: spyod par 'gyur zhes pa ni rtag tu'o //
translated: The always is the time.

original: spyod par 'gyur zhes pa ni rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyod par 'gyur zhes pa ni rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: The practice is the practice of the victorious.

original: skad cig las ni stong thob pa la'o //
analyzed: skad cig las ni stong thob pa la'o //
translated: The instant is the time of attaining the thousand.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The right is the complete.

original: gsang sngags dus kun zlos byed pa //
analyzed: gsang sngags dus kun zlos byed pa //
translated: The mantra is the one who recites at all times.

original: de la btud ni yid ma yin //
analyzed: de la btud ni yid ma yin //
translated: The bowing is not mental.

original: lha rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: lha rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni //
translated: Having meditated on all the deities,

original: thun tshod gnyis su sbyin sreg bya //🔽de la mkha' 'gro ma rgyal srid //
analyzed: thun tshod gnyis su sbyin sreg bya // de la mkha' 'gro ma rgyal srid //
translated: one should perform the homa for two watches.🔽There, the dakinis will grant

original: stsol 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med //
analyzed: stsol 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med //
translated: the kingdom, without doubt, here.

original: rang gi lus ni 'di nyid kyis //
analyzed: rang gi lus ni 'di nyid kyis //
translated: With this very body

original: mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang thob //
analyzed: mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang thob //
translated: one attains the state of flying through space.

original: ces pa ni phan yon gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni phan yon gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the statement of the benefits.

original: dus kun ni spyod lam bzhi po thams cad du bzlas par bya zhing mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: dus kun ni spyod lam bzhi po thams cad du bzlas par bya zhing mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should recite and make offerings at all times, in all four modes of activity.

original: sngags ni gang la la zhig go //
analyzed: sngags ni gang la la zhig go //
translated: The mantra is any mantra.

original: lha ni mkha' 'gro lnga la sogs pa'i sngags te mngon brjod du gsungs pa rtogs par bya'o //🔽aom badzra d'a ka dam h'um phat /
analyzed: lha ni mkha' 'gro lnga la sogs pa'i sngags te mngon brjod du gsungs pa rtogs par bya'o // aom badzra d'a ka dam h'um phat /
translated: The deity is the mantra of the five dakinis and so forth, which should be understood from the expressions [chapter of the tantra].🔽Om vajra dakini hum phat.

original: aom buddha d'a ka nyam h'um phat /🔽aom ratna d'a ka h'um phat /
analyzed: aom buddha d'a ka nyam h'um phat / aom ratna d'a ka h'um phat /
translated: Om buddha dakini hum phat.🔽Om ratna dakini hum phat.

original: aom padma d'a ka nam h'um phat /
analyzed: aom padma d'a ka nam h'um phat /
translated: Om padma dakini hum phat.

original: aom bi shva d'a ka mam h'um phat /🔽nye ba'i @342a * //
analyzed: aom bi shva d'a ka mam h'um phat / nye ba'i @342a * //
translated: Om karma dakini hum phat.

original: snying po lnga ste thams cad gcig kho na'o zhes so //
analyzed: snying po lnga ste thams cad gcig kho na'o zhes so //
translated: The five quintessence mantras are all the same.

original: rgyal srid ni 'byor ba'o //
analyzed: rgyal srid ni 'byor ba'o //
translated: The kingdom is the wealth.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: mchod la brtson pas mchod par 'gyur //
analyzed: mchod la brtson pas mchod par 'gyur //
translated: By striving in worship, one becomes worshipped.

original: bzlas la brtson pas rnam par dag / me la sbyin sreg brtson pas 'byor //
analyzed: bzlas la brtson pas rnam par dag / me la sbyin sreg brtson pas 'byor //
translated: By striving in recitation, one becomes pure. By striving in fire sacrifice, one becomes wealthy.

original: bsam gtan brtson pas thar pa thob //
analyzed: bsam gtan brtson pas thar pa thob //
translated: By striving in meditation, one attains liberation.

original: ces so // rang gi lus ni mchog tu bde ba lus med pa 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: ces so // rang gi lus ni mchog tu bde ba lus med pa 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: One's own body is the supreme bliss, the bodyless clear light.

original: 'di nyid kyis ni skye ba 'di nyid do //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis ni skye ba 'di nyid do //
translated: This very thing is this very birth.

original: mkha' spyod ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: mkha' spyod ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o //
translated: The celestial is the movement in the sky.

original: go 'phang ni sangs rgyas nyid rtag pa'o //
analyzed: go 'phang ni sangs rgyas nyid rtag pa'o //
translated: The state is the permanence of buddhahood.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: go 'phang rtag pa 'gro gsum du //
analyzed: go 'phang rtag pa 'gro gsum du //
translated: The permanent state is in the three movements.

original: mi rtag go 'phang kun du'o //
analyzed: mi rtag go 'phang kun du'o //
translated: The impermanent state is everywhere.

original: thob par 'gyur ni las kyi lus can no //
analyzed: thob par 'gyur ni las kyi lus can no //
translated: One attains the body of karma.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //🔽ce spyang sha dang myos byed kyi //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o // ce spyang sha dang myos byed kyi //
translated: This is the literal meaning explanation.🔽By the external and internal fire sacrifice

original: phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis //
translated: of jackal meat and intoxicants,

original: las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya //
translated: one should accomplish all actions.

original: sgrub pos rgyud du brjod pa yis //
analyzed: sgrub pos rgyud du brjod pa yis //
translated: The adept should do it as described in the tantras.

original: zhes pa ste ce spyang ni ce spyang ngo ;
analyzed: zhes pa ste ce spyang ni ce spyang ngo ;
translated: The jackal is the jackal.

original: / las thams cad ni zhi ba can la sogs pa brgyad dngos grub chen po rnams so //
analyzed: / las thams cad ni zhi ba can la sogs pa brgyad dngos grub chen po rnams so //
translated: All actions are the eight beginning with the pacifying, the great powers.🔽By means of the fire sacrifice, one should accomplish the oblation into the hearth with the ladle, etc., and also with the hand.

original: sbyin sreg gis ni thab tu dong lta bar yang blugs gzar la sogs pas dang lag pas kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: sbyin sreg gis ni thab tu dong lta bar yang blugs gzar la sogs pas dang lag pas kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
translated: The definitive meaning is this.

original: goo zhes pa dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: goo zhes pa dbang po rnams so //
translated: The GOU is the senses.

original: sha ni gsungs pa yang //
analyzed: sha ni gsungs pa yang //
translated: The SHA is said to be the speech.

original: m'am zhes m'a ma k'ir rab brjod //
analyzed: m'am zhes m'a ma k'ir rab brjod //
translated: The MA is well known as Mamaki.

original: sa zhes rdzogs pa'i byang chub gsal //
analyzed: sa zhes rdzogs pa'i byang chub gsal //
translated: The SA is the illumination of perfect enlightenment.🔽The intention is this.

original: dgongs pa'o // myos ni lhan cig skyes dga'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa'o // myos ni lhan cig skyes dga'o //
translated: The intoxication is the innate joy.

original: sogs pa'i sgra las dga' ba gsum po rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra las dga' ba gsum po rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: The word “etc.” includes the three joys that are the cause.

original: sbyin sreg gis ni lhan cig skyes pa stong pa bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: sbyin sreg gis ni lhan cig skyes pa stong pa bsgoms pas so //
translated: By means of the fire sacrifice, one should meditate on the innate emptiness.

original: nang gi zhes pa thams cad stong pa bde ba la'o //
analyzed: nang gi zhes pa thams cad stong pa bde ba la'o //
translated: The “inner” is in the bliss of the emptiness of all.

original: phyi dang zhes pa kun rdzob kyi bden pas so //
analyzed: phyi dang zhes pa kun rdzob kyi bden pas so //
translated: The “outer” is by means of the conventional truth.

original: las rnams thams cad ces pa 'gro ba'i don byed pa sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad ces pa 'gro ba'i don byed pa sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: All actions are the buddhahood that acts for the welfare of the world.

original: gsungs pa yang sangs rgyas nyid ni ye shes dang thugs rje dang nus par bstan pa don gnyis mkhyen pa'o zhes te nges pa'i don to //🔽rgyud du ni shes rab dang thabs dag gis gzhung yang dag par spel ba rnams su ste der rgyal bas gsal bar byed pa rnams ni 'dus pa phyi ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang rnal 'byor ma'i @342b rgyud rnams kyang ste
analyzed: gsungs pa yang sangs rgyas nyid ni ye shes dang thugs rje dang nus par bstan pa don gnyis mkhyen pa'o zhes te nges pa'i don to // rgyud du ni shes rab dang thabs dag gis gzhung yang dag par spel ba rnams su ste der rgyal bas gsal bar byed pa rnams ni 'dus pa phyi ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang rnal 'byor ma'i @342b rgyud rnams kyang ste
translated: The statement “Buddhahood is the knowledge of the two aims” is the definitive meaning.🔽In the tantras, the Victor’s elucidations in the texts that spread the teachings through wisdom and method are the twenty-four yogin tantras, such as the Later Guhyasamāja, and the yoginī tantras.

original: dpal he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par brjod pa bla ma dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang / kun spyod dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / ri gi aa rilli dang rdo rje aa ralli dang dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa dang /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par brjod pa bla ma dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang / kun spyod dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / ri gi aa rilli dang rdo rje aa ralli dang dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa dang /

original: rig pa rgya mtsho dang / gsang ba rgya mtsho dang / ral pa gyen brdzes phyi ma dang kha sbyor 'byung ba'i rgyud rnams su rtogs par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa rgya mtsho dang / gsang ba rgya mtsho dang / ral pa gyen brdzes phyi ma dang kha sbyor 'byung ba'i rgyud rnams su rtogs par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: One should understand in the Ocean of Spells Tantra, the Ocean of Secrets Tantra, the Subsequent Crest-Jewel Tantra, and the Tantra of the Arisen Union.  Thus it is literal.

original: da ni thab gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni thab gsungs pa /
translated: Now he speaks of the hearth:

original: zhi la thab khung zlum po ru //
analyzed: zhi la thab khung zlum po ru //
translated: In a hearth that is round for pacification,

original: sgrub pos sbyin sreg bya ba yin //
analyzed: sgrub pos sbyin sreg bya ba yin //
translated: the adept should perform the burnt offering.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: And so forth.

original: rdo rje a'a rallir yang nges par bstan pa /
analyzed: rdo rje a'a rallir yang nges par bstan pa /
translated: It is also taught in the Vajra Ārali:

original: khru gang ba yi tshad tsam la //🔽sngags pas khru phyed brkos par bya //
analyzed: khru gang ba yi tshad tsam la // sngags pas khru phyed brkos par bya //
translated: The size should be one cubit,🔽the adept should dig it half a cubit.

original: mkhas pas shin tu dkar ba yis //
analyzed: mkhas pas shin tu dkar ba yis //
translated: The wise one should make the hearth

original: rdul tshon ldan pas thab khung bya //
analyzed: rdul tshon ldan pas thab khung bya //
translated: with white clay and colored powders.🔽There, with the mantra taught, one should perform the burnt offering

original: der ni sha la sogs pa dang // gsungs pa'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: der ni sha la sogs pa dang // gsungs pa'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya //
translated: with meat and so forth.

original: rang gi lha yi gzugs //
analyzed: rang gi lha yi gzugs //
translated: The form of one's deity

original: 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed yin //
translated: accomplishes all desired aims.

original: zhes so // 'dir thams cad du thab khung gi phyed kyi tshad brko bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // 'dir thams cad du thab khung gi phyed kyi tshad brko bar bya'o //
translated: Here, everywhere, one should dig to the depth of half the hearth.

original: thab khung gi drug cha ni kha khyer te thab khung gi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: thab khung gi drug cha ni kha khyer te thab khung gi rnam pa'o //
translated: The hearth is one sixth of the area of the fire-place, and has the shape of a fire-place.

original: thab khung gi bcu gnyis cha ni mchu ste thad kar 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: thab khung gi bcu gnyis cha ni mchu ste thad kar 'byung ba'o //
translated: The lip is one twelfth of the area of the fire-place, and is level with the fire-place.
