original: gang gi che rdul tshon du gyur pa de'i tshon dpangs nges pa med do //
analyzed: gang gi che rdul tshon du gyur pa de'i tshon dpangs nges pa med do //
translated: The height of the colors is not fixed for one who has the colors.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is just as the words [of the scripture].

original: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gru bzhi ru //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gru bzhi ru //
translated: The square [fire-place] is for the prosperity rite.

original: gsal la gzhu yi rnam pa ru //
analyzed: gsal la gzhu yi rnam pa ru //
translated: The bright [fire-place] is in the shape of a bow.

original: zur lnga yang dag bshad pa la //
analyzed: zur lnga yang dag bshad pa la //
translated: The five-cornered [fire-place] is explained as follows:

original: slar yang rnam par ldang dang bskrad //
analyzed: slar yang rnam par ldang dang bskrad //
translated: Again, the summoning and the banishing,

original: dbang la zur gsum pa yi thab ;
analyzed: dbang la zur gsum pa yi thab ;
translated: The subjugation [fire-place] is triangular.

original: / dgug pa la ni zur bdun du //
analyzed: / dgug pa la ni zur bdun du //
translated: The summoning [fire-place] is seven-cornered.

original: rmongs pa'i sbyin sreg zur drug tu //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i sbyin sreg zur drug tu //
translated: The prosperity rite [fire-place] is six-cornered.

original: rengs pa la yang zur brgyad la //
analyzed: rengs pa la yang zur brgyad la //
translated: The stupefying rite [fire-place] is eight-cornered.

original: thab khung mtshan nyid shes nas ni //
analyzed: thab khung mtshan nyid shes nas ni //
translated: Having known the characteristics of the fire-place,

original: de nas me la sbyin sreg byin //
analyzed: de nas me la sbyin sreg byin //
translated: Then one should perform the homa in the fire.

original: zhes so // 'dir thams cad du me tog dang gos la sogs pa las kyi rjes su 'brangs pas dkar po la sogs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // 'dir thams cad du me tog dang gos la sogs pa las kyi rjes su 'brangs pas dkar po la sogs par shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, in all cases, one should know [the color of the flowers, clothes, and so on] as white and so forth in accordance with the rite.

original: sngags ni mchog tu gsang chen la yang brjod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir 'dir mi brjod do //
analyzed: sngags ni mchog tu gsang chen la yang brjod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir 'dir mi brjod do //
translated: Since the mantras are not even spoken in the supreme great secret, they are not spoken here.

original: 'dir zhi ba la dkar po'i zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas sngon ma gtso ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhi ba la dkar po'i zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas sngon ma gtso ba'o //
translated: Here, in the case of pacification, the face is white and smiling, and the previous one is the principal.

original: thun dang po la'o //🔽dpa' bo @343a * //
analyzed: thun dang po la'o // dpa' bo @343a * //
translated: In the first session.🔽The single hero.

original: gcig pa yang rung ngo //
analyzed: gcig pa yang rung ngo //
translated: Also suitable.

original: rgyas pa la dkar po dang ser po mtshungs pa gnyis pa la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyas pa la dkar po dang ser po mtshungs pa gnyis pa la 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of increase, the two are the same white and yellow. In the second, there is change.

original: de bzhin du rengs pa la ser po rengs pa gsum pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rengs pa la ser po rengs pa gsum pa la'o //
translated: Similarly, in the case of immobilization, the yellow immobilization is in the third.

original: de bzhin du rmongs pa la ser po dang dmar por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rmongs pa la ser po dang dmar por 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, in the case of confusion, it becomes yellow and red.

original: de bzhin du dgug pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dmar po lnga pa la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dgug pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dmar po lnga pa la 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, in the case of summoning, the passionate red is in the fifth.

original: de bzhin du dbang la dmar po dang nag po drug pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang la dmar po dang nag po drug pa la'o //
translated: Similarly, in the case of controlling, the red and black is in the sixth.

original: de bzhin du gsang ba la nag po'i zhal bdun pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsang ba la nag po'i zhal bdun pa la'o //
translated: Similarly, in the case of the secret, the black face is in the seventh.

original: skrod par byed pa ni dkar po dang nag po brgyad pa la'o //
analyzed: skrod par byed pa ni dkar po dang nag po brgyad pa la'o //
translated: The one who causes expulsion is the white and black in the eighth.

original: bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa khro ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa khro ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: One should accomplish, with wrath.

original: yang na thun phyed pa'i dbye bas phye'o //
analyzed: yang na thun phyed pa'i dbye bas phye'o //
translated: Or else, they are distinguished by the division of the half-periods.

original: yang na thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye bas las rnams te snga ma'i thun mtshams la zhi ba'o //🔽nyi ma gung la rengs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye bas las rnams te snga ma'i thun mtshams la zhi ba'o // nyi ma gung la rengs pa'o //
translated: Or else, the rites are by the division of the four periods: pacification is in the first period,🔽enlargement is in the period of sunrise,🔽arrest is at midday,

original: nub par gyur pa la dgug pa'o //
analyzed: nub par gyur pa la dgug pa'o //
translated: attraction is at sunset,

original: mtshan mo phyed la gsang ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo phyed la gsang ba'o //
translated: and killing is at midnight.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //🔽dpal 'bras pa la sha dang ni //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o // dpal 'bras pa la sha dang ni //
translated: This is the literal meaning explanation.🔽The glorious Prasannapāda

original: au dumw'a ra'am aa shvadtha ni yam shing ngo //
analyzed: au dumw'a ra'am aa shvadtha ni yam shing ngo //
translated: and the Udumbara or Aśvattha are the sacrificial wood.

original: de nas gsang sngags grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas gsang sngags grub par 'gyur //
translated: Then the mantra will be accomplished.

original: zhes sreg rdzas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes sreg rdzas gsungs so //
translated: This is the statement of the sacrificial substances.

original: gsungs pa yang //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang //
translated: And it is said:

original: gsang sngags bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: gsang sngags bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: One will be successful by reciting the mantra.

original: cho gas bcu cha'i sbyin sreg las //
analyzed: cho gas bcu cha'i sbyin sreg las //
translated: By the rite, from the tenth part of the burnt offering.

original: zhes so // 'dir thams cad du dang por sngags bsgrub pa'i ched du yi ge gsum gyi gsang sngags kyi bdag po bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // 'dir thams cad du dang por sngags bsgrub pa'i ched du yi ge gsum gyi gsang sngags kyi bdag po bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Here, at all times, first for the purpose of mantra accomplishment, one should accomplish the recitation, burnt offering, and so on of the lord of the mantra of the three syllables.

original: de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gzhan bsgrub pa'i ched du dang por bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gzhan bsgrub pa'i ched du dang por bstan par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, the innate concentration and the other concentrations should be taught first for the sake of accomplishing the goal.

original: rnam pa gzhan du dngos grub med do //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du dngos grub med do //
translated: There is no success in any other way.

original: dpal dus kyi 'khor lor yang gsungs pa //
analyzed: dpal dus kyi 'khor lor yang gsungs pa //
translated: It is also said in the Shri Kalachakra:

original: sngags dang gzugs brnyan grub par srid pa gsum gnas su ni ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin //
analyzed: sngags dang gzugs brnyan grub par srid pa gsum gnas su ni ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin //
translated: “In the three worlds, nothing at all is accomplished without the accomplishment of the mantra and the image.

original: de yi rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag la gsang sngags gzugs ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: de yi rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag la gsang sngags gzugs ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: The king of those [mantras], the mantra of the image, is accomplished in the pure mind, which is free from stains.”

original: zhes pas // de bzhin du srog gi rlung rdo rje bzlas pa'am ma ning gi bzlas pas sam srog rtsol la sogs pas las rab 'byam gyi don du dbu mar rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas // de bzhin du srog gi rlung rdo rje bzlas pa'am ma ning gi bzlas pas sam srog rtsol la sogs pas las rab 'byam gyi don du dbu mar rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Thus, by the vajra repetition of the life-force wind, or by the neuter repetition, or by the life-force control, and so forth, one should enter the central channel for the sake of the various activities.

original: srog gis bsgrubs pa las rnam pa gzhan du las grub pa med do zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: srog gis bsgrubs pa las rnam pa gzhan du las grub pa med do zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: It is certain that there is no accomplishment of activities in any other way than by the life-force.

original: gsal lo sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
analyzed: gsal lo sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
translated: The ritual of the fire offering is clear.

original: de nas 'dis ni ye shes kyi //
analyzed: de nas 'dis ni ye shes kyi //
translated: Then, by this, the wisdom

original: 'khor lo dgug pa mchog @343b 'chad byed //
analyzed: 'khor lo dgug pa mchog @343b 'chad byed //
translated: The summoning of the wheel is explained as supreme.

original: phyag rgyas bcing dang lag par dgod //
analyzed: phyag rgyas bcing dang lag par dgod //
translated: Binding with the seal, placing in the hand,

original: de nas yan lag dgod pa sogs //
analyzed: de nas yan lag dgod pa sogs //
translated: then the placement of the limbs, and so forth,

original: dpral drug mnyam par spror ba yis //
analyzed: dpral drug mnyam par spror ba yis //
translated: with the equal distribution of the six on the forehead,

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
translated: binds the net of dakinis.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa mdor ston te dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pa la sogs pas rab tu gzhug par bya'o zhes pa yang na'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa mdor ston te dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pa la sogs pas rab tu gzhug par bya'o zhes pa yang na'o //
translated: This and so forth briefly teach the summoning of wisdom and so on. After completing the commitment being, one should fully induct the wisdom being with JAH HUM BAM HOH and so on. This is the definitive meaning.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: The provisional meaning is as follows:

original: ye shes sems dpa' ni gzhon nu ma dang rab tu 'grogs pa'i khu ba ste /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' ni gzhon nu ma dang rab tu 'grogs pa'i khu ba ste /
translated: The wisdom being is the semen of intercourse with a young maiden.

original: de'i dgug pa ni srog la sogs pa'i rlung gi tshogs kyis byed do //
analyzed: de'i dgug pa ni srog la sogs pa'i rlung gi tshogs kyis byed do //
translated: Its summoning is done by the assembly of life-force and other winds.

original: spyi bor byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: spyi bor byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is said to fully complete the bodhicitta at the crown.

original: des mes zhu bar gyur nas thig le'i gzugs kyis mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang bar rab tu 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: des mes zhu bar gyur nas thig le'i gzugs kyis mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang bar rab tu 'jug par byed do //
translated: It melts by fire and enters the throat, heart, navel, and secret place in the form of a drop.

original: sa ni de'i bcing ba byed do //
analyzed: sa ni de'i bcing ba byed do //
translated: Earth binds it there.

original: chu'i khams ni lus la bsil ba nyid du byed do //
analyzed: chu'i khams ni lus la bsil ba nyid du byed do //
translated: The water element cools the body.

original: slar yang gnas de nas steng du bgrod pa'i don du rgyu mthun pa'i bde ba nyid do //
analyzed: slar yang gnas de nas steng du bgrod pa'i don du rgyu mthun pa'i bde ba nyid do //
translated: Again, for the purpose of ascending from that place, it is the cause of bliss.

original: spyan ma la sogs pas rdo rje'i glu rnams kyis rab tu rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pas rdo rje'i glu rnams kyis rab tu rtogs par byed do //
translated: Lochanā and so forth awaken it with vajra songs.

original: lte ba la sogs pa nas de lta bu la sogs pa rnams kyis bslangs nas bde ba chen po dri ma med pa nyid du gyur pas phung po la sogs pa sgrib pa med par byed do //
analyzed: lte ba la sogs pa nas de lta bu la sogs pa rnams kyis bslangs nas bde ba chen po dri ma med pa nyid du gyur pas phung po la sogs pa sgrib pa med par byed do //
translated: From the navel and so forth, those such as Tārā arouse it, and it becomes stainless great bliss. Thus, it makes the aggregates and so forth unobstructed.

original: de nas rnal 'byor pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang du 'gyur ro zhes pa des pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang du 'gyur ro zhes pa des pa'i don to //
translated: Then the yogi becomes omniscient. This is the meaning of the root text.

original: phyag rgya ste dra ba'i phyag rgya dang sdom pa 'chang bar byed do zhes pa rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya ste dra ba'i phyag rgya dang sdom pa 'chang bar byed do zhes pa rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The mudra is the holding of the net mudra and the vow.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning explanation.

original: sdong po la ni rdo rje sems //🔽lcug mar rnam par snang mdzad gnas //
analyzed: sdong po la ni rdo rje sems // lcug mar rnam par snang mdzad gnas //
translated: On the trunk is Vajrasattva,🔽and on the branches is Vairocana.

original: padma gar dpang gung mo la //
analyzed: padma gar dpang gung mo la //
translated: On the middle finger of the lotus is Acala,

original: he ru ka ni ming med gnas //
analyzed: he ru ka ni ming med gnas //
translated: and on the ring finger is Heruka.

original: mtha' la nam mkha'i snying po yang //
analyzed: mtha' la nam mkha'i snying po yang //
translated: On the tips are Akshobhya and Amoghasiddhi,

original: rta mgrin lag pa'i mthil du'o //🔽dpal mo chos sogs pho nya mo //
analyzed: rta mgrin lag pa'i mthil du'o // dpal mo chos sogs pho nya mo //
translated: and on the palms is Kshitigarbha.🔽On the left hand is Hayagriva,

original: lag pa g-yon par de bzhin gnas //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon par de bzhin gnas //
translated: and on the left palm is Shri Dharma and so forth.

original: zhes te lag pa la dgod pa gzhan rgyas par 'chad do //🔽lag pa g-yas pa la ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //🔽mdzub mo lcags sgrog lta bur sbrel //
analyzed: zhes te lag pa la dgod pa gzhan rgyas par 'chad do // lag pa g-yas pa la ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o // mdzub mo lcags sgrog lta bur sbrel //
translated: This is the explanation of the placement on the hands.🔽On the right hand, the middle finger is extended like a hook,

original: 'og tu mthe bong nges par sbyar //
analyzed: 'og tu mthe bong nges par sbyar //
translated: the thumb is bent,

original: gung mo dag ni kha ba ltar bya //
analyzed: gung mo dag ni kha ba ltar bya //
translated: the index finger and ring finger are like a hook,

original: ming med la sogs rab tu brkyang //
analyzed: ming med la sogs rab tu brkyang //
translated: and the little finger and so forth are extended.

original: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya mgor bzhag nas //🔽rkang pa gcig @344a * //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya mgor bzhag nas // rkang pa gcig @344a * //
translated: Placing the blazing mudra on the head,🔽one should look upward,

original: mnan gyen du blta //
analyzed: mnan gyen du blta //
translated: pressing down with one foot.

original: kun du bskor zhing rnam bskor bas //
analyzed: kun du bskor zhing rnam bskor bas //
translated: Having completely surrounded and turned,

original: de nas phem yig bsgrag par bya //
analyzed: de nas phem yig bsgrag par bya //
translated: then one should shout the syllable pheṃ.

original: ye shes 'khor lo mnyam bkug nas //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo mnyam bkug nas //
translated: Having summoned the gnosis wheel into the presence,

original: dam tshig 'khor lor rab gzhug bya //
analyzed: dam tshig 'khor lor rab gzhug bya //
translated: one should introduce it into the commitment wheel.

original: zhes pas phyag rgya rgyas par bstan no //
analyzed: zhes pas phyag rgya rgyas par bstan no //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of the seal.

original: dam tshig de nyid ni rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor chen po gang yang rung bas rdzogs pa ste phyi rol du byis pa skyes pa tsam ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes su brjod par bya'o //🔽dpa' drug mnyam par sbyor ba ni //
analyzed: dam tshig de nyid ni rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor chen po gang yang rung bas rdzogs pa ste phyi rol du byis pa skyes pa tsam ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes su brjod par bya'o // dpa' drug mnyam par sbyor ba ni //
translated: The commitment is perfected by any of the yogas, subsequent yogas, or great yogas.🔽The union of the six heroes

original: yan lag drug tu ji bzhin rim //
analyzed: yan lag drug tu ji bzhin rim //
translated: is the sequence in the six limbs.

original: zhes pa ni dang por yan lag dgod pa gsungs te gsal lo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dang por yan lag dgod pa gsungs te gsal lo //
translated: This is the teaching on the placement of the limbs.

original: 'byung mo drug mnyam sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'byung mo drug mnyam sbyor ba yis //
translated: The union of the six elements

original: go cha gnyis par bshad pa yin //
analyzed: go cha gnyis par bshad pa yin //
translated: is explained as the second armor.

original: phag mo pho nya gshin rje ma //
analyzed: phag mo pho nya gshin rje ma //
translated: Vārāhī, messenger, and Yama,

original: de bzhin rmongs byed skyod byed ma //
analyzed: de bzhin rmongs byed skyod byed ma //
translated: and likewise, the bewildering one, the moving one,

original: skrag byed gtum mo pho nya mo //
analyzed: skrag byed gtum mo pho nya mo //
translated: the frightening one, and Caṇḍālī, the messenger,🔽are the six heroes.

original: yan lag drug tu ji bzhin rim //
analyzed: yan lag drug tu ji bzhin rim //
translated: The six limbs are just so in sequence.

original: zhes pas go cha gnyis pa gsungs te gsal lo //
analyzed: zhes pas go cha gnyis pa gsungs te gsal lo //
translated: This explains the second armoring, clearly.

original: mgo bo sogs la rab gtum sogs //
analyzed: mgo bo sogs la rab gtum sogs //
translated: On the head, etc. , are Prachaṇḍā, etc.

original: pho nya mo ni nyi shu bzhi //
analyzed: pho nya mo ni nyi shu bzhi //
translated: The twenty-four messengers

original: cho ga gsum par bshad pa yin //
analyzed: cho ga gsum par bshad pa yin //
translated: are explained in the third rite.

original: sgrub pa'i phyir du rnal 'byor bdag / ces so //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i phyir du rnal 'byor bdag / ces so //
translated: For the sake of practice, the yogī

original: go cha zhal gyi dgod pa gsungs pa rnal 'byor pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po rnams kyis btags pa au yig gis rdzogs par sgom pa po rnams kyi kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag gis so //
analyzed: go cha zhal gyi dgod pa gsungs pa rnal 'byor pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po rnams kyis btags pa au yig gis rdzogs par sgom pa po rnams kyi kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag gis so //
translated: The explanation of the armoring and the arrangement of the faces is for the yogīs of lesser, middling, and greater [stages]. Those who meditate on the perfection of the syllable oṃ with the conventional and ultimate truths should meditate on Heruka in the manner of the limbs.

original: de'i phyir yan lag bzhin he ru ka bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yan lag bzhin he ru ka bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, Heruka should be meditated on in the manner of the limbs.

original: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa ji ltar ma ngal du lus rdzogs pa de bzhin du lha bskyed pa la dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsnyen pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa ji ltar ma ngal du lus rdzogs pa de bzhin du lha bskyed pa la dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsnyen pa'i yan lag go //
translated: Thus it is also said: Just as the body is complete in the womb, so the generation of the deity is the limb of the approach of the supreme king of maṇḍalas.

original: de bzhin du las rgyal po mchog nye bar sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du las rgyal po mchog nye bar sgrub pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the supreme royal activity is the near attainment.

original: thig le'i rnal 'byor ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: thig le'i rnal 'byor ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: The bindu yoga is the attainment.

original: phra mo'i rnal 'byor ni sgrub pa chen po ste ngag dang khu ba'i bde ba rdzogs pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: phra mo'i rnal 'byor ni sgrub pa chen po ste ngag dang khu ba'i bde ba rdzogs pa'o zhes so //
translated: The subtle yoga is the great accomplishment, the perfection of the bliss of speech and semen.🔽Now, the placement of the twenty-four letters beginning with pu in the inner🔽[series] should be stated by means of the wisdom and method [series],

original: da ni nang gi pu yig la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams kyi shes rab dang thabs dag gis gnas la sogs pa rnams kyi yi ge rnams gzhom du med pa dang zla ba dang thig les brgyan pa dag gi dgod pa brjod par bya ste
analyzed: da ni nang gi pu yig la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams kyi shes rab dang thabs dag gis gnas la sogs pa rnams kyi yi ge rnams gzhom du med pa dang zla ba dang thig les brgyan pa dag gi dgod pa brjod par bya ste
translated: adorned with the indestructible [drop], the moon, and the bindu, in the locations, and so on.

original: / mgo bor pum brtags pa rnal 'byor pas dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: / mgo bor pum brtags pa rnal 'byor pas dgod par bya'o //
translated: The yogī should place pu on the head.

original: de bzhin du gtsug tor du dzim mo //🔽rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du aom mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gtsug tor du dzim mo // rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du aom mo //
translated: Likewise, jjim is in the uṣṇīṣa.🔽Om is above the right ear.

original: mgrin pa'i rgyab tu aom mo //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i rgyab tu aom mo //
translated: Om is behind the throat.

original: rna ba g-yon pa'i @344b steng du gom mo //
analyzed: rna ba g-yon pa'i @344b steng du gom mo //
translated: Gom is above the left ear.

original: smin ma'i dbus su r'am ngo //
analyzed: smin ma'i dbus su r'am ngo //
translated: Ra or ṅa is in the middle of the eyebrows.

original: mig gnyis la dem no //
analyzed: mig gnyis la dem no //
translated: De is in the two eyes.

original: phrag pa dag la m'am mo zhes pa gnas dang nye ba'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: phrag pa dag la m'am mo zhes pa gnas dang nye ba'i gnas su'o //
translated: Ma or mo is in the shoulders, in the place and the neighboring place.

original: mchan khung gnyis su kam ngo //
analyzed: mchan khung gnyis su kam ngo //
translated: Ka is in the two armpits.

original: nu ma gnyis su aom mo //
analyzed: nu ma gnyis su aom mo //
translated: Om is in the two breasts.

original: lte bar trim mo //
analyzed: lte bar trim mo //
translated: Trim is in the navel.

original: sna'i rtse mor kom ngo zhes pa zing dang nye ba'i zhing gnyis su'o //🔽kha la kam ngo //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor kom ngo zhes pa zing dang nye ba'i zhing gnyis su'o // kha la kam ngo //
translated: At the tip of the nose, the two, Kom and Ngo, are the two, the cemetery and the adjacent cemetery.🔽At the mouth, Kam.

original: mgrin par lam mo //🔽snying gar k'am ngo //
analyzed: mgrin par lam mo // snying gar k'am ngo //
translated: At the throat, Lam.🔽At the heart, Kham.

original: rmig par him mo //
analyzed: rmig par him mo //
translated: At the navel, Him.

original: 'dun rtog dang nye ba'i 'dun rtog dag la'o //
analyzed: 'dun rtog dang nye ba'i 'dun rtog dag la'o //
translated: At the hips, Kham and Kham are the two, the cemetery and the adjacent cemetery.

original: rtags la prem mo //
analyzed: rtags la prem mo //
translated: At the genitals, Prem.

original: bshad lam du grim ngo //🔽brla dag la soom ngo //
analyzed: bshad lam du grim ngo // brla dag la soom ngo //
translated: At the anus, Gri.🔽At the thighs, So.

original: byin pa dag la sum mo //🔽rkang pa'i sor mo rnams la nam mo //
analyzed: byin pa dag la sum mo // rkang pa'i sor mo rnams la nam mo //
translated: At the calves, Sum.🔽At the toes, Nam.

original: rkang pa'i rgyab dag la sim mo //
analyzed: rkang pa'i rgyab dag la sim mo //
translated: At the heels, Sim.

original: rkang pa'i mthe bong dag la mam mo //🔽pus mo dag la kum mo zhes pa 'dus pa can dang nye ba'i 'dus pa can dang // dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod de bzhin no zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: rkang pa'i mthe bong dag la mam mo // pus mo dag la kum mo zhes pa 'dus pa can dang nye ba'i 'dus pa can dang // dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod de bzhin no zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
translated: At the big toes, Mam.🔽At the knees, Kum.🔽The twenty-four are the cemeteries and the adjacent cemeteries.

original: nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni kun spyod du /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni kun spyod du /
translated: In the chapter on the explanation,

original: lus kyi khams ni nyi shu bzhis //
analyzed: lus kyi khams ni nyi shu bzhis //
translated: the twenty-four elements of the body

original: dpa' bo rnams su btags pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams su btags pa'o //
translated: are designated as the heroes.

original: zhes te nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes te nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning.

original: mgo bo la sogs par dgod pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: mgo bo la sogs par dgod pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The ritual for placing the head, etc.

original: de nas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams rnam par sbyang bar bya ste de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas sa bcu gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams rnam par sbyang bar bya ste de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas sa bcu gsungs pa /
translated: Then, one should purify the stages and the ten perfections. The ten stages are declared by “thus, etc. ”

original: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
analyzed: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
translated: The stage is the Joyful One.

original: de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med //🔽zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya //
analyzed: de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med // zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya //
translated: The nearby stage is the Stainless.🔽The field is known as the Radiant.

original: nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phror bshad //
analyzed: nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phror bshad //
translated: The nearby field is declared as the Brilliant.

original: 'dun rtog shin tu rgyal dka' ba //
analyzed: 'dun rtog shin tu rgyal dka' ba //
translated: The aspiration is the Difficult to Overcome.

original: nye ba'i 'dun rtog mngon gyur nyid //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'dun rtog mngon gyur nyid //
translated: The nearby aspiration is the Manifest.

original: 'dus pa can yang ring du song //
analyzed: 'dus pa can yang ring du song //
translated: The assembly is the Gone Afar.

original: nye ba'i 'dus can mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'dus can mi g-yo ba //
translated: The nearby assembly is the Immovable.

original: dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros sa //
analyzed: dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros sa //
translated: The charnel ground is the Excellent Intelligence.

original: nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin //
analyzed: nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin //
translated: The nearby charnel ground is the Cloud of Dharma.

original: zhes te / gnas zhes pa phyi rol du gling bzhi'o //
analyzed: zhes te / gnas zhes pa phyi rol du gling bzhi'o //
translated: The stage is externally the four continents.

original: nye ba'i gnas ni nye ba'i blang bzhi po rnams so //
analyzed: nye ba'i gnas ni nye ba'i blang bzhi po rnams so //
translated: The nearby stage is the four nearby continents.

original: gzhan sngar gsungs pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan sngar gsungs pas shes par bya'o //
translated: The others should be understood from the previous explanations.

original: rab tu dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o //
translated: The Joyful One is the stage of the bodhisattva.

original: phyi rol du lus la spu la sogs pa gzhan la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du lus la spu la sogs pa gzhan la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Externally, the perfection of giving is the hair of the body and so on.

original: de bzhin du lus la pags pa dang sha ni dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lus la pags pa dang sha ni dri ma med pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the skin and flesh of the body are stainless.

original: ro dang chu rus pa dang rkang rtsa dang srog dus kyi me dang chags pa'i khams te ring du song ba sgra gcan dang nyi ma dang zla ba zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ro dang chu rus pa dang rkang rtsa dang srog dus kyi me dang chags pa'i khams te ring du song ba sgra gcan dang nyi ma dang zla ba zhes pa'o //
translated: The marrow, the sinews, the bones, the channels, and the life-breath are the fire of time and the element of passion, which are Dūrā, Rāhu, Sūrya, and Candra.

original: de ltar spu dang skra la sogs pa nas zla ba'i mthar thug pa sgrib pa med pa rnams sa bcur gsungs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar spu dang skra la sogs pa nas zla ba'i mthar thug pa sgrib pa med pa rnams sa bcur gsungs pa rnams so //
translated: Thus, the unobstructed ones from hair and nails up to the moon are said to be the ten stages.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is said:

original: mgon po @345a * //
analyzed: mgon po @345a * //
translated: The Lord

original: sa bcu'i dbang phyug ni //
analyzed: sa bcu'i dbang phyug ni //
translated: is the master of the ten stages.

original: 'di rnams don la gzhan mi gsungs //
analyzed: 'di rnams don la gzhan mi gsungs //
translated: He does not teach any other meaning than this.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And also:

original: dgongs pas pha rol phyin pa bcu //
analyzed: dgongs pas pha rol phyin pa bcu //
translated: The ten perfections are intended

original: rnal 'byor ma yi kla klo'i skad //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi kla klo'i skad //
translated: in the barbarian language of the yoginīs.

original: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che //
translated: The great yoga of glorious Heruka

original: dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g-yo'i bdag / ces te /
analyzed: dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g-yo'i bdag / ces te /
translated: is the firm and moving self of the hero’s limbs.

original: brtan g-yo ni khams bcur gsungs pa de nyid sgrib pa las dpal he ru ka'i yan lag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtan g-yo ni khams bcur gsungs pa de nyid sgrib pa las dpal he ru ka'i yan lag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The stability and movement are said to be the ten elements, which become the limbs of glorious Heruka.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa //
translated: The Blessed One also said:

original: lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
translated: “There is no other buddha who grants liberation apart from the body.”

original: zhes te dgongs pa'o //🔽kun nas phyag dang zhabs kyi mtha' //
analyzed: zhes te dgongs pa'o // kun nas phyag dang zhabs kyi mtha' //
translated: This is the intended meaning.🔽With hands and feet everywhere,

original: kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal //
analyzed: kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal //
translated: with eyes, faces, and heads everywhere,

original: kun nas thos ldan ting 'dzin ni //
analyzed: kun nas thos ldan ting 'dzin ni //
translated: with ears everywhere,

original: thams cad g-yogs te gnas par byed //
analyzed: thams cad g-yogs te gnas par byed //
translated: he abides pervading all things.

original: de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba //
analyzed: de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba //
translated: Then, for the sake of accomplishing spiritual powers,

original: rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis so //
translated: with a mind endowed with yoga,

original: sgrub po rnams la phan don du //
analyzed: sgrub po rnams la phan don du //
translated: for the benefit of practitioners,

original: de nyid 'di ru dper brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid 'di ru dper brjod do //
translated: that very [yoga] is described here as an example.

original: zhes pas sgom pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas sgom pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus, meditation is taught.

original: dang zhing gsal ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: dang zhing gsal ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: With a yoga of clarity and purity,

original: gzi brjid gzugs 'chang bsgom par bya //
analyzed: gzi brjid gzugs 'chang bsgom par bya //
translated: meditate on the form of splendor.

original: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zhes brjod do //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nyid mi slu ba sogs bde //
analyzed: de nyid mi slu ba sogs bde //
translated: That very [yoga] is blissful, non-deceptive, and so forth.

original: he ru ka dpal rab tu bstan //🔽bshad pa'i rgyud kyis rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal rab tu bstan // bshad pa'i rgyud kyis rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: The glorious Heruka is well revealed.🔽Following the explanatory tantra,

original: bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par bya //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par bya //
translated: one should understand from the guru's mouth.

original: bla mar yang /
analyzed: bla mar yang /
translated: And also with regard to the guru:

original: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar dmigs nas //
analyzed: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar dmigs nas //
translated: Visualizing one's own special deity,

original: de nyid gcig pu rnam bsam bya //
analyzed: de nyid gcig pu rnam bsam bya //
translated: one should think of just that alone.

original: zla drug tsam na nges par ni /
analyzed: zla drug tsam na nges par ni /
translated: In just six months, one will certainly

original: lkugs pa'i dngos por thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lkugs pa'i dngos por thal bar 'gyur //
translated: attain the state of muteness.

original: zhes te dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention.

original: sang se pa ra bstan pa'i le'u'o /
analyzed: sang se pa ra bstan pa'i le'u'o /
translated: This is the chapter on the teaching of the soundless.

original: // / de nas gzhan ni rab 'chang byed //
analyzed: // / de nas gzhan ni rab 'chang byed //
translated: Next, the one who practices well

original: 'dir ni de nyid bcu bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni de nyid bcu bzhi'o //
translated: here has the fourteen realities.

original: zhes pas bskyed pa'i rim pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mdo gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas bskyed pa'i rim pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mdo gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the sutra of the means of accomplishment by the stage of generation is stated.

original: gzhan las 'od gsal dang zung du 'jug pa las so //
analyzed: gzhan las 'od gsal dang zung du 'jug pa las so //
translated: From others, it is from clear light and union.

original: 'dir he ru ka'i rgyud du de nyid rnams ni dbang bskur ba rnams te ye shes kyi ched du'o //
analyzed: 'dir he ru ka'i rgyud du de nyid rnams ni dbang bskur ba rnams te ye shes kyi ched du'o //
translated: Here, in the Heruka Tantra, the realities are the initiations, for the sake of wisdom.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is literal.

original: gdan dang phyag rgya can dgod pa //
analyzed: gdan dang phyag rgya can dgod pa //
translated: The seat and the seal are placed.

original: shes rab yan lag gdugs phur bu //
analyzed: shes rab yan lag gdugs phur bu //
translated: The branch of wisdom is the parasol and dagger.

original: rab dang ni gur dgod pa //
analyzed: rab dang ni gur dgod pa //
translated: The excellent one is the arrangement of the tent.

original: de bzhin rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
translated: Likewise, the emptiness of cause, etc.

original: 'jug pa dang ni sgra tsam mo //
analyzed: 'jug pa dang ni sgra tsam mo //
translated: The mere sound of engagement.

original: a'a li k'a li sogs bsdus pa //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li sogs bsdus pa //
translated: The collection of ālikāli, etc.

original: dgug pa ye shes sems dpa' yis //
analyzed: dgug pa ye shes sems dpa' yis //
translated: The wisdom being summons.

original: gcig tu shes rab rjes chags pa //
analyzed: gcig tu shes rab rjes chags pa //
translated: The single one is the pursuit of wisdom.🔽The very one who satisfies with nectar.

original: bdud rtsis tshim par byed nyid dang // @345b 'khor lo chen po gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: bdud rtsis tshim par byed nyid dang // @345b 'khor lo chen po gshegs su gsol //
translated: The great wheel is requested to depart.

original: de nyid rnams ni bcu bzhi ste /
analyzed: de nyid rnams ni bcu bzhi ste /
translated: Those are the fourteen realities.

original: mdor bsdus pa nyid bstan pa yin //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa nyid bstan pa yin //
translated: The brief summary itself is taught.

original: zhes rgyas par bshad pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes rgyas par bshad pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the extensive explanation is stated.

original: gdan ni gnas la sogs pa las la gsungs pa'i khyim du 'am dge ba'i yul du sngar gsungs pa'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gdan ni gnas la sogs pa las la gsungs pa'i khyim du 'am dge ba'i yul du sngar gsungs pa'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The seat is in the place, etc. In the house spoken of in the action, or in the virtuous place, on the previously mentioned seat, one should practice sitting in the vajra posture.

original: bum pa la sogs mdun du'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs mdun du'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “in front of the vase, etc.” is that.

original: phyag rgya can ni 'khor lo can la sogs pa de rnams dgod pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya can ni 'khor lo can la sogs pa de rnams dgod pa'o //
translated: The one with the seal is the one with the wheel, etc. Those are the arrangements.

original: shes rab ni shing la sogs pa las byas pa'i rdo rje dril bu 'am kha tv'am ga la sogs pa dgod pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni shing la sogs pa las byas pa'i rdo rje dril bu 'am kha tv'am ga la sogs pa dgod pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is the vajra and bell made of wood, or the khaṭvāṅga, skull cup, and so forth.

original: bla mar yang /
analyzed: bla mar yang /
translated: The guru also says:

original: rtag tu mchog gi phyag rgya lnga //🔽cod pan thogs pa las byas pa //
analyzed: rtag tu mchog gi phyag rgya lnga // cod pan thogs pa las byas pa //
translated: Always wear the five supreme mudrās,🔽the head ornament, and so forth,

original: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
translated: the skull cup, and the khaṭvāṅga,

original: lus ni thal ba'i rdul dang ldan //
analyzed: lus ni thal ba'i rdul dang ldan //
translated: and the body smeared with dusty ash.

original: zhes so // yan lag ni der phung po la sogs pa dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // yan lag ni der phung po la sogs pa dgod par bya'o //
translated: The limbs are the placement of the aggregates and so forth there.

original: dam tshig gi ril bu khar gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi ril bu khar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: The pledge pill should be placed in the mouth.

original: rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod pa'i de ma thag tu gdug pa la phur bus gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod pa'i de ma thag tu gdug pa la phur bus gdab par bya'o //
translated: Immediately after reciting the mantra of natural purity, one should drive in the stake of Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can stong par bltas nas h'um yig las skyes pa'i 'do zer gyis kyis gdug pa rnams bsregs nas bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can stong par bltas nas h'um yig las skyes pa'i 'do zer gyis kyis gdug pa rnams bsregs nas bskrad par bya'o //
translated: Having visualized the outer and inner maṇḍala and so forth beforehand, one should burn and expel the obstructors with the light rays of the syllable hūṃ.

original: yang na gnod mdzes la sogs pas phur bus gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na gnod mdzes la sogs pas phur bus gdab par bya'o //
translated: Alternatively, one should drive in the stake with Sumbha and so forth.

original: de nas ra ba dang de'i 'od zer gyis gur dgod pa dang rdo rje'i sa gzhi yang bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ra ba dang de'i 'od zer gyis gur dgod pa dang rdo rje'i sa gzhi yang bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should meditate on the enclosure and the light-rays of the enclosure, and also on the vajra ground.

original: bla mar yang /🔽phyogs bcur srid rtse'i bar du ni //
analyzed: bla mar yang / phyogs bcur srid rtse'i bar du ni //
translated: The Guru says:🔽One should emit garlands of light-rays

original: 'od zer phreng ba spro bar bya //
analyzed: 'od zer phreng ba spro bar bya //
translated: up to the peak of existence in the ten directions.

original: de nas 'od des bltas nas ni //
analyzed: de nas 'od des bltas nas ni //
translated: Then, having seen with that light,

original: rab gur ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab gur ni de bzhin no //
translated: the enclosure is just like that.

original: zhes so // rgyu sogs stong pa nyid ni don dam pas bsrungs pa tshigs su bcad pas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // rgyu sogs stong pa nyid ni don dam pas bsrungs pa tshigs su bcad pas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The emptiness of cause, etc., which is protected by the ultimate, should be meditated on with a verse.

original: bla mar yang /
analyzed: bla mar yang /
translated: The Guru says:

original: chos ni nam mkha' lta bu ste //
analyzed: chos ni nam mkha' lta bu ste //
translated: The Dharma is like space,

original: chos min chos nyid kyang ma yin //
analyzed: chos min chos nyid kyang ma yin //
translated: not Dharma, not even reality.

original: nam mkha' lta bur gos pa med //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur gos pa med //
translated: Like space, it is unstained,

original: rang bzhin med cing gnas med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin med cing gnas med pa'o //
translated: without intrinsic nature, and without abode.

original: zhes so // de nas 'jug pa sgra tsam ni yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i bar ma chad par sems tsam gyi don la gnas par bya zhing n'a da tsam du rnam par brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de nas 'jug pa sgra tsam ni yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i bar ma chad par sems tsam gyi don la gnas par bya zhing n'a da tsam du rnam par brtag par bya'o //
translated: Then, the mere sound of the entrance, without interruption, up to the mental offering, should be made to abide in the meaning of mere mind, and should be imagined as mere sound.

original: de nas stong pa'i sngags brjod nas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas stong pa'i sngags brjod nas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, having recited the mantra of emptiness, one should meditate.

original: a'a li k'a li la sogs bsdus pa ni rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro bas khang pa brtsegs pa bsgoms nas rnam pa lnga las skyes @346a * //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li la sogs bsdus pa ni rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro bas khang pa brtsegs pa bsgoms nas rnam pa lnga las skyes @346a * //
translated: The summary of ālikāli and so on is that after the maṇḍala of wind and so on, having meditated on the kūṭāgāra, one is born from the five.🔽

original: pa'i dang po'i mgon po rnam par bsgoms te shes rab kyi chags pas zhu bar gyur pa lha mo'i glus rab tu sad par byas te sku la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro'i gzugs su rdzogs pa sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i dang po'i mgon po rnam par bsgoms te shes rab kyi chags pas zhu bar gyur pa lha mo'i glus rab tu sad par byas te sku la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro'i gzugs su rdzogs pa sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The summary of the Alikali and so forth is that, having meditated on the mansion with the prior mandalas of wind and so forth, one should meditate on the Lord of the First, born from the five aspects, and, through the passion of wisdom, melted, and awakened by the song of the goddesses, and complete in the form of the dakinis of body and so forth, with the nature of the three beings.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang glur gsungs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang glur gsungs pa /
translated: In the Vajradaka also, it is sung in the song:

original: aom ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva dza: h'um bam ho: su ra stvam zhes so //
analyzed: aom ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva dza: h'um bam ho: su ra stvam zhes so //
translated: Om, great bliss, Vajrasattva, ja hum bam ho, you are the hero.

original: de nas dgug pa ye shes sems dpa' yis ni snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug nas rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dgug pa ye shes sems dpa' yis ni snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug nas rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Then, the wisdom being, having summoned the wisdom wheel with the light of the seed in the heart, should be caused to enter.

original: de nas dbang bskur ni dbang bskur ba'i spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi dbang po bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur ni dbang bskur ba'i spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi dbang po bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, the consecration is the consecration of the head of the consecration, which should be cultivated as the lord of one's family.

original: he ru ka'i rnam pa la shes rab rjes su chags pa ni rang gi dbang bskur ba'i shes rab ma'i 'dod pa las mchod nas phung po la sogs pa dgod pa byas te rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rjes su chags par bya'o //
analyzed: he ru ka'i rnam pa la shes rab rjes su chags pa ni rang gi dbang bskur ba'i shes rab ma'i 'dod pa las mchod nas phung po la sogs pa dgod pa byas te rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rjes su chags par bya'o //
translated: The passion of wisdom in the form of Heruka is the worship of one's consecrated wisdom woman, who is desired, and the placement of the aggregates and so forth, which is done with the passion of the concentration of passion.

original: bdud rtsis tshim byed ni dam tshig skyong ba dang bstod pa la sogs byas nas /
analyzed: bdud rtsis tshim byed ni dam tshig skyong ba dang bstod pa la sogs byas nas /
translated: The satisfaction with nectar is the protection of the commitments and the praise and so forth.

original: gshegs su gsol zhes pa ni de dag bsdu bar bya'o zhes pa ste drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: gshegs su gsol zhes pa ni de dag bsdu bar bya'o zhes pa ste drang ba'i don to //
translated: The request to depart is they should be gathered, which is the interpretable meaning.

original: gdan ni 'dod pa lnga nye bar brten nas byed pa'o //
analyzed: gdan ni 'dod pa lnga nye bar brten nas byed pa'o //
translated: The seat is the performance based on the five objects of desire.

original: phyag rgya can dgod pa ni srog chags gsod pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya can dgod pa ni srog chags gsod pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: The placement of the seal is the performance of the union of killing living beings and so forth.

original: gdu bu srog chags gsod pa spangs //
analyzed: gdu bu srog chags gsod pa spangs //
translated: The bracelet is the abandonment of killing living beings.

original: zhes pa shes rab ni shes rab kyi lhan cig pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa shes rab ni shes rab kyi lhan cig pa'o //
translated: The wisdom is the wisdom that is simultaneous with the wisdom woman.

original: gdug pa'i phur pa ni sbyor ba ste rgyud du yang /
analyzed: gdug pa'i phur pa ni sbyor ba ste rgyud du yang /
translated: In the tantra it is said:

original: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba ni //
analyzed: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba ni //
translated: The subduing of all cruelty

original: nu ma mchan khung gnyis 'tshir ba'o //
analyzed: nu ma mchan khung gnyis 'tshir ba'o //
translated: Is the squeezing of the two breasts and armpits.

original: ra ba gur ni dgod pa bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: ra ba gur ni dgod pa bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
translated: The setting up of the fence and tent is by the samadhi of great bliss.

original: rgyu sogs stong pa nyid ni shr'i yig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi lhan skyes pa sgom pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu sogs stong pa nyid ni shr'i yig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi lhan skyes pa sgom pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of cause and so forth is the meditation on the innate of the nondual gnosis of the two shra letters.

original: 'jug pa sgra tsam ni dkar dmar thabs shes rab sbyor ba la shin du dga' ba'i sgra thos pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa sgra tsam ni dkar dmar thabs shes rab sbyor ba la shin du dga' ba'i sgra thos pa'o //
translated: The mere sound of the entry is the hearing of the sound of the great delight of the union of the red and white method and wisdom.

original: a'a li k'a li sogs bsdus pa ni de dag 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li sogs bsdus pa ni de dag 'gags pa'o //
translated: The inclusion of the ali kali and so forth is their cessation.

original: dgug pa ye shes sems dpa' yes ni ye shes 'dod pa des 'gugs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dgug pa ye shes sems dpa' yes ni ye shes 'dod pa des 'gugs par byed pa'o //
translated: The summoning by the gnosis being is the summoning by that gnosis that is desired.

original: dbang bskur ni /
analyzed: dbang bskur ni /
translated: The empowerment is:

original: bde ba'i sems des bsil ba nyid //🔽gsang bar ngo mtshar bsil ba thob //
analyzed: bde ba'i sems des bsil ba nyid // gsang bar ngo mtshar bsil ba thob //
translated: The cooling by that blissful mind

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Is the attainment of the cooling wonder in the secret.

original: shes rab rjes chags ni mi 'pho ba'i bde ba sems par byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab rjes chags ni mi 'pho ba'i bde ba sems par byed pa'o //
translated: The passion of wisdom is the contemplation of unchanging bliss.

original: bdud @346b rtsis tshim byed ni gsan nas dpral bar 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: bdud @346b rtsis tshim byed ni gsan nas dpral bar 'gro ba'o //
translated: The one satisfied by ambrosia is heard and goes to the forehead.

original: 'khor lo chen po ni nyi khri brgyad nyis brgya'i dbugs kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: 'khor lo chen po ni nyi khri brgyad nyis brgya'i dbugs kyi tshogs so //
translated: The great wheel is the collection of breaths, twenty-four thousand.

original: de'i gshegs su gsol ba ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ste /
analyzed: de'i gshegs su gsol ba ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ste /
translated: The request to depart is the state of great bliss.

original: de nas rdo rje 'chang gi sa bcu gnyis pa'i 'byung gnas thob par 'gyur te dus gsum shes pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'chang gi sa bcu gnyis pa'i 'byung gnas thob par 'gyur te dus gsum shes pa yang ngo //
translated: Then one attains the stage of Vajradhara, the source of the twelfth stage, and also the knowledge of the three times.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
analyzed: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
translated: Endowed with the twelve aspects of the truth,

original: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
analyzed: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
translated: knowing the sixteen aspects, enlightened by the twenty aspects,🔽all buddhas are the supreme knowers of all.

original: sangs rgyas kun ni kun rig mchog / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i sa rnams kyang dri ma med pa'i 'od du 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun ni kun rig mchog / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i sa rnams kyang dri ma med pa'i 'od du 'di lta ste /
translated: The stages taught by the Bhagavān are as follows, in Vimalaprabhā:

original: kun du 'od dang / bdud rtsi'i 'od dang / nam mkha'i 'od dang / rdo rje'i 'od dang / rin chen 'od dang / padma'i 'od dang / las kyi 'od dang / dpe med pa dang / nges pa'i dpe dang / shes rab 'od bcu par bzhed pa dang /
analyzed: kun du 'od dang / bdud rtsi'i 'od dang / nam mkha'i 'od dang / rdo rje'i 'od dang / rin chen 'od dang / padma'i 'od dang / las kyi 'od dang / dpe med pa dang / nges pa'i dpe dang / shes rab 'od bcu par bzhed pa dang /
translated: The ten are the light of all, the light of nectar, the light of space, the light of the vajra, the light of the jewel, the light of the lotus, the light of action, the incomparable, the definite example, and the light of wisdom.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis  chen po dang so sor bdag nyid rig pa bcu gnyis pa'o zhes te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dus sbyor 'gags pa las grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis  chen po dang so sor bdag nyid rig pa bcu gnyis pa'o zhes te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dus sbyor 'gags pa las grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
translated: The twelfth is the great light of omniscience, the self-awareness of each.

original: slob dpon rnams kyi bcu po gang //
analyzed: slob dpon rnams kyi bcu po gang //
translated: The ten of the masters

original: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las rnams so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las rnams so //
translated: are the activities of drawing the maṇḍala.

original: zhes pas de nyid bcu gsungs te ;
analyzed: zhes pas de nyid bcu gsungs te ;
translated: Thus, the ten principles are stated:

original: dkyil 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin dang // phyag rgya stang stabs 'dug stangs dang // gtor ma sbyin sreg rab gnas dang // spyan drang gshegs su gsol ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin dang // phyag rgya stang stabs 'dug stangs dang // gtor ma sbyin sreg rab gnas dang // spyan drang gshegs su gsol ba'o //
translated: The maṇḍala, samādhi, mudra, dance, posture, bali, homa, consecration, invocation, and farewell.

original: zhes so // rgyas par ston pa ni de nyid bcu rab tu gnas par shin tu rgyas par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // rgyas par ston pa ni de nyid bcu rab tu gnas par shin tu rgyas par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The extensive explanation is to be understood in detail in the Extensive Tantra of the Ten Stanzas on Reality.

original: 'khor lo 'khyil pa mgul rgyan dang // gdu bu de bzhin 'og pag dang // thal bas lhan cig pa drug po //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'khyil pa mgul rgyan dang // gdu bu de bzhin 'og pag dang // thal bas lhan cig pa drug po //
translated: The wheel, the necklace, the bracelet, the girdle, and the ash together with the sacred thread—

original: dpa' bo rnams kyi phyag rgyar bshad //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams kyi phyag rgyar bshad //
translated: these six are explained as the seals of the heroes.

original: ces pas phyag rgya can rgyas par bshad de gsal lo //
analyzed: ces pas phyag rgya can rgyas par bshad de gsal lo //
translated: This explains the extensive explanation of the one who has the seals.

original: thal pa spangs pa lnga po ni //
analyzed: thal pa spangs pa lnga po ni //
translated: The five that are free from the sacred thread

original: mkha' 'gro ma yis rab tu bsgrags //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yis rab tu bsgrags //
translated: are proclaimed by the dakinis.

original: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: rdo rje thabs kyi ngo bo yis //
analyzed: rdo rje thabs kyi ngo bo yis //
translated: The vajra is the nature of method,

original: dril bu shes rab rang bzhin las //
analyzed: dril bu shes rab rang bzhin las //
translated: and the bell is the nature of wisdom.

original: zhes te sogs kyi sgras mtshon cha la sogs pa'i dag pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes te sogs kyi sgras mtshon cha la sogs pa'i dag pa gsungs so //
translated: The words “and so forth” teach the purity of the weapons and so forth.

original: de bzhin g-yas su da ma ru //
analyzed: de bzhin g-yas su da ma ru //
translated: Likewise, the damaru is on the right,

original: g-yon du kha tv'am ga brjod bya //
analyzed: g-yon du kha tv'am ga brjod bya //
translated: and the khaṭvāṅga is on the left.🔽The hero is equal to the ḍākinī

original: brgya phyed mgo bo'i phreng ba yis //🔽mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bor @347a * //
analyzed: brgya phyed mgo bo'i phreng ba yis // mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bor @347a * //
translated: with a garland of heads numbering one hundred and five.

original: mnyam // mi shes gcod byed gri gug ste //
analyzed: mnyam // mi shes gcod byed gri gug ste //
translated: The flaying knife cuts through ignorance,🔽and the skull cup is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: bdud rnams gsod byed thod pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rnams gsod byed thod pa'o //
translated: The demons are the skull for killing.

original: de rnams gcer bu'i gar byed de //
analyzed: de rnams gcer bu'i gar byed de //
translated: They dance naked,

original: sgrib pa med pa'i stong pa nyid //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i stong pa nyid //
translated: the emptiness without obscurations.

original: myos byed btung ba rtag tu dga' //
analyzed: myos byed btung ba rtag tu dga' //
translated: The drink of intoxication is always delightful.

original: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas //
translated: The state of great bliss is the abode.

original: rdo rje'i glu ni glu chen po //
analyzed: rdo rje'i glu ni glu chen po //
translated: The vajra song is the great song.

original: chos kyi 'khor lor rab 'jug byed //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lor rab 'jug byed //
translated: It is the entry into the wheel of Dharma.

original: dbang po rnams ni 'gog pa gang //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni 'gog pa gang //
translated: The cessation of the senses

original: go ku la sogs lnga za ba'o //
analyzed: go ku la sogs lnga za ba'o //
translated: is the eating of the five, cow, etc.

original: phung po'i sgrib pa zad pa'i ming //
analyzed: phung po'i sgrib pa zad pa'i ming //
translated: The name of the exhaustion of the obscurations of the aggregates

original: bdud rtsi lnga po za ba'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga po za ba'o //
translated: is the eating of the five nectars.

original: dur khrod du ni rol par gang //
analyzed: dur khrod du ni rol par gang //
translated: The one who plays in the charnel ground

original: sems can lus la chen por gnas //
analyzed: sems can lus la chen por gnas //
translated: is the great one abiding in the body of sentient beings.

original: rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
translated: The one who desires the siddhi of yoga

original: de ltar thams cad yongs shes bya //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad yongs shes bya //
translated: should know all of that.

original: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is just the literal meaning.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of turning the wheel of Dharma.

original: rlung me chu dang sa gzhi ri //
analyzed: rlung me chu dang sa gzhi ri //
translated: The wind, fire, water, and earth

original: padma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: padma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
translated: are the colors of the lotus and sun maṇḍala.

original: dbus su dkyil 'khor gtso bo de //
analyzed: dbus su dkyil 'khor gtso bo de //
translated: In the center is the principal of the maṇḍala,

original: au ma dbang phyug mnyam mnan nas //
analyzed: au ma dbang phyug mnyam mnan nas //
translated: pressing on Umā and Śiva.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas sprul pa'i sku rgyas par 'chad de de'i au ma dbang phyug ni g-yon du dbang phyug chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas sprul pa'i sku rgyas par 'chad de de'i au ma dbang phyug ni g-yon du dbang phyug chen po'o //
translated: His consort Umā is Maheśvara on the left.

original: g-yas su dkar mo'o //
analyzed: g-yas su dkar mo'o //
translated: On the right is Gaurī.

original: bla mar yang /
analyzed: bla mar yang /
translated: Also, the Gurupañcāśikā says:

original: dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo mnan //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo mnan //
translated: The head of Maheśvara is pressed down.

original: au ma'i nu ma rgyas pa mnan //
analyzed: au ma'i nu ma rgyas pa mnan //
translated: The full breasts of Umā are pressed down.

original: zhes so // rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang dkar po zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi rnams su dgra sta dang thod pa dang thal mo sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes so // rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang dkar po zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi rnams su dgra sta dang thod pa dang thal mo sbyar ba'o //
translated: Also, in the Vajradāka, the white one has one face and four hands, holding a hatchet, skull cup, and palms joined.

original: rgan byang ma nag mo zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi rnams su thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang ral gri dang cang te'u can no //
analyzed: rgan byang ma nag mo zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi rnams su thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang ral gri dang cang te'u can no //
translated: The old woman is black, with one face and four hands, holding a skull cup, khaṭvāṅga, sword, and ḍamaru.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //🔽ye shes 'khor lo'i pad 'dab la //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o // ye shes 'khor lo'i pad 'dab la //
translated: This is literal.🔽On the petals of the lotus of the wheel of exalted wisdom

original: bdud rtsi yi ni thod pa rnams //
analyzed: bdud rtsi yi ni thod pa rnams //
translated: are skull cups of elixir.

original: nag po dmar po dkar po'i lha //
analyzed: nag po dmar po dkar po'i lha //
translated: The deities are black, red, and white,

original: 'khor lo gsum du rim bzhin gnas //🔽mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji bzhin //
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum du rim bzhin gnas // mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji bzhin //
translated: respectively, in the three wheels.🔽The dakini and so forth are in the same order.

original: bya rog gdong sogs de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: bya rog gdong sogs de bzhin nyid //
translated: The crow-faced and so forth are the same.

original: phyogs su ji ltar de bzhin zur //
analyzed: phyogs su ji ltar de bzhin zur //
translated: In the directions and corners, just so.

original: sgrub pos rtag tu shes par bya //
analyzed: sgrub pos rtag tu shes par bya //
translated: The adept should always know them.

original: zhes te ye shes 'khor lo ni snying po'i 'dab ma la'o //
analyzed: zhes te ye shes 'khor lo ni snying po'i 'dab ma la'o //
translated: The wheel of knowledge is on the petals of the essence.

original: bdud rtsi ni bshang ba dang gci ba dang khrag bcud rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i phyogs bral rnams su'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ni bshang ba dang gci ba dang khrag bcud rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i phyogs bral rnams su'o //
translated: The nectars are feces, urine, blood, and the essences in the corners beginning with Isana.

original: de nyid du nag po ni thugs kyi 'khor lo la'o //
analyzed: de nyid du nag po ni thugs kyi 'khor lo la'o //
translated: In that very place, the black one is on the wheel of mind.

original: de bzhin du dmar po ni gsung gi 'khor lo la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dmar po ni gsung gi 'khor lo la'o //
translated: Just so, the red one is on the wheel of speech.

original: dkar po ni sku'i 'khor lo la'o //
analyzed: dkar po ni sku'i 'khor lo la'o //
translated: The white one is on the wheel of body.

original: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams nag mo dang so bsangs ma dang dmar mo dang ser mo @347b rnams shar dang byang la sogs te bya rog gdong la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams nag mo dang so bsangs ma dang dmar mo dang ser mo @347b rnams shar dang byang la sogs te bya rog gdong la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: Dakini and so forth are black, smoky, red, and yellow in the east, north, and so forth, and also Kankini and so forth.

original: zur du gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: zur du gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: In the corners, Yamadakini and so forth.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: yang na zhal gyi kha dog gis de rnams phyogs bzhir bskor bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na zhal gyi kha dog gis de rnams phyogs bzhir bskor bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Or else, one should know that they are arranged in the four directions by the colors of their faces.

original: nag po dmar po gser du snang //
analyzed: nag po dmar po gser du snang //
translated: black, red, and golden-colored.

original: kha ba kunda zla ba mtshungs //
analyzed: kha ba kunda zla ba mtshungs //
translated: Like snow, jasmine, and the moon.

original: zhes gtso bo'i zhal gyi kha dog gi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma dgu po de rnams nag mo'o //
analyzed: zhes gtso bo'i zhal gyi kha dog gi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma dgu po de rnams nag mo'o //
translated: Thus, by the division of the colors of the faces of the principal ones, those nine yoginis are black.

original: g-yas su dmar mo dgu ser mo rgyab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas su dmar mo dgu ser mo rgyab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: The nine on the right are red, and the nine on the back are golden-colored.

original: byang du gnas pa dkar mo'o //
analyzed: byang du gnas pa dkar mo'o //
translated: The one in the north is white.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: kun spyod du yang /
analyzed: kun spyod du yang /
translated: In the Conduct too it is said:

original: gshin rje sreg ma sogs //
analyzed: gshin rje sreg ma sogs //
translated: Yama, Agni, and so forth,

original: gzugs gnyis ldan zhing yid 'phrog ma //
analyzed: gzugs gnyis ldan zhing yid 'phrog ma //
translated: having two forms, are captivating.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: he ru ka dpal rgyal po che //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal rgyal po che //
translated: The great king, glorious Heruka,

original: go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya //
translated: should meditate on the supreme stage.

original: sems dpa' dpa' bo pho nya mo //
analyzed: sems dpa' dpa' bo pho nya mo //
translated: The hero, the messenger,

original: dngos po kun gyi rnal 'byor ldan //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rnal 'byor ldan //
translated: endowed with the yoga of all things.

original: zhes so // longs spyod rdzogs pa gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: zhes so // longs spyod rdzogs pa gsungs pa yang /
translated: And it is said of the enjoyment body:

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid 'khor los sgyur ba bzhin du slar yang khams thams cad du rdzogs par longs spyod pa nyid tha dad ma yin par yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid 'khor los sgyur ba bzhin du slar yang khams thams cad du rdzogs par longs spyod pa nyid tha dad ma yin par yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes so //
translated: The enjoyment body, like a universal monarch, again enjoys the complete enjoyment of all the realms, without difference, and holds them.

original: de yang mchog gi dang po la sogs par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang mchog gi dang po la sogs par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as stated in the Supreme Original and elsewhere.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: klu yi dbang po rus pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: klu yi dbang po rus pa'i rgyan //
translated: The lord of nagas is the bone ornament.🔽The tiger skin, the elephant skin,🔽the maras, the afflictions, the meditative absorptions,

original: stag lpags glang po'i pags pa dang // bdud dang nyon mongs snyoms 'jug dang // shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: stag lpags glang po'i pags pa dang // bdud dang nyon mongs snyoms 'jug dang // shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: and the obscurations to omniscience.

original: zhes pas chos gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas chos gsungs so //
translated: Thus he taught the Dharma.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: And he taught:

original: 'khor gsum rnam par rtog pa gang //
analyzed: 'khor gsum rnam par rtog pa gang //
translated: Whatever conceptualizations there are of the three spheres

original: de ni shes bya'i sgrib par 'dod //
analyzed: de ni shes bya'i sgrib par 'dod //
translated: are asserted to be the obscurations to omniscience.

original: ser sna la sogs pa rnam rtog gang //
analyzed: ser sna la sogs pa rnam rtog gang //
translated: Whatever conceptualizations there are of stinginess and so forth

original: de nyid nyon mongs sgrib par 'dod //
analyzed: de nyid nyon mongs sgrib par 'dod //
translated: are asserted to be the afflictive obscurations.

original: ces so // bdud kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pas klu'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: ces so // bdud kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pas klu'i dbang po'o //
translated: The lord of nagas is purified of the obscurations of maras.

original: nyon mongs dag pas rus pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs dag pas rus pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The bone ornament is purified of the afflictions.

original: snyoms 'jug dag pas stag gi pags pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms 'jug dag pas stag gi pags pa'o //
translated: The tiger skin is purified of the meditative absorptions.

original: shes bya yongs su dag pas glang po che'i pags pa yang ngo //
analyzed: shes bya yongs su dag pas glang po che'i pags pa yang ngo //
translated: The elephant skin is purified of the obscurations to omniscience.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: au ma dbang phyug che de bzhin //
analyzed: au ma dbang phyug che de bzhin //
translated: Uma is Mahesvara.

original: thod pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // thod pa'i phreng ba de bzhin te //
analyzed: thod pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // thod pa'i phreng ba de bzhin te //
translated: The skull is the head of Brahma,🔽and the garland of skulls is the same.🔽The ashes are the sacred thread of Brahma,

original: thal bcas tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // mgo bo'i phreng ba yang dag ldan //
analyzed: thal bcas tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // mgo bo'i phreng ba yang dag ldan //
translated: and the garland of heads is the same.

original: de dag rnam dag shes par bya //
analyzed: de dag rnam dag shes par bya //
translated: One should know them to be pure.

original: khro bo'i dbang dang byang chub sems //
analyzed: khro bo'i dbang dang byang chub sems //
translated: The Lord of Wrath and the Bodhisattvas

original: sgrib pa cung zad dang ldan no //
analyzed: sgrib pa cung zad dang ldan no //
translated: are endowed with a little obscuration.

original: zhes te cung zad ces pa nyon mongs pa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te cung zad ces pa nyon mongs pa bzhi pa'o //
translated: The little is the fourth affliction.

original: gsungs @348a * //
analyzed: gsungs @348a * //
translated: It is also said:

original: pa yang / nyung ngu'i ye shes kyis byas pa //
analyzed: pa yang / nyung ngu'i ye shes kyis byas pa //
translated: The wisdom of the little

original: nyon mongs bzhi po nges bsregs yin //
analyzed: nyon mongs bzhi po nges bsregs yin //
translated: burns up the four afflictions.

original: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning.

original: au ma dang dbang phyug chen po ni rdul dang khu ba'o //
analyzed: au ma dang dbang phyug chen po ni rdul dang khu ba'o //
translated: Uma and Mahesvara are the semen and blood.

original: ri gi aa rallir yang //
analyzed: ri gi aa rallir yang //
translated: In the Rig-Airi

original: mgo po yang ni nyon mongs bdud //
analyzed: mgo po yang ni nyon mongs bdud //
translated: the head is the demon of the afflictions,

original: thod pa nam mkha' dag pa zhes so //
analyzed: thod pa nam mkha' dag pa zhes so //
translated: and the skull is the pure sky.

original: a'a li k'a li'i dag pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //🔽sems can mos pa sna tshogs pas //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i dag pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o // sems can mos pa sna tshogs pas //
translated: The purity of Alikali is the literal meaning.🔽Sentient beings have various inclinations,

original: spyod pa sna tshogs kun du gnas //
analyzed: spyod pa sna tshogs kun du gnas //
translated: and so they abide in various practices.

original: sna tshogs tshul gyi cho ga yis //
analyzed: sna tshogs tshul gyi cho ga yis //
translated: By means of the various rites,

original: sna tshogs pa yi thabs bstan no //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa yi thabs bstan no //
translated: the various methods are taught.

original: zhes te lhag par mos pa tha dad pa nyid kyi sems can gang yin pa de la tha dad pa'i tshul dang thabs bstan no //
analyzed: zhes te lhag par mos pa tha dad pa nyid kyi sems can gang yin pa de la tha dad pa'i tshul dang thabs bstan no //
translated: For those sentient beings who have different kinds of devotion, the various methods are taught.

original: lhag par mos pa sna tshogs pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i sems so //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa sna tshogs pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i sems so //
translated: Various kinds of devotion are the thoughts of the śrāvakas, etc.

original: spyod pa dang tshul rnam pa gsum ni bye brag tu smra ba la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams so //
analyzed: spyod pa dang tshul rnam pa gsum ni bye brag tu smra ba la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams so //
translated: The three kinds of conduct and methods are the assertions of the Vaibhāṣikas, etc.

original: thabs ni lam sgom par byed pa'o //
analyzed: thabs ni lam sgom par byed pa'o //
translated: The method is the cultivation of the path.

original: de la gang thag tu smra ba rnams la gang zag mi rtag par sgom pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de la gang thag tu smra ba rnams la gang zag mi rtag par sgom pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: For the Vaibhāṣikas, the cultivation of the impermanence of the person, etc., is taught.

original: don smra ba rnams las la sogs pa'i zad par bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: don smra ba rnams las la sogs pa'i zad par bsgom pa'o //
translated: For the Sautrāntikas, the cultivation of the exhaustion of karma, etc., is taught.

original: rnam par shes pa rnams la brtags pa tsam nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnams la brtags pa tsam nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: For the Vijñānavādins, the samādhi of mere conceptualization is taught.

original: dbu ma rnams la rmi lam lta bu dang 'gyur ba med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes sgom pa gsungs te sems can gyi bsam pas ston pa rnams kyang de bzhin te khur ba'i gang zag yod de rtag par yang mi smra mi rtag par yang mi
analyzed: dbu ma rnams la rmi lam lta bu dang 'gyur ba med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes sgom pa gsungs te sems can gyi bsam pas ston pa rnams kyang de bzhin te khur ba'i gang zag yod de rtag par yang mi smra mi rtag par yang mi
translated: The Madhyamikas are taught the meditation of nondual wisdom, which is like a dream and unchanging. The teachers are also like that, in accordance with the thoughts of sentient beings. They do not say that the person who bears the burden is permanent, nor do they say that it is impermanent.

original: smra'o // rdul phra rab tshogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi tha ma'i lus mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan pa yang yod do //
analyzed: smra'o // rdul phra rab tshogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi tha ma'i lus mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan pa yang yod do //
translated: There is also a final body, which is the nature of an aggregation of subtle particles, endowed with the major and minor marks.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste khams gsum pa ni rnam par shes pa tsam mo zhes so //
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste khams gsum pa ni rnam par shes pa tsam mo zhes so //
translated: O sons of the Victorious Ones, it is like this: the three realms are mere consciousness.

original: rgyud gzhan du yang //
analyzed: rgyud gzhan du yang //
translated: In another tantra it is said:

original: sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo //
translated: The great illusion, the great fierce one,

original: 'byung dang sdud par byed pa mo //
analyzed: 'byung dang sdud par byed pa mo //
translated: The one who emanates and reabsorbs,

original: kun rdzob kyis so //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyis so //
translated: Is the relative.

original: shes rab pa rol phyin byed ma //
analyzed: shes rab pa rol phyin byed ma //
translated: The one who practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: byed po sangs rgyas lus can min //
analyzed: byed po sangs rgyas lus can min //
translated: The creator, is not embodied in the Buddha.

original: zhes te ldog pas mya ngan las 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi phung po lhag ma med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te ldog pas mya ngan las 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi phung po lhag ma med pa'o //
translated: Thus, by implication, nirvana is the nirvana with remainder of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and the nirvana without remainder of the Mahāyānists.

original: stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa smra ba po rnams kyi rab tu mi gnas pa shin tu gnyid log pa dang sad pa dang bral ba bzhi pa dang rmi lam lta bu ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa smra ba po rnams kyi rab tu mi gnas pa shin tu gnyid log pa dang sad pa dang bral ba bzhi pa dang rmi lam lta bu ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The non-abiding of those who speak of non-dual emptiness, utterly free from sleep and waking, like the fourth [state] and a dream, is the result.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du bstan pa la gang sems ma yin @348b pa'o zhes gsungs pa chos thams cad dngos po ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du bstan pa la gang sems ma yin @348b pa'o zhes gsungs pa chos thams cad dngos po ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes so //
translated: In the teaching on the perfection of wisdom, it is said that mind is not, and by the samādhi of the nature of all phenomena being unreal,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
translated: the Blessed One also said:

original: nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis //
translated: Space and the two cessations

original: 'dus ma byas gsum rtag pa ste //
