analyzed: 'dus ma byas gsum rtag pa ste //
translated: are the three unconditioned things that are permanent.

original: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma //
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma //
translated: All conditioned things are momentary.

original: bdag gi stong zhing byed po med ;
analyzed: bdag gi stong zhing byed po med ;
translated: The self is empty and without an agent.

original: / dbang skyes blo ni rna med kyis //
analyzed: / dbang skyes blo ni rna med kyis //
translated: The mind born from the sense organ,

original: phra rab bsags pa dngos su rig / kha che'i gzhung gi chu gter gyi //
analyzed: phra rab bsags pa dngos su rig / kha che'i gzhung gi chu gter gyi //
translated: directly cognizes the aggregation of subtle particles.

original: bye brag smra ba'i gzhung 'dod 'gyur //
analyzed: bye brag smra ba'i gzhung 'dod 'gyur //
translated: This is the assertion of the Vaibhāṣika school,🔽the ocean of the Kashmiri scriptures.

original: shes pa rnam can skyed byed ni //
analyzed: shes pa rnam can skyed byed ni //
translated: That which produces the cognition with aspects

original: dbang po'i spyod yul snang ba min //
analyzed: dbang po'i spyod yul snang ba min //
translated: is not the appearance in the domain of the sense organ.

original: nam mkha'i mo gsham bu dang mtshungs //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mo gsham bu dang mtshungs //
translated: It is like the son of a barren woman in the sky.

original: 'gog pa dag ni nam mkha' bzhin //
analyzed: 'gog pa dag ni nam mkha' bzhin //
translated: Cessation is like space.

original: 'du byad bems po yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'du byad bems po yod ma yin //
translated: There is no matter in the aggregates.

original: dus gsum rjes 'gro dag kyang med //
analyzed: dus gsum rjes 'gro dag kyang med //
translated: There is no following of the three times.

original: thogs pa med pa'i gzugs yod min //
analyzed: thogs pa med pa'i gzugs yod min //
translated: There is no form without obstruction.🔽This is known by the Sautrāntikas.

original: zhes pa mdo sde pa yi rig / yan lag can zhes bya ba med //
analyzed: zhes pa mdo sde pa yi rig / yan lag can zhes bya ba med //
translated: There is no so-called whole.

original: phra rab rdul rnams yod ma yin //
analyzed: phra rab rdul rnams yod ma yin //
translated: There are no subtle particles.

original: sgyu ma rmi lam mthong ba yis //
analyzed: sgyu ma rmi lam mthong ba yis //
translated: By seeing illusions and dreams,

original: dmigs pa med pa rab tu gsal //🔽gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba'i //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa rab tu gsal // gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba'i //
translated: the absence of objects is clearly seen.

original: rnam par shes pa don dam yong //🔽rnal 'byor spyod gzhung rgya mtsho yis //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa don dam yong // rnal 'byor spyod gzhung rgya mtsho yis //
translated: The ultimate consciousness,🔽free from subject and object,🔽is proclaimed in the ocean of scriptures

original: pha rol phyin rnams de skad sgrogs //
analyzed: pha rol phyin rnams de skad sgrogs //
translated: of the Yogācāra and Pāramitā.

original: rnam par shes pa don dam yod //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa don dam yod //
translated: Consciousness is ultimately existent.

original: de yang mkhas rnams mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de yang mkhas rnams mi 'dod do //
translated: But even that the wise do not accept.

original: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang // bral phyir nam mkha'i padmo bzhin //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang // bral phyir nam mkha'i padmo bzhin //
translated: Like a sky-lotus, it is devoid of a nature of unity or multiplicity.

original: yod dang med dang yod med dang // gnyis ka'i bdag nyid min pa'am min //
analyzed: yod dang med dang yod med dang // gnyis ka'i bdag nyid min pa'am min //
translated: It is not existent, nor nonexistent, nor both existent and nonexistent, nor is it not even that.

original: mtha' bzhi rnam par grol ba yis //
analyzed: mtha' bzhi rnam par grol ba yis //
translated: Liberated from the four extremes,🔽that is the knowledge of the Mādhyamika.

original: de nyid dbu ma pa yi rig / de bzhin du 'ang //
analyzed: de nyid dbu ma pa yi rig / de bzhin du 'ang //
translated: Likewise,

original: bdag med 'byung ba yod cing dge dang mi dge 'bras bu yod de byed pa po yis rnam par dman //
analyzed: bdag med 'byung ba yod cing dge dang mi dge 'bras bu yod de byed pa po yis rnam par dman //
translated: there is no self, but there is arising; there is virtue and nonvirtue, and there are their effects, but an agent is not observed.

original: 'gro ba po med ma lus thar ba'i slad du 'gro ba yod cing 'chi ba yod de bcings pa med //
analyzed: 'gro ba po med ma lus thar ba'i slad du 'gro ba yod cing 'chi ba yod de bcings pa med //
translated: There is no goer, but there is going, for the sake of the complete liberation of those who are not liberated; there is death, but there is no bondage.

original: dngos po med pa dag kyang yod de skad cig rnam bral rang bzhin med pa dag gi srid pa yod //
analyzed: dngos po med pa dag kyang yod de skad cig rnam bral rang bzhin med pa dag gi srid pa yod //
translated: There are also things that are nonexistent, such as the existence of momentary things that are devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: 'di dag bdag gi bden pa'i tshig ste lha dang gdengs can rnams kyi gdon bcas tshig gis 'joms mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di dag bdag gi bden pa'i tshig ste lha dang gdengs can rnams kyi gdon bcas tshig gis 'joms mi 'gyur //
translated: These are my true words, which cannot be destroyed by the words of gods and demons.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la //
analyzed: zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la //
translated: And the profound Dharma is taught.

original: gal te mos par ma gyur kyang //
analyzed: gal te mos par ma gyur kyang //
translated: Even if one has no faith,

original: smod pa dag tu mi bya ste //
analyzed: smod pa dag tu mi bya ste //
translated: one should not disparage it,

original: chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya //
analyzed: chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya //
translated: but remember the inconceivability of reality.

original: zhes pas dag pa'i sku gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas dag pa'i sku gsungs so //
translated: This is the pure body.

original: zab mo ni rtog ge'i yul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zab mo ni rtog ge'i yul ma yin pa'o //
translated: The profound is not the object of speculation.

original: gang gis 'dir bdag yul min pa //
analyzed: gang gis 'dir bdag yul min pa //
translated: By whom I am not an object,

original: bdag gis chos nyid mi shes te //🔽dus gsum @349a * //
analyzed: bdag gis chos nyid mi shes te // dus gsum @349a * //
translated: I do not know reality.

original: bzhugs pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: bzhugs pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The perfect buddhas dwelling in the three times,

original: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen //
translated: the great beings, know

original: sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol //
analyzed: sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol //
translated: liberated from all obscurations.

original: gang gis khams gsum rgyas gdab pa //
analyzed: gang gis khams gsum rgyas gdab pa //
translated: By whom the three realms are sealed,

original: khro bo'i dbang dang byang chub sems //
analyzed: khro bo'i dbang dang byang chub sems //
translated: the lord of wrath and the bodhicitta,

original: dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo'o //
translated: are the principal of all maṇḍalas.

original: zhes te bdag nyid chen po ni sku lnga'o //
analyzed: zhes te bdag nyid chen po ni sku lnga'o //
translated: The great beings are the five buddha bodies.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas ni sa bcu gsum gyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas ni sa bcu gsum gyi dbang po'o //
translated: The perfect buddhas are the lords of the thirteenth stage.

original: dus gsum bzhugs pa ni tshogs gsum mo //
analyzed: dus gsum bzhugs pa ni tshogs gsum mo //
translated: The dwelling in the three times is the three assemblies.

original: khro bo'i dbang po ni gshin rje mthar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i dbang po ni gshin rje mthar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The lord of wrath is Yamāntaka and so forth.

original: byang chub smes dpa' ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub smes dpa' ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Bodhisattvas are Maitreya and so on.

original: dang yig las spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dang yig las spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The “and” indicates Locanā and so on.

original: thams cad ni mkha' 'gro lnga la sogs pa rnams kyis mkhyen no zhes pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni mkha' 'gro lnga la sogs pa rnams kyis mkhyen no zhes pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: All of them are known by the five dakinis and so on.

original: sku bzhi'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: sku bzhi'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the liturgy of the four bodies.

original: de ltar gang zhig sgom pa dang / gsang sngags bzlas pa byed pa ni //🔽skye dang skye bar chos ldan pa'i //
analyzed: de ltar gang zhig sgom pa dang / gsang sngags bzlas pa byed pa ni // skye dang skye bar chos ldan pa'i //
translated: Thus, one who meditates and performs the mantra recitation🔽will be born in life after life

original: rgyal po'i go 'phang 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: rgyal po'i go 'phang 'gyur ba yin //
translated: with the status of a righteous king.

original: zhes pas rjes su 'gro ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas rjes su 'gro ba gsungs so //
translated: This is the conclusion.

original: de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs sam //
analyzed: de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs sam //
translated: Thus, the yoga of reality is with signs,

original: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang ngo //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang ngo //
translated: or else one becomes a universal monarch.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning explanation.

original: dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod //
analyzed: dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod //
translated: For example, a vessel filled with butter

original: me yi dbus su legs gzhag la //
analyzed: me yi dbus su legs gzhag la //
translated: is well placed in the middle of fire.

original: de la mar ni zhu 'gyur te //
analyzed: de la mar ni zhu 'gyur te //
translated: The butter melts there

original: snod kyi dri ma gnas par byed //
analyzed: snod kyi dri ma gnas par byed //
translated: and removes the stains of the vessel.

original: ces pas las kyis lus gtong ba don du gnyer ba la dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: ces pas las kyis lus gtong ba don du gnyer ba la dpe gsungs pa /
translated: This verse gives an example of the one who is intent on giving up the body through karma.

original: dper na mar me med pa bzhin du lus gnas pa rnam par shes pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dper na mar me med pa bzhin du lus gnas pa rnam par shes pa med pa'o //
translated: Just as a lamp is extinguished, so the body remains without consciousness.

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang /
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang /
translated: In the Adibuddha, too, it is said:

original: phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde ba'i go 'phang 'gro ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min //
analyzed: phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde ba'i go 'phang 'gro ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min //
translated: “Although there is no skandha, the yogin goes to the state of bliss, but it is not known in the world.”

original: zhes te dgongs pa /
analyzed: zhes te dgongs pa /
translated: This is the intention.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams 'chi tshe'am //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams 'chi tshe'am //
translated: When the yogins die,

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams thugs dgyes pas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams thugs dgyes pas //
translated: the yoginis, being pleased,

original: lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs //
analyzed: lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs //
translated: holding various flowers in their hands,

original: sna tshogs rgyal mtshan yang dag ldan //
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyal mtshan yang dag ldan //
translated: endowed with various banners,🔽with the sounds of various musical instruments,

original: sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra rnams dang // sna tshogs glu dang mchod pa yis //🔽'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste //
analyzed: sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra rnams dang // sna tshogs glu dang mchod pa yis // 'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste //
translated: with various songs and offerings,

original: mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed //
analyzed: mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed //
translated: lead them to the celestial realm.🔽This is called death.

original: ces pa ste nyes pa mthar phyin pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ces pa ste nyes pa mthar phyin pa gsungs so //
translated: This is said to be the culmination of the faults.

original: 'am gyi sgra las skyes pa 'di nyid kho na la'o //
analyzed: 'am gyi sgra las skyes pa 'di nyid kho na la'o //
translated: The word “or” in the root text indicates that this is just the birth of the yogin.

original: phyag rgya chen po dang bcas pa grub pa'i dngos grub kyi dus su'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dang bcas pa grub pa'i dngos grub kyi dus su'o //
translated: and with the Great Seal, at the time of the accomplishment of the powers.

original: de bzhin du yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang /
translated: And so it is said:

original: dus kyi 'khor lor khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lor khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs //
translated: In the Kalachakra, the wrathful Buddhas together with the Goddesses, the Vajras of the quarters, Kshitigarbha and so forth,

original: rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa las grub pa'i @349b dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa las grub pa'i @349b dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur //
translated: the minds of the Buddhas of the ten directions, become manifest in the sky at the time of the yogi's accomplishment.

original: de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi ri rangs nas ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi ri rangs nas ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur //
translated: His desired power is at the full moon, at midnight,

original: rin po che'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur //
analyzed: rin po che'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur //
translated: and the rain of jewels or flowers falls on the earth by the conjunction of the time.

original: zhes te rnal 'byor ma rnams gur gum la sogs pa'i char 'bebs par byed do //
analyzed: zhes te rnal 'byor ma rnams gur gum la sogs pa'i char 'bebs par byed do //
translated: The yoginis cause the rain of saffron and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the very nature of the yogini tantra.

original: phyi rol du yang //
analyzed: phyi rol du yang //
translated: And also externally,

original: rdo rje slob dpon rnams kyis byed de de'i phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon rnams kyis byed de de'i phyir ro zhes so //
translated: the vajra masters do it.

original: 'di rnams rtogs na mi shes pa rnams kyi 'chi ba'o zhes phung po med pa mchog gi bde ba zhes brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams rtogs na mi shes pa rnams kyi 'chi ba'o zhes phung po med pa mchog gi bde ba zhes brjod pa la'o //
translated: If these are realized, it is the death of the ignorant, it is said to be the supreme bliss of the absence of the aggregates.

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub mnyam pa 'di'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub mnyam pa 'di'o //
translated: This is the equality of the spiritual powers of the consort.

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyang dpal dus kyi 'khor lor gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyang dpal dus kyi 'khor lor gsungs pa /
translated: The spiritual powers of the consort are also taught in the glorious Kālacakra:

original: mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khrums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni byung mi bya //
analyzed: mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khrums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni byung mi bya //
translated: Abiding in supreme bliss, the vajra woman should not emerge from the lotus until the vajra is erect.

original: gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur //
translated: When the desire is fulfilled, then this is the consecration of the Buddha.

original: rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying gar ye shes 'khor lo rab bcug ste //
analyzed: rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying gar ye shes 'khor lo rab bcug ste //
translated: The vajra should be inserted into the lotus, and the wisdom wheel should be inserted into one’s vajra heart.

original: 'di yi 'od zer rnams kyis gnyis ka'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad nyid du byed //
analyzed: 'di yi 'od zer rnams kyis gnyis ka'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad nyid du byed //
translated: The body of both is filled with light rays, and it is made into every aspect.

original: ces so // 'khrid par byed ni de rnams kyis sam de rnams kyi mkha' spyod nas su ste gnyis su med pa'i go 'phang du 'khrid par byed do //
analyzed: ces so // 'khrid par byed ni de rnams kyis sam de rnams kyi mkha' spyod nas su ste gnyis su med pa'i go 'phang du 'khrid par byed do //
translated: The intention is as follows.🔽Whether the buddhas have appeared

original: dgongs pa'o / sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur ram //🔽ma byung na yang rnam kun du //
analyzed: dgongs pa'o / sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur ram // ma byung na yang rnam kun du //
translated: or not,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab chos nyid ni //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab chos nyid ni //
translated: the inconceivable reality

original: 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yi //
analyzed: 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yi //
translated: is free from increase and decrease.

original: zhes pas stong pa nyid dang snying rje tha mi dad pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas stong pa nyid dang snying rje tha mi dad pa gsungs so //
translated: This teaches the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.

original: sangs rgyas rnams ni sangs rgyas sprul pa sku gsum po rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams ni sangs rgyas sprul pa sku gsum po rnams so //
translated: The buddhas are the three bodies of the emanation body of the buddhas.

original: de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /🔽chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa //
translated: And likewise the Lord has said:🔽The emanation body, the enjoyment body,

original: dag pa'i sku las spro bar byed //
analyzed: dag pa'i sku las spro bar byed //
translated: and the Dharma body are emanated from the pure body.

original: ces so // sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: ces so // sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal reading.

original: zhes pa de ltar bzhag nas ni //
analyzed: zhes pa de ltar bzhag nas ni //
translated: Having thus established that,

original: 'jig rten pa kun smad mi bya //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa kun smad mi bya //
translated: one should not disparage any worldly person,

original: de rnams rtogs pa bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: de rnams rtogs pa bsam mi khyab //
translated: for their realizations are inconceivable.

original: sangs rgyas gar mkhan bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gar mkhan bsam mi khyab //
translated: The Buddha is an inconceivable dancer.

original: ces te / gzhal nas ni de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas rtogs par byas nas so //
analyzed: ces te / gzhal nas ni de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas rtogs par byas nas so //
translated: Having realized it by the process of expression,

original: 'jig rten pa kun ni lha rnams so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa kun ni lha rnams so //
translated: all worldly people are gods.🔽One should not disparage it.

original: smad par mi bya'o zhes pa ni gsungs pa yang dag gang las don gang la bsam par bya ba thams cad stong par bgrod pa mthar thug pa ni thams cad 'od gsal ba mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //🔽dgongs @350a * //
analyzed: smad par mi bya'o zhes pa ni gsungs pa yang dag gang las don gang la bsam par bya ba thams cad stong par bgrod pa mthar thug pa ni thams cad 'od gsal ba mthar thug pa'i phyir ro // dgongs @350a * //
translated: What is the meaning of what is said? Everything is to be contemplated as empty. The ultimate is the clear light, because it is the ultimate.

original: pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The intention is not the literal meaning.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rtog ge'i rtogs bya ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rtog ge'i rtogs bya ma yin pa'o //
translated: The inconceivable is not to be realized by logic.

original: sangs rgyas gar mkhan ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gar mkhan ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
translated: The Buddha is a dancer, the Buddha's emanation.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du gsungs pa yang /
translated: What is said in the Perfection Vehicle way is:🔽The Buddha element, the enlightenment of the Buddha,

original: sangs rgyas khams dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang // sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: sangs rgyas khams dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang // sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas mdzad pa ste //
translated: The qualities of the Buddha, and the deeds of the Buddha,

original: 'di ni 'dren pa rnams kyis spyod yul de //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dren pa rnams kyis spyod yul de //
translated: This is the domain of the guides.

original: dag pa'i sems can gyis kyang bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: dag pa'i sems can gyis kyang bsam mi khyab //
translated: Pure sentient beings also do not conceive it.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: gal te sangs rgyas khams med na //
analyzed: gal te sangs rgyas khams med na //
translated: If the buddha constituent did not exist,

original: lus can kun la myang 'das med //
analyzed: lus can kun la myang 'das med //
translated: all embodied beings would have no nirvana.🔽And it is also said:

original: byang chub kyang gsungs pa 'phel 'grib spangs pa'i zhes pa la sogs pas 'dir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyang gsungs pa 'phel 'grib spangs pa'i zhes pa la sogs pas 'dir ro //
translated: Awakening is free from increase and decrease.

original: chos kyang gsungs pa mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams te chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dang / nges par 'ching ba'i gegs byed pa la dang / lam kun bshad pa la dang / 'gog pa thob pa la mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: chos kyang gsungs pa mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams te chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dang / nges par 'ching ba'i gegs byed pa la dang / lam kun bshad pa la dang / 'gog pa thob pa la mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: Dharma is also said to be fearlessness and so forth. The four kinds of fearlessness are with regard to fully awakening to all phenomena, with regard to acting as an obstacle to certain bondage, with regard to explaining all paths, and with regard to attaining cessation.

original: 'di yang nub par gyur pa'i de kho na nyid kyi bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di yang nub par gyur pa'i de kho na nyid kyi bya ba'o //
translated: This is the activity of suchness that has not set.🔽It is also said in the Vajra A la la Tantra:

original: rdo rje aa rall'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad go 'phang mchog nyid thob nas sangs rgyas kyi gar ston par byed de kha cig tu rdzogs par byang chub par byed /
analyzed: rdo rje aa rall'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad go 'phang mchog nyid thob nas sangs rgyas kyi gar ston par byed de kha cig tu rdzogs par byang chub par byed /
translated: Then all those bodhisattvas having attained the supreme state, they display the dance of the buddhas. In some places they fully awaken to buddhahood.

original: kha cig tu dga' ba spyod pa dang / lha las babs pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de bzhin du khab nas nges par 'byung ba zhes so //
analyzed: kha cig tu dga' ba spyod pa dang / lha las babs pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de bzhin du khab nas nges par 'byung ba zhes so //
translated: In some places, he shows the enjoyment of pleasures, descending from the gods, passing into nirvana, and likewise, leaving home.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The literal reading.

original: mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams //
analyzed: mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams //
translated: The sutra collection is for those who practice action.🔽The tantra collection is for those who practice yoga,

original: rnal 'byor gang mtha'i dbye ba las //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gang mtha'i dbye ba las //
translated: from the division of the limits.

original: sems can 'jug la tshul khrims ni //
analyzed: sems can 'jug la tshul khrims ni //
translated: Morality is taught for the engagement of sentient beings,

original: de dang de la rab tu bstan //
analyzed: de dang de la rab tu bstan //
translated: in this and that.

original: zhes pas sde snod gsum bsdus pa gsungs te tshul khrims ni mi dge ba spong pa bag med pa rnams kyi don du rab tu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pas sde snod gsum bsdus pa gsungs te tshul khrims ni mi dge ba spong pa bag med pa rnams kyi don du rab tu bstan pa'o //
translated: This teaches the three collections. Morality is taught for the sake of the heedless who abandon nonvirtue.

original: de la mdo sde dang chos mngon pa dang 'dul ba nyan thos kyi sde snod du'o //
analyzed: de la mdo sde dang chos mngon pa dang 'dul ba nyan thos kyi sde snod du'o //
translated: There, the sutra collection, the abhidharma collection, and the vinaya collection are for the sravakas.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod du gsang ba rnams zhes pa ste bya ba dang spyod pa dang gnyis ka'i rtog pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod du gsang ba rnams zhes pa ste bya ba dang spyod pa dang gnyis ka'i rtog pa rnams kyis so //
translated: There, the bodhisattva collection is for the secret ones, that is, for those who practice action, practice, and both.

original: theg pa chen por yang thun mong du gsungs pa dang byis pa rnams la gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: theg pa chen por yang thun mong du gsungs pa dang byis pa rnams la gsungs pa yang /
translated: Also, the Mahāyāna sūtras teach in common and also teach to the childish.

original: rnam pa gang dang gang dag gis //
analyzed: rnam pa gang dang gang dag gis //
translated: By whatever aspects

original: sems can rnams ni yongs yin byed //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni yongs yin byed //
translated: sentient beings are to be guided,

original: rnam pa de dang de dag gis //
analyzed: rnam pa de dang de dag gis //
translated: by those very aspects

original: chos ni bstan par bya ba yin //
analyzed: chos ni bstan par bya ba yin //
translated: the Dharma is to be taught.

original: zhes so // rgyud des na dang por yang dag pa'i ye shes ma bstan to zhes pa sgra ji @350b bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // rgyud des na dang por yang dag pa'i ye shes ma bstan to zhes pa sgra ji @350b bzhin pa'o //
translated: Thus, the statement that at first the perfect pristine consciousness is not taught is literal.

original: gal te rgyud gzhan thams cad du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ma gsungs na de dag la rigs zhes dogs pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te rgyud gzhan thams cad du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ma gsungs na de dag la rigs zhes dogs pa la gsungs pa /
translated: If perfect buddhahood is not taught in all other tantras, then it is doubtful that they are the Mahāyāna.

original: mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa yis //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa yis //
translated: The one hundred thousand expressions

original: rgyud las phung pa snying po bsdus //
analyzed: rgyud las phung pa snying po bsdus //
translated: collect the essence of the tantra.

original: bdun brgya'i gzhung gis yang dag rdzogs //
analyzed: bdun brgya'i gzhung gis yang dag rdzogs //
translated: The text of seven hundred🔽is perfect for the realization of buddhahood.

original: sangs rgyas rtogs phyir lha mo skye //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rtogs phyir lha mo skye //
translated: The goddess is born.

original: zhes pas rgyud bla mar gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pas rgyud bla mar gsungs so //
translated: This is taught in the Unexcelled Tantra.

original: rgyud ni 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
analyzed: rgyud ni 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
translated: Tantra means the tantra of the result.

original: phyung ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las so //
analyzed: phyung ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las so //
translated: Extracted means from the root tantra.

original: snying po ni rdo rje ste dbyings thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: snying po ni rdo rje ste dbyings thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The essence is the vajra, which is the gnosis that causes the realization of all the realms.

original: bsdus pa'i bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: It is the nature of the two truths in summary.

original: lha mo ni kye rdo rje phag mo'o //
analyzed: lha mo ni kye rdo rje phag mo'o //
translated: The goddess is the lady of Hevajra.

original: gang bdag gis dam bcas pa de dang de rab tu bstan no //
analyzed: gang bdag gis dam bcas pa de dang de rab tu bstan no //
translated: Whatever I have promised, that I will fully teach.

original: skye ba 'di kho na la sangs rgyas nyid sbyin par byed pa //
analyzed: skye ba 'di kho na la sangs rgyas nyid sbyin par byed pa //
translated: It grants buddhahood in this very life.

original: bde ba'i thabs ni rgyas min pa //
analyzed: bde ba'i thabs ni rgyas min pa //
translated: The method of bliss is not extensive.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par mchod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par mchod //
translated: It is the supreme worship of all the buddhas.

original: da ni de la mchod pa sogs //
analyzed: da ni de la mchod pa sogs //
translated: Now, worship it and so forth.

original: yid 'ong rnam par rgyas par gyis //
analyzed: yid 'ong rnam par rgyas par gyis //
translated: Make it grow in your mind.

original: zhes so // rdo rje aa ralli ru yang /
analyzed: zhes so // rdo rje aa ralli ru yang /
translated: In the Vajra A ral li it is said:

original: gang zhig rgyud 'di klog par byed //🔽gang zhig dad par byed pa'am //
analyzed: gang zhig rgyud 'di klog par byed // gang zhig dad par byed pa'am //
translated: Whoever reads this tantra,🔽Whoever has faith in it,

original: gang zhig lhag par mos par byed //
analyzed: gang zhig lhag par mos par byed //
translated: Whoever has devotion to it,

original: skye bo gang zhig mchod pa'ang //
analyzed: skye bo gang zhig mchod pa'ang //
translated: Whoever worships it,

original: de rnams thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur //
translated: All of them will become buddhas.

original: srid pa'i longs spyod gnas longs spyod //
analyzed: srid pa'i longs spyod gnas longs spyod //
translated: They enjoy the enjoyments of existence, the enjoyments of the abode,

original: ces so // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'dir phyag rgya chen po grub pa'o //
analyzed: ces so // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'dir phyag rgya chen po grub pa'o //
translated: The perfect Buddha is glorious Vajrasattva, who here is the accomplishment of the Great Seal.

original: phyag rgya chen po pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: The Great Seal is also taught by the Bhagavān:

original: phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te //
analyzed: phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te //
translated: The Great Seal is in accord with the illusion of the mind, in space, like a form in a mirror.

original: 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed //
translated: It radiates many light rays that illuminate the three worlds, like stainless lightning.

original: phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yis //
analyzed: phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yis //
translated: It is indivisible from the external and the body, free from objects, merely appearing, abiding in space.

original: sems dang sems byung la ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i gzugs kyis de ni gcig po'o //
analyzed: sems dang sems byung la ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i gzugs kyis de ni gcig po'o //
translated: I embrace the mind and mental factors, and it is the one with many forms of migrating beings.🔽The intention.

original: dgongs pa'o // dpal rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so zhes pa ni dpal he ru ka bde ba chen po phyi ma dang bcas pa'i rgyud mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa'o // dpal rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so zhes pa ni dpal he ru ka bde ba chen po phyi ma dang bcas pa'i rgyud mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The glorious king of tantras is complete.  This is the final glorious Heruka Tantra of Great Bliss with its continuation.

original: de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: Likewise, the Transcendent Lord has said:

original: srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de //
analyzed: srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de //
translated: The three worlds are not subtle form; here consciousness is not consciousness.

original: sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur /
translated: The words “the Buddha’s wisdom does not abide anywhere” teach the Buddhists.

original: gang gis @351a * //
analyzed: gang gis @351a * //
translated: By what?

original: 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de gzugs nas stong par lta byed pa //
analyzed: 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de gzugs nas stong par lta byed pa //
translated: People who are free from the unchanging see emptiness as form up to emptiness.

original: de nas gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan //
analyzed: de nas gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan //
translated: Then the chief one, who is free from transference, teaches the innate bliss of the body in the mantra vehicle.

original: zhes so // rgyud kyi rgyal po ni mdo sde dang rgyud dang rtog pa rnams ni rgyud rnams so //
analyzed: zhes so // rgyud kyi rgyal po ni mdo sde dang rgyud dang rtog pa rnams ni rgyud rnams so //
translated: The king of tantras is the tantras of the sutras, tantras, and treatises.

original: rgyal po ni gnyis su med pas dbang du byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyal po ni gnyis su med pas dbang du byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The king is the one who is nondual and controls everything.

original: rdzogs so ni yang dag par thob pa ste sems can thams cad kyi mthar thug gi de nyid do zhes sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs so ni yang dag par thob pa ste sems can thams cad kyi mthar thug gi de nyid do zhes sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The word complete means that it is perfectly attained, the ultimate reality of all sentient beings. This is the literal meaning.

original: da ni chos rnams gang dag rgyud la rab tu 'byung //
analyzed: da ni chos rnams gang dag rgyud la rab tu 'byung //
translated: Now, as for the dharmas that arise in the continuum,

original: rgyud dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud rab tu gnas pa'i don du grub pa'i mtha' gsungs so //
analyzed: rgyud dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud rab tu gnas pa'i don du grub pa'i mtha' gsungs so //
translated: in order to establish the continuum, the conclusion is stated beginning with continuum.

original: gsungs pa yang bye brag tu smra ba dang mdo sde'i mtha' pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa dang dbu ma'i grub pa'i mtha' la sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos rnams gang dag la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas rgyas btab po zhes so //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang bye brag tu smra ba dang mdo sde'i mtha' pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa dang dbu ma'i grub pa'i mtha' la sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos rnams gang dag la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas rgyas btab po zhes so //
translated: It is said that the Buddhas have sealed the conclusions of the Vaibhāṣikas, Sautrāntikas, Yogācāras, and Mādhyamikas with the verse beginning The dharmas that arise from causes...

original: chos rnams gang dag rgyu las rab tu 'byung ni lnga dang bdun du rab tu grags pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos rnams gang dag rgyu las rab tu 'byung ni lnga dang bdun du rab tu grags pa rnams so //
translated: As for the dharmas that arise from causes, they are well-known as five and seven.

original: ma rig pa la sogs pa'i lag sgrog gis bsdams pa'i 'khor lo rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: ma rig pa la sogs pa'i lag sgrog gis bsdams pa'i 'khor lo rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: It is the wheel of dependent origination, the nature of cause and effect, bound by the shackles of ignorance and so forth.

original: de rnams nyon mongs pa dang las sdug bsngal te /
analyzed: de rnams nyon mongs pa dang las sdug bsngal te /
translated: These are the three branches of affliction, action, and suffering.🔽The two branches of ignorance and action are the origin of suffering. The seven branches from consciousness to feeling are the truth of suffering. The three branches from craving to becoming are the origin of suffering. Birth and aging-and-death are the truth of suffering.

original: yan lag gsum dang gnyis dang bdun kun rdzob tu ste thog ma med pa nas byung ba dang tha ma dang ldan pa ste ma rig pa 'gags pa las rnam par sangs rgyas pa nyid de gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: yan lag gsum dang gnyis dang bdun kun rdzob tu ste thog ma med pa nas byung ba dang tha ma dang ldan pa ste ma rig pa 'gags pa las rnam par sangs rgyas pa nyid de gsungs pa yang /
translated: The twelve links are taught in terms of the relative, which has existed since beginningless time and will exist until the end.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang /🔽rga shi ste bcu gnyis rnams so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ste bcu gnyis rnams so //
translated: They are ignorance, action, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and aging-and-death.

original: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi bdag nyid ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi bdag nyid ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: Ignorance is the nature of attachment, hostility, and benightedness.

original: 'du byed ni sngon gyi las rnams so //
analyzed: 'du byed ni sngon gyi las rnams so //
translated: Action is previous karma.

original: rnam par shes pa ni mngal du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni mngal du 'jug pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is entry into the womb.

original: ming dang gzugs ni nur nur po la sogs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ni nur nur po la sogs pa lnga'o //
translated: Name-and-form is the five stages beginning with kalala.

original: skye mched drug ni mig la sogs pa rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug ni mig la sogs pa rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The six sense bases are the complete eye, etc.

original: reg pa ni yul dang dbang po'i rnam par shes pa phrad pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa ni yul dang dbang po'i rnam par shes pa phrad pa'o //
translated: Contact is the meeting of the object, the sense faculty, and the consciousness.

original: tshor ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Feeling is the experience of pleasure, etc.

original: srid pa ni 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags so //
analyzed: srid pa ni 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags so //
translated: Craving is the desire for sexual intercourse.

original: nye bar len pa ni 'dod pa'i yul 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa ni 'dod pa'i yul 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Grasping is the grasping of the objects of desire.

original: srid pa ni 'byung @351b 'gyur gyi srid pa 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: srid pa ni 'byung @351b 'gyur gyi srid pa 'bras bu'o //
translated: Becoming is the result, the future existence.

original: las kyi skye ba ni slar yang phung po nyid mtshams sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: las kyi skye ba ni slar yang phung po nyid mtshams sbyor ba'o //
translated: Birth is the connection of the aggregates again.

original: rga shi ni gsal lo //
analyzed: rga shi ni gsal lo //
translated: Aging and death are clear.

original: dang po brgyad pa dgu nyon mongs //
analyzed: dang po brgyad pa dgu nyon mongs //
translated: The first, eighth, and ninth are afflictions.

original: gnyis pa bcu pa las yin te //
analyzed: gnyis pa bcu pa las yin te //
translated: The second and tenth are karma.

original: lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal yin //
analyzed: lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal yin //
translated: The remaining seven are suffering.

original: gsum du 'dus phyir bcu gnyis ni //
analyzed: gsum du 'dus phyir bcu gnyis ni //
translated: Because they are included in three, there are twelve.

original: chos gsum gsum las 'byung ba ni //
analyzed: chos gsum gsum las 'byung ba ni //
translated: Three arise from three dharmas.

original: gnyis gnyis gnyis las rang 'byung ba //
analyzed: gnyis gnyis gnyis las rang 'byung ba //
translated: Two arise from two.

original: bdun te bdun las gsum 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bdun te bdun las gsum 'byung ngo //
translated: Seven arise from seven.

original: slar yang de nyid de rnams 'khor //
analyzed: slar yang de nyid de rnams 'khor //
translated: Again, those very ones cycle.

original: srid pa'i 'khor lo rgyu 'bras kyang //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'khor lo rgyu 'bras kyang //
translated: The wheel of existence is cause and effect.

original: 'gro ba kun yin sems can gzhan //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun yin sems can gzhan //
translated: All beings are other sentient beings.

original: 'ga' zhig 'dir ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig 'dir ni yod ma yin //
translated: Some are not here.

original: stong pa kho na stong pa'i chos //
analyzed: stong pa kho na stong pa'i chos //
translated: Only emptiness is the quality of emptiness.

original: rab tu 'byung 'gyur chos rnams las //
analyzed: rab tu 'byung 'gyur chos rnams las //
translated: They will go forth from phenomena.

original: kha ton mar me rgya la sogs //
analyzed: kha ton mar me rgya la sogs //
translated: From recitation, from a lamp, from a seal, and so on.

original: zhes so // rgyu las rab tu 'byung gi don to //
analyzed: zhes so // rgyu las rab tu 'byung gi don to //
translated: The meaning of “going forth” is from a cause.

original: rgyu de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs zhes pa ni ji ltar kun du rtog pa de bzhin du gsung bar byed do zhes pas de'o //
analyzed: rgyu de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs zhes pa ni ji ltar kun du rtog pa de bzhin du gsung bar byed do zhes pas de'o //
translated: The Tathāgata taught those causes means that he teaches in accordance with how they are imagined.

original: gzhan mi gsungs pa nyid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan mi gsungs pa nyid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he does not teach anything else.

original: rgyu ni rkyen no //
analyzed: rgyu ni rkyen no //
translated: A cause is a condition.

original: 'khor bar brjod pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor bar brjod pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is said to be samsara.

original: de rnams kyang ni 'gog pa gang yin pa zhes pa ni kyang yig las srid pa dang rgyu dang bcas pa brjod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yang rgyu dang bcas pa ste yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog pa'i
analyzed: de rnams kyang ni 'gog pa gang yin pa zhes pa ni kyang yig las srid pa dang rgyu dang bcas pa brjod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yang rgyu dang bcas pa ste yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog pa'i
translated: And those are also the cessation of that means that not only is existence and its cause said to be, but also the nirvana of the buddhas is with cause, the cessation of the twelve links.

original: mtshan nyid zung du 'jug pa'i bde ba ma brtags pa nam mkha'i me tog sems med pa bems bo ma yin pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid zung du 'jug pa'i bde ba ma brtags pa nam mkha'i me tog sems med pa bems bo ma yin pa'i gzugs so //
translated: The form of the union of the two realities is the bliss of the union of the two realities, which is not a non-existent sky-flower, nor is it an inanimate matter.

original: de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che ni zung 'jug gsungs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te brdzun mi gsungs pa tshangs pa la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che ni zung 'jug gsungs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te brdzun mi gsungs pa tshangs pa la sogs pa'o ;
translated: The great ascetic who speaks in this way is the perfect Buddha who has taught the union, and Brahmā and so on are those who do not speak falsely.

original: / sbyin par bya ba'i chos rab mchog 'di ni //
analyzed: / sbyin par bya ba'i chos rab mchog 'di ni //
translated: This is the supreme gift of the Dharma.

original: zhes pa chos kyi sbyin pa thar pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa chos kyi sbyin pa thar pa thob pa'o //
translated: The gift of the Dharma is the attainment of liberation.

original: sbyin pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig ces pa rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig ces pa rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The giver of the gift and the recipient of the gift are easy to understand.

original: ngag gi skyon tsam dang bral ma lus go 'phang ni //🔽dpal sdom bdag gis nyung ngur rnam phye mtha' drug ldan ;
analyzed: ngag gi skyon tsam dang bral ma lus go 'phang ni // dpal sdom bdag gis nyung ngur rnam phye mtha' drug ldan ;
translated: The state free from the faults of speech is🔽the six-parameter analysis of the glorious Cakrasaṃvara,

original: / kun phan mnga' bdag ci yin rab tu gsal bar bris //
analyzed: / kun phan mnga' bdag ci yin rab tu gsal bar bris //
translated: which I have written clearly and extensively.

original: de nyid kyis ni sems can kun zhi bde ba thob par byed //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni sems can kun zhi bde ba thob par byed //
translated: By that, all sentient beings will attain peace and happiness.🔽All those who speak well

original: gang dag legs par gsungs pa'i ngag / de kun bde bar gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: gang dag legs par gsungs pa'i ngag / de kun bde bar gshegs pa'o //
translated: are the Sugatas.

original: zhes kyang gang phyir rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: zhes kyang gang phyir rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: And also because it was taught by the Victorious One,

original: de phyir mkhas pas de mi @352a * //
analyzed: de phyir mkhas pas de mi @352a * //
translated: The wise should not criticize it.

original: smad ; / gang phyir ston pa gcig pu rgyal bas mdor bstan pas //
analyzed: smad ; / gang phyir ston pa gcig pu rgyal bas mdor bstan pas //
translated: Because it was taught by the Victorious One, the sole teacher,

original: rnam par g-yeng ba med pa'i yid rnams kyis bshad pa //
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng ba med pa'i yid rnams kyis bshad pa //
translated: And explained by those with undistracted minds,

original: thar pa thob pa'i tshogs dang rjes mthun pa //
analyzed: thar pa thob pa'i tshogs dang rjes mthun pa //
translated: In accordance with the accumulation leading to the attainment of liberation,

original: de yang drang srong bka' bzhin spyi bos long //🔽aom ke li ka yi blo gros ches //
analyzed: de yang drang srong bka' bzhin spyi bos long // aom ke li ka yi blo gros ches //
translated: You should accept it, as if it were the words of the Sage himself.🔽Om! With great intelligence, like the feet of a child,

original: byis zhabs zla ba sngon ma can //
analyzed: byis zhabs zla ba sngon ma can //
translated: The moon-like ones of the past

original: de rnams kyis bstan de nyid ni //
analyzed: de rnams kyis bstan de nyid ni //
translated: Taught this truth,

original: 'jigs med dga' ba zhes bya yul //
analyzed: 'jigs med dga' ba zhes bya yul //
translated: In the land called Fearless Joy.

original: dpal ldan rnam gnon grong yid dga' //
analyzed: dpal ldan rnam gnon grong yid dga' //
translated: The glorious and humble town of Delight,

original: dag pa'i gnas ni rgyal ba'i gzhi //
analyzed: dag pa'i gnas ni rgyal ba'i gzhi //
translated: The pure abode, the basis of the Victorious Ones,

original: gzi brjid stong dang tshul khrims byung //
analyzed: gzi brjid stong dang tshul khrims byung //
translated: Arisen from a thousand splendors and discipline,

original: 'byor pa'i don gyis nor sbyin mtshungs //
analyzed: 'byor pa'i don gyis nor sbyin mtshungs //
translated: Equal to the giver of wealth through the meaning of prosperity,

original: rgyal chen lhag pa'i rgyal po dpal //
analyzed: rgyal chen lhag pa'i rgyal po dpal //
translated: The glorious king of the great kings,

original: rgyal ba dga' ba can zhes grags //
analyzed: rgyal ba dga' ba can zhes grags //
translated: The Victorious One known as Delightful.

original: bkod pa chen po bdag po mchog / de yi dbon po mang thos gang //
analyzed: bkod pa chen po bdag po mchog / de yi dbon po mang thos gang //
translated: and his nephew, the one of great learning,

original: de nyid kyi 'dir rgyal bas bstan //
analyzed: de nyid kyi 'dir rgyal bas bstan //
translated: that very one taught this here by the Victor.

original: don mang 'khor lo sdom pa la //
analyzed: don mang 'khor lo sdom pa la //
translated: In the Cakrasaṃvara with many meanings,

original: dga' bas chog bdun gyis ni //
analyzed: dga' bas chog bdun gyis ni //
translated: with seven verses of delight,

original: tshig don rnams ni brjod pa las //
analyzed: tshig don rnams ni brjod pa las //
translated: from the expression of the words and meanings,

original: bsod nams dkar ba thob pa gang //
analyzed: bsod nams dkar ba thob pa gang //
translated: whatever white merit is obtained,

original: de nyid kyis ni zung 'jug pa'i //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni zung 'jug pa'i //
translated: by that very one, may there be

original: de nyid mkhas pa'i 'grel pa yi //
analyzed: de nyid mkhas pa'i 'grel pa yi //
translated: the union of the wise commentary🔽and the glory residing on the crown,

original: dpal ni spyi bor gnas pa dang // sems can rnams kyang bde chen gyis //
analyzed: dpal ni spyi bor gnas pa dang // sems can rnams kyang bde chen gyis //
translated: and may sentient beings attain

original: bde ldan dngos grub mchog thob gyur //
analyzed: bde ldan dngos grub mchog thob gyur //
translated: the supreme siddhi of great bliss.

original: dpal de kho na nyid mkhas pa zhes bya ba dpal sdom pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal de kho na nyid mkhas pa zhes bya ba dpal sdom pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary on the glorious Cakrasaṃvara called The Wisdom of Thatness is completed.🔽The lord of the one who delights,

original: // / dga' byed bdag po'i slob dam pa //
analyzed: // / dga' byed bdag po'i slob dam pa //
translated: the supreme disciple of that very one,

original: de nyid bzhi po rtogs pa las //
analyzed: de nyid bzhi po rtogs pa las //
translated: the one who realized the four realities,

original: rtag pa'i rdo rje de yis byas //
analyzed: rtag pa'i rdo rje de yis byas //
translated: made this through the eternal vajra.

original: 'jigs med dga' byed ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'jigs med dga' byed ces bya'o //
translated: It is called Fearless One Who Delights.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i 'grel pa dpal de kho na nyid mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'di kun ldan gyi lo cho 'phrul chen po rta'i zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes brgyad la sh'akya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing zhes te gtan la phab pa'o /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i 'grel pa dpal de kho na nyid mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'di kun ldan gyi lo cho 'phrul chen po rta'i zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes brgyad la sh'akya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing zhes te gtan la phab pa'o /
translated: This commentary on the Shri Chakrasaṃvara called Shri- tattvaviveka was translated and finalized by the Śākya bhikṣu Ratnasiddhi on the eighth day of the waxing moon of the lunar month of miracles of the Earth Rabbit year.
